column6: 0.017#TD4049E.TXT.r#2289244#2289245#TD4049E.TXT.r_319;TD4049E.TXT.r_320# mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i nyes pa dang   mi rtag pa nyid kyi nyes pa dang  rang dbang med pa'i nyes pa dang  lus med pa'i nyes pa dang  bsgrim mi dgos par thar par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa'o // / +gang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag LA 'JIG TSHOGS LA LTA ba'i mtha' nyi shu po / /
column7: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#995273#995273#TD4054E.TXT.r_616;TD4054E.TXT.r_617# bsgrim mi dgos par thar par 'gyur ba'i nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la tshogs can la lta ba'i mtha' nyi shu po gzugs la bdag tu kun du rjes su lta ba dang  gzugs  bdag dang ldan pa dang  gzugs bdag gi ba dang  gzugs la gzugs dang  tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa la bdag tu kun du rjes su lta ba dang  bdag rnam shes dang ldan pa dang  rnam shes bdag gi ba dang  rnam shes la rnam  shes so // /

column10: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#213487#213487#TD4035E.TXT.r_15088;TD4035E.TXT.r_15089# gang la brten na sems can byung ba rnams gnas shing 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang  'byung bar 'dod pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o // / +'jug pa'i phung po gang zhe na / /

column12: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767591#2767592#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9379;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9380# lnga pas ni skye ba dang  rga ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang mi 'bral bas bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // / +de la nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po gnas su gyur pa de dag ni gzhi dang bcas pa dang  grogs dang bcas pa dang  kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa de dang ldan pas na chos nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya'o // /

column14: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767814#2767814#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9413;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9414# lnga gang zhe na / / +'jig rten pa'i dang ba'i gzugs dang  dang bas gzung ba'i gzugs thams cad dang 'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos nyon mongs pa can thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lung du ma bstan pa  thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba dang spang bar bya ba dang spangs pa thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul 'jig rten pa'i gzugs bstan du med la thogs pa med pa thams cad do // /
column15: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767861#2767861#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9416;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9417# lnga gang zhe na / / +mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i gnyen po rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i gnyen po rnams dang  'du shes rnam par grol bas rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste / /

column3: bdag yod pa nyid du zhugs su zin  kyang de med pa'i phyir bdag tu lta ba zhes ni mi bya'o // /
yul med pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba zhes bya ba smras so // / +de ni 'jig pa yang yin la tshogs kyang yin pas 'jig tshogs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#213852#213862#TD4035E.TXT.r_15146;TD4035E.TXT.r_15147;TD4035E.TXT.r_15148# gang gi phyir ma skyes pa dang  ma byung ba dang  ma byas pa dang  'dus ma byas pa dang  yang dag par ma byung ba de yod pas de'i phyir skyes pa dang  byung ba dang  byas pa dang  'dus byas pa dang  yang dag par 'byung ba las nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes nga zer ro zhes gsungs     // / +pa lta bu'o // / +zab cing rgya che la dpag tu med pa mya ngan las 'das pa ni grangs su gtogs pa med do zhes bya ba de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: 'jig pa ni 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid do // / +tshogs ni 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i tha     // / +tshig go // /

column3: yang na yod pa ste du ma yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de ni bdag yod pa nyid du zhugs la de ni med pas de'i dmigs pa med par 'gyur du 'ong zhes te de'i don du yod pa smos so // /

column5: 0.021#TD4060E.TXT.r#681148#681148#TD4060E.TXT.r_109# gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin no zhes bya ba dang  gzugs gang rtag pa dang  brtan pa dang  ther zug ba dang  mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang  yang dag par de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba'i  gzugs de lta bu 'ga' YOD DAM ZHES BYA BA dang  'phags pa nyan thos shes nas dad pa bzhi dag dang ldan pa ni 'tsho ba dag gis dbul ba ma yin / /
column6: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#635447#635447#TD4069E.TXT.r_1789# de nas dge slong zhig gcig pu dben par song  ste nang du yang dag gzhag pa dang  'di lta bur sems la gzugs gang rtag pa dang  brtan pa dang  ther zug dang  mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang  yang dag par de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs de lta bu 'ga' yod dam / /

column5: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397333#2397333#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10236# yan lag bcu gcig las brtsams  nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  sa'i ming gi don bstan pa dang  kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye  ba dang  smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214050#214060#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_8;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_9# gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni du mchis zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun tu rmongs pa rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig las brtsams nas  sa rnams rnam par dbye ba ston to // / +de yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column6: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221161#221163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column8: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229708#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216492#216494#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226167#226169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin PA DE DAG GI GO rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261137#261139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /
column9: 0.008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226521#226528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column13: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221517#221518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column14: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241018#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /

column3: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra zhig mi mngon par byas  pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214091#214100#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_12;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_13;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_14# mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // / +'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i     // /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365231#2365231#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6386;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6388# yongs rdzogs ye shes mtshan ma med pa khams gsum bdag / / +'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams  su ni gzugs med pa yang gtogs par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#452963#452963#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_375;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_376# de dag 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku gsum dang ldan zhing gzugs  dang sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan mnga' bas / / +'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364920#2364920#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6344;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6345# zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su ni / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269153#269153#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6941;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6942# 'di la yang tshul de bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang don gyis mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /

column3: lta ba la sogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa bsdu bar blta'o // / +de bas na lta ba mchog ma yin pa de dag dang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po mchog ma yin pa de dag la mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214101#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_14;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# mdo las yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u las ni ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227745#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen PA ZHES BYA BA NYID do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3747# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235701#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220616#220616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column20: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529706#529707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column26: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /

column29: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column31: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474728#474732#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3262# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341645#2341645#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3565# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang khyab pa dang spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba la sogs pa dmigs  pa rnam pa bzhi'i ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do // /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375378#2375378#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7704# phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad dang  bden pa bzhi dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang  'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la sogs pa'i chos  thams cad rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid do zhes ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do // /
column34: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356676#2356676#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5339# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni bsgom pa rnam pa lnga po de dag gi ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med de / /
column35: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228710#228710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1882;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1883# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa  las ni ming bkod par zad kyi / / +rnam par bshad pa ni med do // /

column38: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362366#2362366#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6017# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni ming bkod par zad kyi / /
column39: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386200#2386200#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la LTA BA LA SOGS PAS bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column40: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387393#2387393#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column41: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477883#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: 'di rnams ji ltar mchog ma yin zhe na / / +'phags pa rnams kyis spang  bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214118#214142#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_16;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_17# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214255#214258#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# rigs kyi bus de dag la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni bcu gcig yod do zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214292#214295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_32# 'di  ni dang pos bcu gcig po dag la kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs gnas ngan len bcu gcig yod pas mdor bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216099#216101#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_256# rigs kyi bu kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de dag gi phyir sa rnam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rmongs pa la sogs pa gsungs  pa'i dgos pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4019E.TXT.r#2416873#2416875#TD4019E.TXT.r_1268# spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118694#3118696#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3897# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs de dag ni kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de ngag gi rnam par gzhag ste / /
column10: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118531#3118532#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3883# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs kun tu rmongs pa nyid shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ste / /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399559#2399559#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10520;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10521# de las bcu gcig pas sgrib pa gsum spang bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni mdo las ma rig pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes gsungs  pa nyid do // / +gnas ngan len bcu gcig ni 'og nas rgya cher ston to // /

column3: ci'i phyir spang bar bya zhe na / / +sdug bsngal gsum yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214290#214293#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_32;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_31# 'di  ni dang pos bcu gcig po dag la kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs gnas ngan len bcu gcig yod pas mdor bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216100#216101#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_256# rigs kyi bu kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de dag gi phyir sa rnam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rmongs pa la sogs pa gsungs  pa'i dgos pa ston to // /
column6: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118695#3118696#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3897# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs de dag ni kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de ngag gi rnam par gzhag ste / /

column3: blo'i bye brag gang yin pa ni / / +shes rab kyi bye brag gang yin pa ste / / +de ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'o // /
rtog pa zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa'o // / +tshul khrims ni rgyu'o // / +brtul zhugs ni lam mo // / +des na rgyu ma yin  pa la rgyur lta / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214143#214164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_16;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_17;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_18;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_19;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_20# kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las dang po brgyad kyis ni rnam pa bzhi la sbyor ba'i skye shi mngon par 'grub par byed do // / +de'i  'og ma drug gis ni rkyen gyi skye shi mngon par 'grub par byed do // /

column3: lam ma yin pa la lam du lta ba ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o // / +'di lta ste dper na dbang phyug dang skyes bu dang  gtso bo dang dus la sogs pa 'gro ba'i rgyu ma yin pa de dag la yang rgyu nyid du mthong bas rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur lta ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214164#214174#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_19;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_20;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_21;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_22# srid pa dang bcas pa'i skye shi mngon par 'grub par byed do // / +phyi ma gnyis kyis ni srid pa med pa'i skye shi mngon par 'grub par  byed do / /

column3: lam ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +mngon par mtho ba'i dang  nges par legs pa'o // / +de la me dang chu'i nang du 'jug pa la sogs pa mtho ris kyi lam ma yin pa de dag la yang lam du mthong ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214175#214189#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_21;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_22;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_23# de ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa la gnas ngan len zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba de brtags na skyon rnam gsum yod de / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228195#228195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1815# mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang  mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du yongs su  'dzin pa gsum po yongs su ngal ba med pa dang  bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang  'khor 'dul ba'i las dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229361#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229716#229716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam du zad do // / +rang bzhin dang skyes bu'i bye brag gis shes pa la sogs pa'i thar pa'i rgyu ma yin pa de dag  la yang lam du mthong bas lam ma yin pa la lam du lta'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214190#214206#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_23;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_24;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_25# dang po ni rgya gar gyi  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa'i dpe nyid la de ltar rnam par phye ba med pas so // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402304#2402305#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10876;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10877;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10878# slob  dpon yang dag bden pas rang nyid kyis bzhag pa yin gyi / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa / / +rgya gar gyi dpe nyid las ni tshig 'di lta bu dang  gtan tshigs 'di lta bu gtan med de / /

column3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bram ze cho ga can gtsang sbra 'dod pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni dper na bram ze cho ga can gtsang sbra 'dod pa la sogs pas gtsang sbra byed pa dag ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyis dag par sems pa     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214207#214222#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_24;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_25;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_26;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27# gnyis pa ni 'phags pa dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel pa'i mdo'i khungs su bstan pa nyid las / / +skye shi rnam pa bzhir bstan pa med    pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214223#214238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_26;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27# gsum pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas dngos po'i 'chi 'pho ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur par ston pas so // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263443#263443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6236# de la bye brag yod pa de'i  gzhung gis cha bzhi'i don rnam par mi 'jog pas 'dir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228325#228326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1835# tha ma ni stong pa nyid gnyis mngon du byas pa'i shes pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni sems  can stong pa dang  chos stong pa dang  gnyi ga stong pa'i shes rab ces bshad do // /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386613#2386613#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9002# de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du  grub pa las / /
column9: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1126110#1126110#TD4047E.TXT.r_693;TD4047E.TXT.r_694# rtag tu chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas 'chi 'pho dang bral ba'i phyir mi gyo ba'o // / +de las gong mar gyur pa med pas bla na med pa'o // /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535609#535609#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11222# gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: ltar chos de yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o // / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bye brag gis lta ba gsum gcig tu bsdus te lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214238#214247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222909#222910#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223707#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231632#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237177#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog SPYOD PA ZHES BSHAD DO zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par RIG PAR BYA'O // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column13: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column14: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237242#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column15: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397570#2397570#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column16: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245351#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236517#236518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column18: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216181#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column19: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /
column21: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246092#246094#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4100# 'di ni dang po ji ltar gsungs pa'i don du zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column22: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236093#236093#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2838# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column23: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239207#239207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3241# brda phrad par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column24: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121028#3121028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4185;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4186# bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa / / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa yin te / /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235832#235832#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2806# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column26: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241854#241854#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3571# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column27: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216406#216408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column28: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219505#219506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_700# de don gang la dgongs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column29: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231592#231592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235783#235784#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column31: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238777#238777#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3183# pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag las pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245279#245282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005# de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column33: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220016#220016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_766# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa  spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column35: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233805#233805#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2533# de'i phyir 'dir re zhig bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  ngo bo nyid kyi 'grel pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba las bshad pa dang sbyar nas mdo 'di bshad par bya ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506493#506495#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353609#2353613#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4973;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4974# rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngar yongs su bzung ba dang   bsams pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma'i don dag la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos la gnas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /

column10: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2417087#2417087#TD4019E.TXT.r_1285# brgyad pa la ni mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba'i kun du rmongs pa dang  mtshan ma rnams la mi dbang ba'i kun du rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so // /
column11: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2417040#2417040#TD4019E.TXT.r_1282# lnga pa la ni 'khor ba gcig tu mi phyogs pa nyid dang mngon du phyogs pa nyid yid la byed  pa'i kun du rmongs pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la gcig tu mi phyogs pa nyid dang mngon du phyogs pa nyid yid la byed pa'i kun du rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so // /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215529#215529#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_189# mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba kun tu rmongs pa dang  mtshan ma la dbang ba kun du  rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs SO ZHES BYA BA NI brgyad pa mi gyo ba'i sa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la 'di dag gis srid pa'i btson rar bcings pas 'ching ba rnams te / / +'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyud kyi gags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: sdug bsngal mthong ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi yul lam sdug bsngal gyi rnam  par mthong bas sdug bsngal mthong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214522#214537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_62;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_63# gnyis pa ni yang dag pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam mngon du gyur pa na sgrib pa de gnyi ga'i sa bon gdon mi za bar grub par mi  'gyur te / / +dper na snang ba dang mun pa nges par cig car mi skye ba dang  srang mda'i mtho dman dus mtshungs pa bzhin du phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi rigs pa yang de bzhin te / /

column3: de dag ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang  rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa'i bzod pa'o // / +de gnyis kyis spong ba ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214536#214549#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_63;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_64;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_65# dper na snang ba dang mun pa nges par cig car mi skye ba dang  srang mda'i mtho dman dus mtshungs pa bzhin du phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi rigs pa yang de bzhin te / /

column3: spong ba zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyud las sel ba ste / / +rnyed pa'i rgyun gcod pa dang  de la bral  ba'i rnyed pa bskyed pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214562#214571#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_66;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_67# rnam par grol ba'i lam bskyed ci dgos she na / / +nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'i dus kyi sems tha dad pa'i phyir dang  de'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len gyi ngo bo spong ba'i phyir dang  bar chad med pa'i lam gyi tshe  nyon mongs pa'i sa bon med mod kyi / /

column3: bsgom pa ni dmigs pa ma nges shing 'bras bu khyad par can la ltos nas shes pa goms par byed pa ste / /

column3: des spang bar bya ba'i 'dod chags ni bsgom pas spang bar bya'o // / +nang du bltas par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags ni phal cher yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur pas phyir bltas par gyur pa'o // /

column3: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yul yin pas nang du bltas pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214600#214607#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_70;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_71# de'i phyogs so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i 'dus ma byas mngon du byas pa yin no zhes bshad do // / +kha cig na re yang dag pa'i  don du na sgrib pa gnyis ka bsdu pa yin yang mdo sde dang bstan bcos la ni shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na sa bcu la sgrib par dgongs pa'i phyir / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214608#214619#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_71;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_72;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_73# kha cig na re yang dag pa'i  don du na sgrib pa gnyis ka bsdu pa yin yang mdo sde dang bstan bcos la ni shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na sa bcu la sgrib par dgongs pa'i phyir / /

column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226521#226521#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404046#2404047#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11066;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11067# mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column12: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260980#260980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /

column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384464#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384831#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column17: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230242#230242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2096# 'dod pa la dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang  phyug ces 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533914#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column20: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256224#256224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385684#2385685#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column23: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266095#266095#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6578# dbyings dang  rang bzhin dang  las dang  chos dang  rgyu dang  'bras bur rnam par smin pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: rnam pas tha dad pa nyid de zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pas so // /

column3: phra rgyas kyi don gang zhe na / / +phra ba'i don yin na tshor ba la sogs pa la yang thar bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391389#2391390#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9553# kha cig na re mdo'i tshig 'di ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang mthun par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyi gus shes pa dman pa'i khyi gu 'byin par bstan pa yin no zhe'o // /

column13: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385730#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta BA LA SOGS PA'I MA rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386554#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386797#2386797#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387235#2387235#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398997#2398997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column23: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224998#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228883#228883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1906# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241689#241689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3555# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du sa'i mdun rol dang  sa bcu po dag tu 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba la brten nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du sa re re zhing lpags shun la yod pa lta  bu la sogs pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
