column13: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385817#2385817#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8921;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8922# sa gsum pa la ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi sgrib pa gnyen por gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sa gsum pa'i sgrib pa bstan pa yin no // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214940#214940#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_112;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_113# snyoms par 'jug pa la sred pa'i kun du rmongs pa dang  chos la sred pa'i kun du rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba can gyi sgrib pa bstan pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las snyoms  par 'jug pa la sred pa'i kun du rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni / /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386449#2386449#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8991# sa lnga pa la ni 'khor  ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la gcig tu phyogs pa dang  mngon du phyogs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sa lnga pa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las lhan cig skyes pa'i phyogs gcig dang  kun du  rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las ni 'khor ba la gcig tu mi phyogs pa nyid yid la byed pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i kun du rmongs pas ngo bo nyid byed do zhes bshad de / /

column3: rigs gzhan khong du mi chud mi rtogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go // / +zag pa ni gsum ste zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa 'di dag zag pa la sogs pas ming tha dad par mdo las gsungs pa de yongs su bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215905#215919#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_232;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_233;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_234# de la mngon par shes pa chen po la kun tu rmongs PA ZHES BYA BA NI / / +'dir ni bya ba'i dngos po'i las la sgrib par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215920#215931#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_233;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_234;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_235# gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa shin tu phra mo khong du  chud pa la kun tu rmongs PA ZHES BYA BA NI / / +'dir chos chen po'i ye shes kyi sprin dang  yongs su sba bar bya ba la sgrib par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4071E.TXT.r#400276#400276#TD4071E.TXT.r_151# de lta bas na khyab par byed pa gcig pu de yod pa ma yin pas snga ma bzhin du gang zhig dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PAS khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: zag pa ni gsum ste zhes bya ba 'di brjod do // / +rdzas lnga bcu rtsa bzhi ni srid pa'i zag pa zhes bya ba 'di la  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rmugs pa dang rgod pa ci'i phyir ma smos she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215929#215959#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_234;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_235;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_236;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_238# 'dir chos chen po'i ye shes kyi sprin dang  yongs su sba bar bya ba la sgrib par byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +sgrib pa rnam pa bcu las ni chos rnams la dbang du ma gyur pa'i sgrib pa nyid de / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387816#2387816#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9119# shes bya'i sgrib pa las    lhan cig skyes pa'i phyogs gcig gis chos rnams la dbang thob par mi byed pas des sa bcu pa'i chos chen po'i sprin gyi shes pa dang  yongs su sbas pa dang des bskyed pa'i bya ba dag la sgrib par byed de / /

column3: 'dir smras pa / / +rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro // / +rang dbang ni rang gtso bo'o // /
de gnyis ni der nyon mongs pa gzhan dag gis zil gyis non pa'i phyir rang dbang med pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215960#215967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_238;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_239# des sa bcu pa'i chos chen po'i ye shes kyi sprin dang  yongs su sbas pa las 'byung ba'i bya ba'i dngos po dag la sgrib par byed de / / +sa bcu par zhugs pa na gtan du spong ngo zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: zag pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba ma rig pa  yin pas / / +ma rig pa'i zag pa logs shig tu smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215968#215976#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_238;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_239;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_240# sa bcu par zhugs pa na gtan du spong ngo zhes 'byung ngo // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la kun  tu rmongs pa gnyis yod de / /
column5: 2.980#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118679#3118682#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3896# sangs rgyas kyis la ni shes bya thams cad la chags pa shin tu phra mo kun tu rmongs pa dang  thogs pa kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan  len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so // /

column3: 'jog ces bya ba ni gzhog pa'o // / +zag pa ni de'i sgo nas 'byung bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215977#215985#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_240# shes bya thams cad la chags pa shin tu phra mo kun tu rmongs pa dang  thogs pa phra mo kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: de dag ma yin pa nyon mongs pa gzhan dang ldan pa rnams zhes bya ba la / / +de zhes bya ba 'dis ni lta ba dang ldan pa'i ma rig pa gzung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215986#215998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_242# shes bya thams cad la chags pa shin tu phra mo kun tu rmongs pa dang  thogs pa phra mo kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215286#215288#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_155# 'du byed rnams kyi 'jug pa mngon du bya ba la so sor rtog pa'i kun tu rmongs pa dang  mtshan ma mang po kun tu 'byung ba kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba ni drug pas mngon du gyur pa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig  pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: nyon mongs pa  gzhan zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams so // / +rdzas brgya rtsa brgyad po de ni ma 'dres pa'i ma rig pa bco lnga dang bral ba bag la nyal ba brgyad cu rtsa gsum dang  kun nas dkris te 'dug pa bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i ma rig pa dang ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de gnyi  ga ni rdzas brgya rtsa brgyad yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388221#2388222#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9161;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9162# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon par kun las btus pa las / / +de byang chub thob pa na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa cig  car spong ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#215999#216013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_243;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_244# shes bya thams cad la chags pa shin tu phra mo kun tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni / / +'dir shes bya'i sgrib pa phra mo bstan PA GANG YIN PA'O // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216013#216021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_245# thogs pa shin tu phra mo kun tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni 'di rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sa bon gang yin pa thams cad de / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216022#216033#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_247# de'i  phyir bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236373#236373#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2872# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar ni 'bras bus khyad par du 'phags shing mthar thug pa'i rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir / / +bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /

column3: sbyor ba rnams kyang tshul 'di dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216034#216046#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_247;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_248# de byang chub thob pa na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa cig car spangs nas dgra bcom pa dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te / / +mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang  byang chub chen po thob par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388233#2388236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9163;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9164# cig car dgra bcom pa dang  de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te / / +mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang  byang chub chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: yang na 'khri ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni dper na dar gyi srin bus bdag gis bdag dkris nas 'chi bar gtod pa de     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216047#216061#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_248;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_249;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_250;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_251# sgrib pa rnam pa bcu las 'di ni logs shig tu sgrib pa gcig tu phyin sa bstan pa yin te / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388146#2388146#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9154# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa  las / /

column3: bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang rang gi las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bdag dkris nas ngan song rnams su gtod par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216060#216078#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_250;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_251;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_252;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_253# sa 'dir chos la dbang thob pa yin mod kyi / / +'on kyang sgrib pa lhag ma dad bcas pas shin tu mthar thug pa zhes mi bya ste / /

column3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa rdzas drug ni zhes bya ba ni khams kyi bye brag gis so // / +lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa rdzas bcu gnyis kyang de  bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216078#216093#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_253;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_254;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_255# skyes pa'i shes bya'i sgrib pa phra mo dang ldan pa dang  rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i sa bon dang ldan pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa na / /
column5: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1370237#1370237#TD4037E.TXT.r_7239;TD4037E.TXT.r_7240# stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la ji lta ba bzhin du smon pa med pa dang  mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis la yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // / +de dag mngon du gyur pa na mi phyed pa'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2604457#2604457#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8542# bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pa gang gis mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin lnga bcu rtsa gnyis     // /
column7: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#755602#755602#TD4091E.TXT.r_11012# zag pa dang bcas pa zad par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'o // /

column3: sgrib pa ni lnga ste zhes bya ba la 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang  gnod sems kyi sgrib pa dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa dang  rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa dang  the tshom gyi sgrib pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214123#214129#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_16# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216093#216102#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_255;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_256# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118693#3118696#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3897# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs de dag ni kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de ngag gi rnam par gzhag ste / /
column7: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214255#214256#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29# rigs kyi bus de dag la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni bcu gcig yod do zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214292#214294#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_32# 'di  ni dang pos bcu gcig po dag la kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs gnas ngan len bcu gcig yod pas mdor bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.014#TD4019E.TXT.r#2416873#2416874#TD4019E.TXT.r_1268# spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ste / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399559#2399559#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10520;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10521# de las bcu gcig pas sgrib pa gsum spang bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni mdo las ma rig pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes gsungs  pa nyid do // / +gnas ngan len bcu gcig ni 'og nas rgya cher ston to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516410#516410#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8657# phung po lnga'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353393#2353393#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4942# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361652#2361652#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5940;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5941# zhib tu ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234920#234920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2683# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni / / +mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column15: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371453#2371454#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7212# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363623#2363623#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6178# de bzhin nyid bdun po 'di dag rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig  par bya'o // /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366958#2366958#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6624# rgya cher ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343870#2343870#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3848# rgya cher bshad pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de la kha cig khams gsum pa'i rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang  the tshom rnams gzung ngam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216101#216110#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_256# rigs kyi bu kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de dag gi phyir sa rnam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rmongs pa la sogs pa gsungs  pa'i dgos pa ston to // /

column3: 'on te  'dod pa dang ldan pa nyid ce na / / +smras pa dge slong dag 'di lta ste / / +sgrib pa lnga po 'di 'ba' zhig gis mi dge ba'i phung po yongs su rdzogs so zhes mdo las 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216109#216127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_257;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_258# rigs kyi bu kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig po de dag gi phyir sa rnam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rmongs pa la sogs pa gsungs  pa'i dgos pa ston to // /

column3: mi dge ba'i sgra bstan pas ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid gzung ngo // / +ci'i phyir rmugs pa dang gnyid ces gcig tu bsdus / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216128#216138#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_258;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_260# rmongs pa la sogs pa gsungs pa nyid kyi dgongs pa bstan pa dang  byang chub kyi 'ching ba rnams dang bral bar ston pa ste / / +'di ni dang po'o // /

column3: rgod pa dang  'gyod pa gnyis la sgrib pa gcig tu bshad / / +smras pa / / +bya ba gcig pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216139#216148#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_260;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_261# 'di ltar sa bcu gcig rnam par gzhag par bzhed pa'i phyir kun tu rmongs pa dang   gnas ngan len rnams bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: rmugs pa dang gnyid de gnyis kyis ni sems zhum par byed do // / +rgod pa dang 'gyod pas ni sems ma zhi bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216149#216159#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_261;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_263# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'ching ba de dag dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 'ching ba rnams dang bral bar bstan to // /

column3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i the tshom rnam pa bzhi ste / / +sdug bsngal ba dang  kun 'byung ba dang  'gog  pa dang ; / +lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216157#216181#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_261;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_263;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_264;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'ching ba de dag dang mi ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 'ching ba rnams dang bral bar bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis  gsungs pa dang  byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa brjod pa'o // /

column3: 'phags pa'i lam dang gnas zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang de'i gnas bsam gtan la sogs pa'o // /
'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa spong ba ste / / +mi rtogs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams  kyi bden pa bzhi rtogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397227#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397248#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397271#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216268#216276#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_278# byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar kun tu rmongs pa'i dra ba chen po rab tu dral zhing de ltar gnas ngan len gyi thibs po las yang dag par 'das  nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du thob par bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bye brag tu bsngags pa brjod pa'o // /

column5: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118725#3118727#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3899;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3900# bcom ldan  'das gang la da ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar kun tu rmongs pa'i dra ba chen po rab tu dral cing de'i gnas ngan len thibs po chen po las yang dag par 'das te / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bla na med pa yang dag  par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci tsam du phan yon che zhing / /

column3: de dag na chags su rung ba cung zad kyang med pas sems can dmyal ba dag go // / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216292#216302#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_278;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_279;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_280;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_281;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_282# byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar kun tu rmongs pa'i dra ba chen po rab tu dral zhing de ltar gnas ngan len gyi thibs po las yang dag par 'das  nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du thob par bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bye brag tu bsngags pa brjod pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang don rnam pa gsum yod de / /

column3: yang 'tshol sogs pa'o // / +sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun du gnod pa byas nas brgyal te 'khod pa dang de dag la bsil ba'i rlung langs shing kva'i sems can dag yang sos shig ces sgra 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216301#216316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_280;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_281;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_282;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_283# kun tu rmongs pa rnams bral ba dang  gnas ngan len las yang dag par 'das  pa dang ; / +byang chub mngon du byed pa ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan yon rnam pa gsum po 'di dag dang ldan par byed pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216317#216325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_283;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_284;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_285# kun tu rmongs pa 'di dag ni sems can la 'gebs shing dkri bar byed pa'i phyir dra ba lta bur bstan to // /

column3: de dag der bsad cing der yang 'tsho bas yang 'tsho'o // / +thig nag ces bya ba ni thig skud nag pos  btab te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216324#216336#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_283;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_284;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_285# kun tu rmongs pa 'di dag ni sems can la 'gebs shing dkri bar byed pa'i phyir dra ba lta bur bstan to // / +gnas ngan len mang bas thibs bo lta bur  bstan to // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214252#214252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29# rigs kyi bus de dag la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni bcu gcig yod do zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385293#2385295#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8866;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8867# gnyis pa ni yang dag pa nyid las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid bstan pa ste / / +'di ni kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang de'i gnas ngan pa'i  ngo bo nyid de / /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397329#2397330#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10236# yan lag bcu gcig las brtsams  nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  sa'i ming gi don bstan pa dang  kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye  ba dang  smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385882#2385882#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8929# des gsum pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dang  gzungs kyis bskyed pa'i shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa gsum la sgrib par byed la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun du rmongs pa dang  thos pa'i gzungs yongs su  rdzogs pa la kun du rmongs pa yang sdud par byed do zhes bstan pa yin no // /

column3: shing bzhin du gshegs pas thig nag go // / +bsdus 'joms zhes bya ba ni sems can mang du bsdus nas khang pa la sogs par 'joms pas bsdus 'joms so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216337#216351#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_285;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_286# bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis bstan pa la rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad bstan pa dang  'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub kyi yon tan  brjod pa'o //// /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269490#269490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6985;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6986# dang po yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang   bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: ngu 'bod ni sems can dag las kyi 'bras bu ma rungs pas gtses pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas ku co 'don  pas ngu 'bod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397571#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216352#216362#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_286;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_287;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad bstan pa dang  'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub kyi yon tan  brjod pa'o //// /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226439#226441#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236440#236443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2881;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2882# bam po drug cu gsum pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to ; / /
column8: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121003#3121006#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4182# de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column9: 0.006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402889#2402894#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10941;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10943# rigs kyi bu de ltar yan lag bcu gcig po de dag gis sa rnams ma lus par bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa  spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa / /
column10: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239774#239775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3312# bam po drug cu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column11: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219443#219451#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_693;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_694# don rnam pa 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni bla na med pa zhes  bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu bdun pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222862#222866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1163;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1164# mdo sde dang bstan bcos  rnams las dbang po'i rjes su rnam pa sna tshogs mi mthun par bstan pa yin la 'gal ba med do //// / +bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column13: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225838#225843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1526;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1527;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1528# pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan  bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu dgu pa / /
column14: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228538#228542#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1865# bam po drug cu pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219872#219872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244097#244097#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3856# bskal pa dpag tu med pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs  so ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column17: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237243#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224732#224732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1407# brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur bas zhib tu ma  bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column19: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231593#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: ngu 'bod chen po ni gang na de 'dra ba'i shas che ba'i phyir ngu 'bod chen po'o // / +tsha ba ni me lce mang pos bskor te lus kun du gdungs pa'i phyir tsha ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216366#216381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_289# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: rab tu tsha ba ni lus chen por mngon par grub la sdug bsngal chen pos lus dang sems kun du gdung ba chen po myong bas  rab tu tsha ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358810#2358811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5587;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5588# bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang las rtogs shing gang las thob par 'tshal bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gsum pa rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i sa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359885#2359886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5699;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5700;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5701# btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad bcu gcig pa zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382135#2382136#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8517;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8518;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8519# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems  dpa' rnams zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du gyur pa na sems rnam par gyeng bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhig khong du chud bar bgyi 'tshal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396253#2396254#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10116;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10117;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10118# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bka' bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216379#216400#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_289;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_290;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_291;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_292# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa du dag gis rnam par gzhag lags zhes bya ba 'di man  chad ni bzhi pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219476#219484#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_696;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_698# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba ni srid par skye ba rnams kyi nang na rab mchog ces bgyi lags zhes  bya ba 'di man chad lnga pa skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rab tu dbye ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231618#231620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256136#256139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5229# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni so  sor thar pa rnam pa du ma dag gis bsdus pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis ba zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2336697#2336697#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3020;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3021# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240694#240694#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column14: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398352#2398354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10369;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370# ji ltar yan lag rnam pa bcu gcig gis sa rnams bsdus par  'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa yan lag bcu gcig sdud par ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column15: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338312#2338312#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3192;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3193# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de bzhin  gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380395#2380396#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8307;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8308# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong 'di dag gis ting  nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa du zhig sdud par bgyid lags ces pa 'di man chad ni bcu gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i sgo zhes bya bar ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343461#2343461#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3789;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3790;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3791# na byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i dngos po bzhi po de dag la brten nas zhi gnas yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su tshol ba  rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column18: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345591#2345591#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4031;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4032# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi'am tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong  gi lam gnyis gcig pa dang tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354544#2354544#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5083;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5085;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5086# gzhan yang 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas ngang lhags thong zhes kyang gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston     // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column20: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393884#2393884#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9841;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9842;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9843# ni bco brgyad pa lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su tshor ba 'gag par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column22: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385111#2385111#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column23: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391886#2391886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9598# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column24: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380777#2380777#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column25: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388446#2388446#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column26: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222898#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226466#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column28: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239247#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /

column21: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397394#2397394#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10240;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10241# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa smos pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du zhes bya ba man chad zhu ba gsol ba nyid kyi bstan pa smos pa dang  gang gsungs pa'i sa de dag ces bya ba man chad zhu ba gsol ba nyid kyi tshig bstan pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba  'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ming ste / /

column5: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338352#2338354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3197# don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /

column13: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245327#245327#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4007# phung po lnga dang  nang gi skye mched drug dang  phyi rol gyi skye mched drug dang  de dag la sogs pa gang dag bstan pa ni theg pa chen por chos de dag chos kyi  dbyings gcig par mtshungs shing tshul gcig par mtshungs pa'i phyir nga ni theg pa tha dad pa nyid du mi smra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to // /
column14: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345639#2345641#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /

column17: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359246#2359247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5640# rigs kyi bu ji ltar bzung zhing rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma dag la rags shing gsal bar myong ba dang  so sor rtog pa dang bcas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i  ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353612#2353612#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4973# rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngar yongs su bzung ba dang   bsams pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma'i don dag la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos la gnas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /
column19: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388514#2388514#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /
column20: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391916#2391916#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9601;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9602# byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba ji snyed yod pa dag rab tu 'dren par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa     // / +ston to // /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392059#2392059#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9621# yang dag  pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rnam pa bcu drug gi skye ba rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi skye ba la mkhas pa zhes bya'o zhes pa la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column24: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231657#231657#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2248# rigs kyi bu nga ni nams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams gong du bstan pa bzhi mtshan nyid lnga po ma gtogs par rnam par dag pa gzhan yod par mi smra mod kyi  zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: 'di ltar de na phyogs bcu nas me lce byung ste / / +sems can gyi lus la rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bar zhing shi bar  mi 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216467#216474#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_300# lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang  sems rnam par dag pa dang  snying rje rnam par dag pa dang  pha rol tu  phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang  sangs rgyas mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa rnam par dag pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnam par dag pa dang  skye ba rnam par dag pa dang  mthu rnam par dag pas so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224286#224291#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226167#226170#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229706#229707#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261137#261139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /
column10: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406838#2406840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11322# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column11: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252121#252123#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4744# bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
column12: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226530#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241018#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399693#2399695#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10536;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10537# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column17: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269880#269880#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7043# gzhan yang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221250#221251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_904# bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed  pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column21: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403223#2403224#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /

column25: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221517#221518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224978#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225807#225807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1525# mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column28: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column29: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247354#247355#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4247;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4248# 'phags pa  bla na med pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mdo las / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column30: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391026#2391027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column31: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222225#222225#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /

column3: yi dags ni skom pa dang ldan pas yi dags te kha cig ni mthu  che 'o // / +kha cig ni mthu chung ngo // /

column3: 'dzam bu'i gling ni sog kha ste byang phyogs kha tshon che'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216513#216520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_302;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_303# de la lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni sngar  gong du lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de'i ngos ring po gsum gyi ngos re re la ni dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216521#216533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_302;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_303;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_304# de la lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni sngar  gong du lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +sems rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad la spyir sems rnam par dag pa zhes bstan pa ste / /

column3: ngos thung ngu la ni dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi yod do // / +de bas na bye brag tu bshad pa las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216534#216544#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_304;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_305;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_306# de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gsung rab rnams las spyir sems rnam  par dag pa zhes bstan pa yin no // /

column3: rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan  pas nyi ma gcig gcig gis ngos gcig tu 'gro ba yod dam zhes dris pa de la de'i tshad kyis lan btab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216542#216566#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_305;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_306;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_307;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_308# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni bsam gtan bzhi la sems rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar bstan to // /

column3: shar gyi lus 'phags ni zla ba kham pa 'dra'o // / +nub kyi ba lang spyod ni zla ba nya ba dang 'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216560#216568#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_306;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_307;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_308;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_309# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni dang po kho nar 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang dag pa nyid du skyon med pa la 'jug    pa'i phyir lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +snying rje rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi las snying rje tshad med pa'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216692#216692#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_333;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_334# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las snying rje dang  snying rje chen po la bye brag ci yod ce na / / +smras pa / /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan ni rdzing bu 'dra'o // / +de la gling gi dbyibs ci 'dra bar mi rnams  kyi bzhin gyi dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216569#216580#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_308;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_309;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_310# snying rje dang snying rje chen po la bye brag ci yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las rgyu rnam pa  brgyad kyis tha dad do zhes bshad do // /

column3: de la 'dzam bu'i gling na ni tshe la nges pa med de dpag tu med pa nas lo bcu la thug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216578#216590#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_310;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_312;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_313# thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las rgyu rnam pa  brgyad kyis tha dad do zhes bshad do // /

column3: shar gyi lus 'phags na ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu'o // / +nub kyi ba lang sbyong na ni lnga brgya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216588#216600#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_312;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_313;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_314;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_315# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / / +dang po ni rang bzhin gyis gti mug med pa ste / / +phyin ci log gi rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang gi sgra mi snyan na ni lo stong ste / / +bar ma  dor 'chi ba med do // / +gzhan na ni bar ma dor 'chi ba yod do zhes bshad pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216599#216609#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_314;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_315;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_316;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_318# gnyis pa ni rnam pa ste / / +sdug bsngal gsum dang  sdug bsngal gcig gi rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de dag kyang nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med do // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216610#216617#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_318;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_319;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_320# khams gsum dang  khams gcig gis dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +bzhi pa ni sa las brtsams pa ste / /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris zhes bya ba ni de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas su skyes pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris    so ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216618#216633#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_319;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_320;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_321;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_322;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_323;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_324# bsam gtan bzhi pa ni kun tu gtogs pa yin la / / +gzhan ni tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +lnga pa ni lus las brtsams pa ste / /

column3: yang na rgyal chen bzhi pa ste rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag de dag gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216634#216643#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_323;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_324;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_325;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_326# lus gzhan dag ni tha DAD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +drug pa ni mngon du thob pa ste / /

column3: sum cu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba ni nya ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa brgya byin yod pas sum cu rtsa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216644#216661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_325;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_326;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_327;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_328;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_329;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_330# srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'dod chags dang bral ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +bdun pa ni skyob pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa ste / /

column3: 'thab bral zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin dang   'thab pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das te med pa'i phyir 'thab bral lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216662#216671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_329;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_330;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_331# mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba'i bye brag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos yang dag par rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa las rnam grangs rnam pa lngas bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // /

column3: dga' ldan zhes bya ba ni dga' ba thob pa dang ldan par gnas pas dga' ldan no // / +'phrul dga' zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dag rang gis sprul te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216672#216684#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_330;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_331;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_332# bstan bcos yang dag par rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa las rnam grangs rnam pa lngas bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: spyod pas 'phrul dga'o // / +gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ces bya  ba ni gzhan gyis sprul pa'i 'dod pa rnams la dbang byed cing dbang sgyur bas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216682#216702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_332;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_333;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_334;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_335;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_336# mdo  sde pa'i bstan bcos de kho na nyid las ni don rnam pa bdun gyis ston to // /

column3: de la grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba ma smos pa ni tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba dag gi phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216701#216720#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_335;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_336;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_337;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_338;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_339# snying rje ni snying brtse ba kho na yin la / / +snying rje chen po ni bya ba'i dngos po bsgrub par nus pa'i phyir snying rje chen  po zhes bya'o // /

column3: tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba la shas che ba bcu drug  ste ; / +me ma mur dang  rtug sa dang  sbu gri'i sos gang ba'i lam po che dang  ral gri'i so'i lo ma can gyi nags tshal dang lcags kyi shal ma ri'i nags tshal rnams ni spyir na mtshon char 'dra bas gcig tu bsdus pa dang  chu klung rgal dka' ba sta rdzas su ni bzhi sgo'i bye brag gis ni bcu  drug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216720#216731#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_339;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_340;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_341# sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyis brtson par byed pa dang  gzhan yang bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas bsgoms pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216732#216741#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_339;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_340;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_341# sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyis brtson par byed pa dang  gzhan yang bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas bsgoms pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes     // / +bya'o // / +gzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na gdon mi za bar yongs su bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216742#216749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_342;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_343# gzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na gdon mi za bar yongs su bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#36870#36870#TD4036E.TXT.r_5545# dge ba'i chos chen po ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa dang   skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang mi brjod pa dang  bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa yin no // /
column8: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2904521#2904522#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5120# bzod pa la gnas pa rnams ni grang ba dang tsha ba byung yang dge ba byed pa mi gtong bas brtson 'grus  grub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun no // /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399427#2399427#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10496# sgrib pa gsum po dag spang pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column10: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2149233#2149233#TD4029E.TXT.r_3747# rang dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang  bla na med  pa'i byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column11: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#210907#210907#TD4035E.TXT.r_14752# des rnam pa lnga po 'di dag lta bur rnam par byad ba  bsgrub dka' bar yang dag par mthong nas yid skyo ba skye zhing yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan por rtsom par byed do // /
column12: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#36837#36837#TD4036E.TXT.r_5542;TD4036E.TXT.r_5543# de la 'bad par byed ces bya ba ni skyes par rnams gnas pa dang  mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +brtson 'grus rtsom par byed ces bya  ba ni bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#37325#37326#TD4036E.TXT.r_5605# 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dmigs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang mthun  pa nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa chung du dang  'bring dang  chen po dang mthun pa ma skyes pa mi skyed pa dang  skyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa'i tshe / /
column14: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693432#693432#TD4083E.TXT.r_1098;TD4083E.TXT.r_1099# brtson par byed pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug pa'o // / +brtson pa ni goms pa'o // /

column3: gnod pa lhag par che ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir shas che ba zhes bya'o // / +gling de dag gi gling phran la gyag rnga dang gyag rnga gzhan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'khor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216750#216757#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_342;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_343;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_344;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_345# gzhan yang phan 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir snying rje CHEN PO ZHES BYA'O // / +thogs  pa med pa'i phyir yang snying rje CHEN PO ZHES BYA'O // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216758#216767#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_343;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_345;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_344;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_346# thogs  pa med pa'i phyir yang snying rje CHEN PO ZHES BYA'O // / +snying rje'i sems ni gzhan gyi nyes pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir thogs pa skye bar 'gyur la / /

column3: lus dang lus 'phags ni shar gyi lus 'phags kyi 'khor to // / +gyo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro ni nub gyi ba  lang spyod kyi 'khor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216768#216782#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_346;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_347;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_348# snying rje chen po ni shin tu nyes pa chen po byas pa dag la yang thogs pa med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pas so // /

column3: sgra ngan dang sgra ngan can ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi 'khor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216783#216790#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_348;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_349# 'di ni thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang bdag nyid la phan pa spangs nas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa yongs su gnyer bar byed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o // /

column3: gyag rnga dang gyag rnga gzhan de gcig na srin po dag gnas so // /

column3: de la ri rab ni rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin te / / +gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya dang shel gyi rang bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216799#216811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_349;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_350;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_351# gzhan yang bdag nyid la phan pa spangs nas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa yongs su gnyer bar byed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o // / +snying rje ni de lta bu ma yin pas 'di ni  bye brag go zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216922#216924#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_367# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las  kyang don rnam pa drug gis de nyid kyi bye brag ston pa yang / / +bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las bstan pa dang mi mthun te / /

column3: ngos gang rin po che  gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de'i nam mkha' yang de'i rnam par snang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216812#216822#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_352;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_353;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_354# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las ni don rnam pa drug gis snying rje'i bye brag ston te / /

column3: de ni rim pas mtho ste / / +gru bzhi lham pa ni ma yin no // / +de skad bshad pa'i 'thad pa ni 'dul ba'i gzhung las 'byung ste / /
