column3: nye sbyor gyis zhus pa las btsun pa mchod rten ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216834#216843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_356;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_357;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_359# snying rje drug ni de ltar bzlog // / +ces 'byung ste / / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / /

column3: ri rab kyi tshul     // / +du bya'o zhes bka' stsal to // / +de'i 'khor ri bo bdun te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216844#216851#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_360# snying rje chen po ma yin pa rnam par drug gi bye brag las bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po drug gi bye brag yin pas 'di lta ste / /

column3: gnya' shing 'dzin dang  gshol mda' 'dzin dang  seng ldeng can dang  lta na sdug dang  rta rna dang  rnam par 'dud dang  mu khyud 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216852#216862#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_360;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_361# snying rje chen po ma yin pa rnam par drug gi bye brag las bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po drug gi bye brag yin pas 'di lta ste / / +mnyam pa nyid dang rtag par rgyun du byed pa dang  shin tu zab pa dang  rjes su  mthun pa dang  lam rnam par dag pa dang  mi dmigs pa'o // /

column3: de dag ni gser gyi ri ste phyed phyed kyis dma' bar rig par bya'o // / +de la  'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang lus che ba de'i lus kyi tshad ni khru bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216863#216876#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_362# de la mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba la sogs pa sems can gyi tshor ba ji snyed yod pa de dag ni sdug bsngal BAR RIG PAR BYA'O // /

column3: shing nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o // / +shar gyi lus 'phags po dag ni de las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216875#216887#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_364# rtag par rgyun du zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar  du yang zad pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: nub kyi ba lang spyod pa dag kyang de las nyis 'gyur ro // / +byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dag kyang de las nyis  'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216888#216895#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_366# shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba ni sa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag dang gzhan la mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +rjes su mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ni / / +sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las ci rigs par rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni khru lnga brgya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216896#216903#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_367# sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las ci rigs par rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir ro // / +lam rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: khru'i tshul gyis lo grangs kyang rig par bya ste / / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni mi'i lo lnga bcu la zhag tu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya thub po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216904#216913#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_368# lam rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro // / +mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa na chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517308#517311#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8749;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8750# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang gis de rab tu sel ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang zhing dmigs pa la yang dag par gnas pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405515#2405517#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11195;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11196# so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su grub pas phyogs bcu kun du legs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267590#267591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6753# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las spyi dang bye brag gi sgo ni sngar tshig gcig mdor bstan nas tshig phyi ma gzhan gyis rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404550#2404551#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11106;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11107# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa dang mthun bar byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mngon du gyur pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243978#243978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842# brgya rtsa gsum pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526930#526930#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10098# 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba rnams  dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang sbyar na ni drug tu gzhag pa yang dag pa'i don yin par ston te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403941#2403941#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11057# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang byang chub kyi phyogs  kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas pas nyon mongs pa'i shing bsregs nas shes rab kyi 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518805#518805#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8958;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8959# choms par dka' ba'i phyir ni stobs zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216811#216811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_351# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las ni don rnam pa drug gis snying rje'i bye brag ston te / /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365394#2365394#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6407;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6408# ma ta phrag bcu la au snu ta zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab  kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /

column3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni khru stong ngo // / +tshe'i tshad ni  mi'i lo brgya la zhag gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong thub bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216922#216937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_371# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las  kyang don rnam pa drug gis de nyid kyi bye brag ston pa yang / / +bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las bstan pa dang mi mthun te / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216811#216811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_351# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las ni don rnam pa drug gis snying rje'i bye brag ston te / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383834#2383834#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8704;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8705# rgya cher  de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232628#232628#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2374# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389042#2389042#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9264# rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de bzhin du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis zhag gcig tu brtsis te tshe'i tshad ni lo drug stong gi bar du sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216938#216949#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_371# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni  rkyen rnam pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po nyid du yongs su grub par ston gyi bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa med do // /

column3: lus kyi tshad brjod par bya ste / / +lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so // / +'di dag ni 'dod pa'i  khams kyi gnas nyi shu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216950#216968#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni  rkyen rnam pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po nyid du yongs su grub par ston gyi bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa med do // /

column3: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed nas mnar med pa la thug gi bar du snod dang bcas pa smos pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la thug gi bar du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216968#216984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374# bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las kyang rgyu rnam pa bzhis snying rje chen po nyid du bsgrubs pas rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa la bstan pa dang mi  mthun te / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // /

column3: 'dod pa'i khams bshad zin to // / +'di yan chad gnas bcu bdun ni gzugs kyi khams te / /
ji lta bu zhe na / / +smras pa / / +de la bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang gsum pa ni so sor sa gsum gsum pa dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216985#216994#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#495540#495540#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6107# de las gzhan pa slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams so zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: bzhi pa ni sa brgyad pa'o // / +de la tshangs ris zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i ris na yod pas tshangs ris so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216995#217004#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_376# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367864#2367866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6753# de la yang bcos ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde la ni tshig 'bru rgyas pa yin la don bsdus pa yin pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la ni don rgyas pa yin la tshig 'bru bsdus pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin bar rig par bya'o zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column7: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222417#222419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270688#270689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380259#2380259#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8292# gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: gzhan ni tshangs 'khor te / / +tshangs pa'i yongs su spyod pa byed ces bya ba'i  tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217005#217012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_377# gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i byams pa dang thugs rje gang yin pa de ni chen po zhes bya'o // /

column3: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir tshangs chen no // / +'di ni chen po yang yin la tshangs pa yang yin pas tshangs chen no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217013#217025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_380# gzhan  gyi sems kyi rgyud la yod pa gang yin pa de ni chung ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: de'i che ba nyid ni bsam gtan khyad par can thob pa dang  sngar skyes la phyis 'chi 'pho ba dang  mthu'i khyad par la sogs    pas kyang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217024#217038#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_381;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_382# gal te de lta na ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa dang snying rje chen po la spyod ces bstan ce na / / +smras pa / /

column3: de nyid kyi ris bshad pa de dag gi gnas kyang yin pas tshangs ris rnams so // / +ris zhes bya ba ni 'dir gnas nyid du 'dod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217039#217050#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_381;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_384# theg pa gnyis la ltos na ni chen po zhes bya ste / / +'di ni btags pa'i snying rje chen po'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa dang  thugs rje chen po gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa mchog tu che ba yin pas so // /

column3: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dug ces bya ba ni tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas pas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dug pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217051#217060#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_384;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_387# de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa dang  thugs rje chen po gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa mchog tu che ba yin pas so // / +de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni / / +pha rol tu     // /

column3: bsam gtan khyad par can  las langs pa na de nyid kyi mdun na 'dug pa'o // / +yang na tshangs pa chen po lnga la de'i 'og tu smos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217061#217074#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_389# phyin pa drug dang bcu la sogs pa ste / / +'og nas bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'od chung zhes bya ba ni sa gong ma dag la ltos na de dag gi 'od chung bas 'od chung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217073#217083#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_389# de la sangs rgyas mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo'i 'grel pa las / / +ma lus pa gsum po sangs rgyas mthong ba lus pa  med pa dang  mchod pa la lus pa med pa dang  rim gro bya ba lus pa med pa dang  sa ji skad bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: tshad med 'od ces bya ba ni de dag gi 'od tshad gzung bar mi nus pas tshad med  'od do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217082#217092#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_389;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_391# ma lus pa gsum po sangs rgyas mthong ba lus pa  med pa dang  mchod pa la lus pa med pa dang  rim gro bya ba lus pa med pa dang  sa ji skad bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: 'od gsal zhes bya ba ni gnas ma lus par snang ba'i phyir 'od gsal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217093#217101#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_391;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_392# de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las / / +byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po ma lus pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: dge chung zhes bya ba ni yid kyi sa pa'i dge ba la bde ba zhes bya ba ste / / +de dag gi des gong ma la ltos na chung bas dge chung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217100#217114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_392;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_394# sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba ma lus pa dang mchod  pa thams cad ma lus pa dang  rim gro bya ba thams cad ma lus pa'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4006E.TXT.r#1084668#1084669#TD4006E.TXT.r_29;TD4006E.TXT.r_30# de ni sku gsum ste / / +chos kyi sku dang  longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang  sprul pa'i sku'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272481#272481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7369# kha cig na re lan du gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa ni chos kyi sku dang  longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sprul pa'i sku de la ltos na chos kyi sku'i dbang dang  longs spyod  rdzogs pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis yin gyi / /

column3: tshad med dge zhes bya ba ni de dag gi dge ba tshad med pas tshad med  dge'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217113#217128#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_397# sprul pa'i sku dang  longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang  chos kyi sku'i sangs rgyas mthong ba gang yin pa'o // /

column3: dge rgyas zhes bya ba ni de dag gi dge ba rgyas pas dge rgyas te / / +de bas gzhan bde ba mchog tu gyur pa med do zhes bya bar dgongs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217129#217136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_400# bkur sti'i mchod pa ni spos dang  me tog dang  rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'o // / +sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni dad pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'o // /

column3: sprin med ces bya ba ni de dag gi gong nas gzhan gyis chod pa med pas sprin med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217134#217145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_400# sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni dad pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'o // / +rim gro bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: sa gong ma gong ma dang 'brel pa'i ni sprin lta bu zhes zer te / / +de  nas de dang 'brel pa'i bar med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217146#217156#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_400;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_402# yang dag par  tshol ba'i rim gro bya ba dang  bsu bskyal gyi rim gro bya ba dang  sgrub pa'i rim gro bya ba'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +yang na sangs rgyas mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni mchod pa rnam pa bcu la bya ste / /

column3: bsod nams 'phel ba zhes bya ba ni de dag las so so'i bsod nams bye brag can gyis 'gro ba'i gnas yod pas bsod nams 'phel te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217157#217176#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_405# yang na sangs rgyas mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa rnam par dag PA ZHES BYA BA NI mchod pa rnam pa bcu la bya ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353052#1353063#TD4037E.TXT.r_4967;TD4037E.TXT.r_4968;TD4037E.TXT.r_4969# de la byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de  bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa gang zhe na / /

column3: de dag la bsod nams 'phel bas kun 'byung ba bzhin no // / +'bras bu che zhes bya ba ni de dag gi 'bras bu  gnas gzhan dang 'brel pa'i so so'i skye bo thams cad pas mchog tu gyur pa 'byung bas 'bras bu che'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217174#217187#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_405# sku la mchod pa dang  mchod rten la mchod pa dang  mngon sum du mchod pa dang  mngon sum ma yin par mchod pa dang  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa  dang  gzhan byed du bcug pa'i mchod pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bkur sti'i mchod pa dang  rgya chen po'i mchod pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mchod pa dang  sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217188#217195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_406# sku la mchod pa dang  mchod rten la mchod pa dang  mngon sum du mchod pa dang  mngon sum ma yin par mchod pa dang  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa  dang  gzhan byed du bcug pa'i mchod pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bkur sti'i mchod pa dang  rgya chen po'i mchod pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mchod pa dang  sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353062#1353076#TD4037E.TXT.r_4969;TD4037E.TXT.r_4970# sku la mchod pa dang  mchod rten la mchod pa dang  mngon sum du mchod pa dang  mngon sum ma yin par mchod pa dang  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa dang  gzhan byed du 'jug pa'i mchod  pa dang ; /
column7: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2896039#2896039#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3944;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3945# dngos po chen pos mchod pa ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis mchod pa bstan to // / +gus pas  mchod pa ni grub pas mchod pa bstan to // /
column8: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353703#1353703#TD4037E.TXT.r_5038# byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs pa can  ma yin par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217471#217475#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_443# snyom las dang bag med pa'i gnas la brten te bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams byed du  mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /

column3: gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba ni lam gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i dri ma bkrus pa'i phyir rgyud dag pa rnams gnas pas gnas gtsang ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217194#217218#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_411# de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku nyid la mngon sum du    mchod pa de ni de'i sku la mchod pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217359#217364#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_431# de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir byang chub sems  dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am / / +mchod rten nam / / +gtsang khang phyur bu'am / /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353088#1353102#TD4037E.TXT.r_4971;TD4037E.TXT.r_4972;TD4037E.TXT.r_4973;TD4037E.TXT.r_4974;TD4037E.TXT.r_4975;TD4037E.TXT.r_4976# de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku nyid la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de'i sku la mchod pa    zhes bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir mchod rten nam / /
column7: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353248#1353259#TD4037E.TXT.r_4994;TD4037E.TXT.r_4995;TD4037E.TXT.r_4996;TD4037E.TXT.r_4997;TD4037E.TXT.r_4998;TD4037E.TXT.r_4999# de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am / / +mchod rten nam / /

column3: yang na de dag gi 'khor ba na gnas pa dag pas bu  lon 'khor ba bzhin no // /
yang na dag pa she dag gnas pas gnas gtsang ma ste / / +de na so so'i skye bo med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217219#217227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_413# mchod rten gsar pa la mchod pa byed pa de ni de'i mchod rten la mchod  pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: mi che ba zhes bya ba ni gnas gtsang ma bas mchog tu ma gyur ba'i phyir mi che bas mi che ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217228#217245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_416# de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon du gyur ba dang  dbang po la snang bar mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa ni mngon sum du mchod pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: yang na gzugs med par 'jug pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir mi 'dod     // / +pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217442#217449#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_440# mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i spyi'i mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu ni de bas kyang rgya che bar blta bar bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la  mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid kyi rang gi lag gis byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217474#217476#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_443# snyom las dang bag med pa'i gnas la brten te bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams byed du  mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed    du 'jug pa dang bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams nas mu stegs can rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bar dag de la de bzhin gshegs  pa'am / /
column6: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217592#217592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_454# thun mong gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shin tu che ste gong na med par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /

column3: mi gdung ba zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dge ba'i phyir 'og mar skyes pa rnams kyi mthu'i khyad par dag gis zil gyis mi non pas mi gdung ba'o // /

column3: yang na bsam gtan mchog gi 'bras bu'i tshe ma thob kyang gdung ba med pas mi gdung ba'o // /

column3: gya nom snang zhes bya ba ni  rab tu zhi ba'i khyad par dang ldan te bde bar snang bas gya nom snang ngo // /

column3: shin tu mthong zhes bya ba ni spel mar bsgom pa la sgrib pa'i lhag ma cung zad cig las su zad de / /

column3: de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong bas shin tu mthong ngo // / +'og min zhes bya ba ni de dag gi gong na rang gi  khams las mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas gzhan med pas 'og min no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217289#217299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_423# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mngon sum du gyur pa 'di la yang mchod pa bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217299#217309#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_423# de ma yin pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams  mtha' yas mu med pa dag na mchod rten dang  gtsang khang phyur bu dang  gtsang khang dang  mchod rten rnying pa dang  mchod rten gsar pa bzhugs pa thams cad la yang mchod pa bya'o snyam pa de ni re zhig byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa dang  de bzhin gshegs  pa'i mchod rten la mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i spyi'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: gnas  bcu bdun po de na gnas pa'i sems can dang bcas pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams so // /
gzhan dag ni bsam gtan dang po la ni gnyis / / +bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can lhag par byas te gnas bcu bdun po gzhan du smra'o // /

column3: gcig pu ni ris su mi rung ngo // / +tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi sems can rnams dang de skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir gnas tha dad pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217363#217375#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_433# gtsang khang phyur bu'am / / +gtsang khang gcig gam / /

column3: 'du shes med pa'i sems can  rnams kyang 'bras bu che ba dag dang tshe la sogs pa khyad par med pas de'i rgyu'i khyad par med pa'i phyir de dag bzhi pa'i gsum pa las gnas gzhan du mi 'thad pas gzugs kyi khams ni rnam pa bcu drug go zhes kha che ba'i bye brag tu smra ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217374#217385#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_433# mang po nas bye ba 'bum gyi bar du ci nus ci lcogs kyis byed du 'jug pa de yang byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum ma yin pa'i  mchod pa rgya chen po bsod nams tshad med pa'i 'bras bu can tshangs pa du ma'i bsod nams kyis yongs su zin pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217386#217398#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_435# mang po nas bye ba 'bum gyi bar du ci nus ci lcogs kyis byed du 'jug pa de yang byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum ma yin pa'i  mchod pa rgya chen po bsod nams tshad med pa'i 'bras bu can tshangs pa du ma'i bsod nams kyis yongs su zin pa yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353271#1353281#TD4037E.TXT.r_4999# mang po nas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du ci nus ci lcogs kyis byed du 'jug pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum ma yin pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po bsod nams tshad med pa'i 'bras bu can tshangs pa du ma'i bsod  nams kyis yongs su zin pa yin te / /

column3: de bas na tshangs pa chen po yang 'du  shes med pa'i sems can bzhin dus gzhan med do zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217399#217408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_436# de byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa chen po bskal pa du ma yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la / / +gzhi des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi  tshogs kyang yongs su rdzogs par mi byed par mi 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353292#1353297#TD4037E.TXT.r_5000;TD4037E.TXT.r_5001# des byang chub sems dpa'i bskal pa chen po bskal pa du mar yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur la / / +gzhi de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang yongs su rdzogs par mi byed par mi 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#82162#82163#TD4095E.TXT.r_3796;TD4095E.TXT.r_3797# bslab    pa thams cad 'das na dri bar bya ba la bdag gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / / +brdzun du smra bar thal bar 'gyur bas de'i ji ltar 'das par byas kyang bdag nyid 'chags par 'gyur snyam nas brdzun du smra ba las ldog par bshad do // /
column7: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1212974#1212974#TD4047E.TXT.r_13068# sa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912163#912163#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2727;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2728# sems can gyi don byed pa rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskul nas don byed par 'gyur la / / +byang chub sems dpa' lhag par ngo tsha bar bya ba yin no    zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2203149#2203149#TD4046E.TXT.r_958;TD4046E.TXT.r_959# nyan thos kyang log par 'tsho ba'i sbyor bas nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur la / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni log par 'tsho bar sems bskyed ma thag tu nyes bar yongs su ma shes na nyes par 'gyur bar ston to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1176915#1176915#TD4047E.TXT.r_8052;TD4047E.TXT.r_8053# nyan thos kyang log par 'tsho ba'i sbyor bas nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur la / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni log par 'tsho ba'i sems skyes ma thag tu nyes par yongs su ma shes na nyes par 'gyur bar ston to // /
column11: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1340909#1340911#TD4037E.TXT.r_3399;TD4037E.TXT.r_3400# 'tsho ba rnams la gang gis de dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba yang dag par mnos so snyam du dgongs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //// / +de'i rjes la de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la dgongs par 'gyur te / /

column3: skye gnas rnam pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams 'dren par gyur te 'byung ba thun mong du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353307#1353319#TD4037E.TXT.r_5002;TD4037E.TXT.r_5003;TD4037E.TXT.r_5004# de la byang  chub sems dpa' de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten kho na la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni re zhig bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rgya che bar blta bar bya'o // /

column3: de la skye gnas mngal nas skye ba ni mi dang  ba lang dang  rta dang  rnga mo rnams phal cher ro // /

column3: mi    rnams kyi nang na sgo nga las skyes pa yang yod de / / +dper na dud 'gro dag gi nang nas khrung khrung mo las byung ba / /

column5: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136991#1136991#TD4047E.TXT.r_2265# bsod nams dang ye shes bstan pas bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi 'bras bu  yang bstan par nus pas / /

column3: ri dang  nya ri lta bu dang  lnga len gyi rgyal po'i bu lnga brgya lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217592#217594#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_455# thun mong gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shin tu che ste gong na med par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /

column3: drod gsher las skye ba ni nga las nu la sogs pa'o // / +rdzus te byung ba ni bskal pa dang po pa rnams so // / +klu  rnams la yang skye ba rnam pa bzhi yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217450#217461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_441# de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la  mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid kyi rang gi lag gis byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353351#1353354#TD4037E.TXT.r_5008;TD4037E.TXT.r_5009# le lo dang snyom las dang  bag med pa'i gnas la brten te / / +bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams byed du mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217490#217491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_443# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed    du 'jug pa dang bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams nas mu stegs can rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bar dag de la de bzhin gshegs  pa'am / /

column3: 'jig rten gdags pa las ji skad du / / +sgo nga las skyes pa'i nam mkha' lding gis sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu bza' ba'i phyir 'byin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353353#1353362#TD4037E.TXT.r_5008;TD4037E.TXT.r_5009# le lo dang snyom las dang  bag med pa'i gnas la brten te / / +bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams byed du mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217591#217592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_454# thun mong gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shin tu che ste gong na med par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /
column6: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217489#217491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_443# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed    du 'jug pa dang bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams nas mu stegs can rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bar dag de la de bzhin gshegs  pa'am / /
column7: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353383#1353384#TD4037E.TXT.r_5012# bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed du 'jug pa dang  bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang    bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang  gzhan rgyal po rnams dang  blon po chen po rnams dang  bram ze rnams dang  khyim bdag rnams dang  grong rdal pa rnams dang   yul gyi mi rnams dang  phyug po rnams dang  tshong dpon rnams dang  ded dpon rnams dang  tha na skyes pa dang  bud med dang  khye'u dang  bu mo rnams dang  bkren pa rnams dang  sdug bsngal ba rnams dang  rigs ngan yan chad kyang byed du 'jug pa dang  de bzhin du mkhan po  dang ; /
column8: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355291#1355291#TD4037E.TXT.r_5237# 'khor bar 'khor ba na lus ma nges pas rgyal por gyur pa las mi dbul por  gyur pa dang  pha ma ma nges pa dang  bu dang chung ma ma nges pa dang  bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba ma nges pa dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams ma nges pa las byung ba de 'khor bar 'khor ba na / /
column9: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2744387#2744387#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6162# tha na pha ma dang bu dang chung ma dang bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  rgan rabs dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi yo byad la 'dod pa'i  rnam pa skyed par byed na yang brnab sems yin par brjod par bya'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217190#217190#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_406# sku la mchod pa dang  mchod rten la mchod pa dang  mngon sum du mchod pa dang  mngon sum ma yin par mchod pa dang  bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa  dang  gzhan byed du bcug pa'i mchod pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bkur sti'i mchod pa dang  rgya chen po'i mchod pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mchod pa dang  sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku nyid la mngon sum du    mchod pa de ni de'i sku la mchod pa zhes bya'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319645#1319646#TD4037E.TXT.r_528;TD4037E.TXT.r_529;TD4037E.TXT.r_530# de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag la ma gtogs par de ma yin par de las bzlog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi don thams cad ni gzhan gyi don dang 'brel pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig  yin pas / / +byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes par byas nas spang bar bya ba ni 'di yin te / /

column3: de bzhin du rdzus te 'byung ba'i nam mkha' lding gis rdzus te byung ba'i klu 'byin ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa  lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217474#217488#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_443# snyom las dang bag med pa'i gnas la brten te bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams byed du  mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed    du 'jug pa dang bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams nas mu stegs can rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bar dag de la de bzhin gshegs  pa'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353369#1353372#TD4037E.TXT.r_5010;TD4037E.TXT.r_5011;TD4037E.TXT.r_5012# de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas / /

column3: mi shes pa'i phyir 'byin gyi bzar ni med do // / +yi dags rnams ni mngal nas skyes pa dang rdzus te byung ba dag ste / /

column5: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353440#1353443#TD4037E.TXT.r_5015# byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa bya ba'i sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po chung ngu yod la snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can sdug bsngal ba bsod nams chung zhing mi nus pa 'di dag gis de bzhin  gshegs pa'am / /

column3: 'o na ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbang bcu brnyes pa mngal nas skyes pa'i skye gnas la brten ce na / /

column3: sh'akya'i rigs chen po gnyen gyi 'brel pas chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217533#217551#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_449# snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can sdug bsngal ba bsod nams chung zhing mi nus pa 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bya ba byas nas bde bar 'gyur ro snyam nas dngos po dang bsams bzhin du gzhan dag kho na la sbyin  par byed la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353456#1353463#TD4037E.TXT.r_5015;TD4037E.TXT.r_5016;TD4037E.TXT.r_5017# byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa bya ba'i sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po chung ngu yod la snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can sdug bsngal ba bsod nams chung zhing mi nus pa 'di dag gis de bzhin  gshegs pa'am / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bya ba byas na bde bar 'gyur ro snyam nas / /

column3: mir gyur kyang phun sum tshogs pa thob po  zhes gdul ba spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353469#1353471#TD4037E.TXT.r_5017;TD4037E.TXT.r_5018;TD4037E.TXT.r_5019# dngos po de bsams bzhin du gzhan dag kho na la sbyin par byed la / / +gzhan dag gis kyang dngos po des de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /

column3: sa ni bcu gcig ste zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ston to // / +'dod pa'i khams ni sa bon thams cad yin pa'i phyir sa zhes bya bar bshad de / /

column3: dbang po sbyangs pa la sogs pa yon tan rnams de dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro // / +mi lcogs  pa med pa zhes bya ba la 'ong bar bya ba ni 'ong bar bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217563#217576#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_452# byang chub sems dpa' ni mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol 'ba' zhig gis byas pa'i mchod pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la  bdag 'ba' zhig gis byas pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu che ba yin no // /

column3: 'ong bar bya ba med pa ni 'ong bar bya ba med pa ste / / +skye bas thob par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
