column8: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242529#242535#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3642# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; / +'di ni zhu ba la gsol ba nyid do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242215#242216#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3604# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236165#236167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2850# yang na de bzhin gshegs pas  byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir / / +zhu ba 'di gsol ba yin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237280#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column12: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246094#246094#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4100# bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu 'di ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ste / /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245349#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa ni de dag nyid kyi bral ba'i rnyed pa nas bzung ste skye'o // / +de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa la yang kun 'byung ba la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa kun  'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba bcu gnyis kyi rnyed pa nas bzung ste 'gag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220360#220371#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_796# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / / +rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab par bya ba'i gzhi ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220372#220379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_796;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_797;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_798# rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab par bya ba'i gzhi ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di  yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220380#220388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_799# grangs smos nas lan du mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239933#239934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3330;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3331# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa  dang ; /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261651#261653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5979# mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin  gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396299#2396299#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397672#2397674#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10282# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382176#2382178#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8522;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8523# 'di yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te / / +grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216429#216431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_296;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_297# 'di yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te / / +grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming du bkod pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad sa rnams las brtsams nas khyad par du 'phags pa dang  khyad par du 'phags pa ma  yin pa rnam par 'byed pa ste / /
column13: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391938#2391940#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9605;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9606# dang po yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming  bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224803#224803#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1417# rigs kyi bu snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir te  zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column15: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371532#2371533#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7222# 'on kyang 'dir khyod la mdor bsdus te de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas  yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239923#239924#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3329# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247759#247759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4297# rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349136#2349136#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4392# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin  gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column19: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394300#2394300#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9888;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9889;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9890# gnas kyi gnas ngan len rig pa rnam par bshad pa dang  de'i 'bras bu yul rig pa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +grangs smos pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa  dang  gang go dka' ba bzlas te bshad pa ste / /
column20: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268193#268193#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6813# gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370165#2370165#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7055;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7056# bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column22: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338350#2338350#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3197# don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: kun 'byung ba la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa ni de dag gi bral ba'i rnyed pa nas bzung ste skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220389#220397#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_800# grangs smos nas lan du mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /

column6: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391952#2391952#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9606;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9607# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming  bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231050#231052#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2181# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  rnam par phye ste bstan pa dang  gzhan dag gis rgol ba'i rjes su bzlas te bstan pa ste / / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263937#263939#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6312;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6313# 'di yang mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / / +'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin du 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skyes na 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bdun  gyi rnyed pa nas bzung ste 'gag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220398#220411#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_800;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_801;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_802# 'di ltar bslab par bya ba'i gzhi ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 1.788#TD4010E.TXT.r#2240032#2240033#TD4010E.TXT.r_1164# ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir phrag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba'i sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang shes rab la brtan to // /
column6: 1.788#TD4010E.TXT.r#2240147#2240149#TD4010E.TXT.r_1173# 'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdom pa med pa mang po dag mang du thos pa mi 'dod pa de dag sgra tsam gyis sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab la sogs pa'i     // /
column7: 1.788#TD4010E.TXT.r#2267764#2267766#TD4010E.TXT.r_4867;TD4010E.TXT.r_4868# zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams goms pa mthar thug par gyur nas rdzu 'phrul gyis  mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa dang  rjes su mthun par chos bstan pas dbang du byas nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed do // /
column8: 1.788#TD4010E.TXT.r#2274223#2274225#TD4010E.TXT.r_5575;TD4010E.TXT.r_5576# ces bya ba la sogs pa la / / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang   shes rab la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod cing du ba'i sgras lha de dag gis go bar byas pa dang  lha yi cho de'i snying rje thos nas ni // /
column9: 0.010#TD4029E.TXT.r#2150832#2150834#TD4029E.TXT.r_3951# dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad bsdus te zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar sbyin pa dang   tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni dge ba'i chos kyi phyogs yin pas de bas na dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thams cad bsdus so // /
column10: 0.012#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692360#1692361#TD4048E.TXT.r_1205;TD4048E.TXT.r_1206# de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa ji ltar blta zhe na / / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang   bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang drug gis 'jug go // /
column11: 0.012#TD4010E.TXT.r#2252819#2252820#TD4010E.TXT.r_2853# 'thab pa dang  rtsod pa dang  mi mthun pa la yang sems kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsgos par gyur pas khro ba la  sogs pa dang bral nas sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba nyid du bzod pa rab tu gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i yan lag dbyangs kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bzod  pa'i stobs kyis rtag tu gnas par bgyi'o zhes dam bcas so // /
column12: 0.013#TD4010E.TXT.r#2248961#2248963#TD4010E.TXT.r_2295;TD4010E.TXT.r_2296# de mi gnas pa'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs la gnas nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te / / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa  dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.014#TD4010E.TXT.r#2250234#2250236#TD4010E.TXT.r_2492;TD4010E.TXT.r_2493# zhes bya ba la / / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab rnams bskal pa mi nyung bar goms par mdzad pa'i  sbyin pa re zhig gsungs pa / /
column14: 0.014#TD4010E.TXT.r#2274450#2274450#TD4010E.TXT.r_5601# spyin pa dang   tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab rab tu bsgoms pa'i sems kyi rgyud yin pa'i phyir / /
column15: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348445#1348447#TD4037E.TXT.r_4434# brtson 'grus gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed pa dang  brtson 'grus gang  shes rab kyi bar du yang dag par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed pa'o // /
column16: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1316828#1316830#TD4037E.TXT.r_86# sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags so // /
column17: 0.015#TD4010E.TXT.r#2257990#2257992#TD4010E.TXT.r_3540;TD4010E.TXT.r_3541# gal  te 'khor yongs su dag par gyur na sbyin pa dang / / +tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o // /
column18: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1316469#1316471#TD4037E.TXT.r_25;TD4037E.TXT.r_26# sbyin pa la yang sbyor bar byed / / +tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang sbyor bar byed do // /
column19: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1325444#1325445#TD4037E.TXT.r_1357# de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab ni chos rnams zhes bya ste / /
column20: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118952#3118953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3925;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3927;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3926# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drug ste / / +tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab po // /
column21: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3018005#3018007#TD4018E.TXT.r_1913;TD4018E.TXT.r_1914;TD4018E.TXT.r_1915# kun gyi steng du gnas pa'o // / +skyes pa'i rabs ni sbyin pa dang / / +tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab dang  thabs dang  smon lam dang  stobs dang  ye shes  kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par du mtha' med pa'o // /
column22: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2272941#2272941#TD4010E.TXT.r_5433;TD4010E.TXT.r_5434# de bzhin du gser gyi gzugs kyi dpe dang  s'a la'i  rgyal po'i dpe dang  brgya byin dang  tshangs pa dang  rab 'phrul dang  'thab bral gyi lha'i bu'i dpes 'jig rten ma lus pa zil gyis non pa'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa bstan to // / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang   shes rab kyi snang bas 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan nas snang bar byas pas nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i mdangs dang ldan par gnas so // /
column23: 0.020#TD4018E.TXT.r#3055303#3055303#TD4018E.TXT.r_6605# sa de    dag gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs sgrib pa yang sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab dang  thabs dang  stobs dang  smon lam dang ye shes rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'jungs pa dang  ngang  tshul ngan pa dang  mi bzod pa dang  le lo dang  gyeng ba dang  ma rig pa dang  thabs med pa dang  mi smon pa dang  mthu med pa dang  yongs su shes pa med pa dang  sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug  par ro // /
column24: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#687074#687075#TD4083E.TXT.r_351# gang yang sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab dang ldan pa 'di dag nyid dang  gzhan dag la tshe 'di dang phyi ma la bde bar 'gyur pa'o // /
column25: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2139938#2139938#TD4029E.TXT.r_2530# lhag ma rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dang zhes bya ba ni tshul  khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis sgrub pas mched pa'o // /
column26: 0.024#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692987#1692988#TD4048E.TXT.r_1300;TD4048E.TXT.r_1301# byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du mi ngoms pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan  dang ; /
column27: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1364594#1364594#TD4037E.TXT.r_6586# sbyin pa la ji  lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la yang nges par byed pa dang  byang bar byed pa dang  rtag par byed pa dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ci rigs par rig par bya'o // /
column28: 0.026#TD4044E.TXT.r#384628#384628#TD4044E.TXT.r_549;TD4044E.TXT.r_550# 'di ltar yang bzod pa zhes bya ba la / / +mtho ris kyi don du tshul khrims dang  brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab rnams yang dag par blangs nas gnas pa ni 'ba' zhig par sngar bstan to // /

column3: 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni de dag nyid kyi bral ba na rnyed pa nas bzung ste skye'o // / +de bzhin du 'gog pa la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bcu gnyis kyi rnyed pa nas  bzung ste 'gag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220412#220424#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_802;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_804# sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims  dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220424#220437#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_804;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_805;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_806# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di yang spyi dang bye brag gi ming gis bstan te / / +de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ba ni spyi'i ming ngo // /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361945#2361946#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5967# ji snyed yod pa nyid shes pa dang  ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid shes pa dang  'dzin pa'i don shes pa dang  gzung ba'i don shes pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa'i don shes pa dang   longs spyod kyi don shes pa dang  phyin ci log gi don shes pa dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i don shes pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don shes pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i don shes pas so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260954#260955#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5875# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341590#2341592#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3561# rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dmigs par bya ba'i yul gyi dngos po dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan  dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po dang dngos po'i mtha' dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po dang  dgos pa yongs su grub pa dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po'o zhes gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391988#2391988#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9610# sems kyi skye  pa la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi gnas la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi bslab pa dang  sems kyi 'phel ba la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi 'grib pa la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261525#261526#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5962# yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin du lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa brgyad kyi rnyed pa nas bzung ste 'gag go // /

column3: chos shes pa ni de dag nyid kyi bral ba'i  rnyed pa nas bzung ste skye'o // / +de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams la yang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba bcu bzhi ni lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa'i rnyed pa nas bzung ste 'gag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220458#220468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_808;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_809# dus dang rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang  'bras bu mchog  thong par byed pas so zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220469#220481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_809# de'i phyir bstan bcos 'di nyid las chos bcu po 'di dag ni shin tu yun ring po bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang  de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pas rang bzhin rnam    par dag pa'i khyad par dang  byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dus kyi mchog gis yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mchog gis rnam par dag pa dang  'bras bu'i mchog sbyin par byed pas na de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column6: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#1374288#1374289#TD4037E.TXT.r_7767# de la sbyin pa la  sogs pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag ni yun ring po bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang  de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dang  byang chub mchog gi  'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402253#2402255#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10870;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# chos kyi dbyings ye shes la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bas yan lag de'i phyir sa dgu  pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /

column29: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column30: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387646#2387646#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9102;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can la legs par phan mi 'dogs pa'i sgrib pa zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385439#2385439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8881# so so'i skye bo  nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column32: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225711#225711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / /
column33: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229363#229363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column34: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230321#230321#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2105# dper na lug bsad na ma tho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la sogs pa lta bu ste / / +theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column35: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column36: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228421#228421#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1845# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum yod pa rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnam     // /
column37: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402431#2402431#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10893# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column38: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column39: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231870#231870#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2272# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag re re dag la yang gsum yongs su dag pa chen po ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rgya cher bstan to // /
column40: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399693#2399693#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10536;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10537# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column44: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241246#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column45: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227385#227385#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1732;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1733# zab pa dang  rgya che ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung  ste / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column46: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228884#228884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1906# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column47: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225152#225152#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1456# lhag pa'i bsam pa'i  stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par gyeng ba'i gnas skabs kyi mos pa yin pa'i phyir rkyen rnam pa 'di gnyis kyis sems kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par mi nus pa ste / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni 'bras  bu'i 'og mar skye ba smon pa dang  sems dman pa rgyun du bsgom pa dang  sems nang du 'jog par mi nus zhes 'byung ngo // /
column48: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402672#2402672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10923# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column49: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229716#229716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs na bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220529#220541#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_811;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_813;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_815# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshungs pa med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes  bstan te / /

column3: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral lam / / +gzugs  kyi 'dod chags dang bral lam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220542#220550#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_815;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_818# bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gang yin pa'o // / +sbyor ba mtshungs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi 'dod chags dang bral na bden par mngon par rtogs ma thag tu phyir mi 'ong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220551#220560#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_818;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_819# bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa'o // / +'bras bu mtshungs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sku gsum po dag go // /

column3: gang dag mngon par rtogs pa gcig pur smra ba de dag gi bsam pa btsal bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220561#220570#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_820# byang  chub sems dpa' ji tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgom pa dag ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir spyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: gal te 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa las bsams  nas smras na ni rigs par bsam par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220568#220579#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_821# byang  chub sems dpa' ji tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgom pa dag ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir spyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224583#224584#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1389;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1391# dang po gsum gyi phyir ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa dang  phyi ma gsum gyi phyir ni 'khor ba la mi gnas pa gang yin pa ste / / +zhib  tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni / /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540746#540747#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11895;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11896;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11897# don rnam pa gsum gyi phyir don 'di shes par 'gyur te ming gi blo mi skye ba dang  bdag nyid mang po 'gal ba'i skyon dang  bdag nyid sna tshogs 'gal  pa'i skyon no zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang 'di dang mthun par ston to // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222979#222981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1177;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1178# 'di ni dang po'i shin tu mos pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274190#274191#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang  yang bdag nyid  de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221745#221747#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_984;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_985# bstan bcos dag las bstan pa dang sbyar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug las re res kyang phan tshun gcig gis gcig sdud par ston pas bslab pa gsum po dag las bslab pa re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po  dag sdud par byed de / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / /

column3: gang sdug bsngal mthong nas rnyed pa rgyun 'chad pa ni kun 'byung spangs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220580#220588#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_822# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni phul du  byung ba'i don gyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: bral ba'i rnyed pa thob pa ni 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'o // / +lam mngon du gyur pa ni lam bsgom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220589#220597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni phul du  byung ba'i don gyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ni nges pa'i tshig ji ltar blta zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692779#1692783#TD4048E.TXT.r_1276;TD4048E.TXT.r_1277# 'di dag gi nges pa'i tshig ji ltar blta zhe na / / +'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba thams cad las phul du  byung bar pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so // /

column3: mi rtag pa la sogs par mthong bas sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs  su shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220598#220605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ni nges pa'i tshig ji ltar blta zhe na / / +'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254082#1254089#TD4051E.TXT.r_3122;TD4051E.TXT.r_3123# go rims kyi dgos pa'o // / +'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol du 'gro ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi spyi'i  nges pa'i tshig ste / /
column6: 0.021#TD4006E.TXT.r#1086706#1086710#TD4006E.TXT.r_335# bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa gang lags pa dang   bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang  bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang  bdag gi dge ba'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'i dus thams cad du bsags pa de bzhin    gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus pa'i zlum por sdom par bgyi'o zhes gsungs pa dang  yang de dag thams cad bsdus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#87697#87697#TD4095E.TXT.r_4812;TD4095E.TXT.r_4813# de la gang 'dod chags dang ma bral bas mchod rten la sbyin pa de ni bdag kho na'i don du'o // / +gang 'dod chags dang bral bas pha rol la sbyin pa mthong ba'i chos la myong ba ma gtogs pa de ni gzhan  kho na'i don du'o // /
column8: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#155596#155597#TD4035E.TXT.r_5328;TD4035E.TXT.r_5330;TD4035E.TXT.r_5331;TD4035E.TXT.r_5332;TD4035E.TXT.r_5329# gzhi de  las bdag nyid gsad pa'am / / +nyams pa'am / / +smad par 'gyur la / / +pha rol la gnod par ni mi nus pa'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4044E.TXT.r#384850#384850#TD4044E.TXT.r_595;TD4044E.TXT.r_596# 'phen pa yang rnam pa gnyis te mthong ba'i chos can dang  pha rol ba'i dbye bas  so ; / / +bde ba'i rgyu la bde bar nye bar brtags par byas nas / /
column10: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034512#1034512#TD4054E.TXT.r_7064;TD4054E.TXT.r_7065;TD4054E.TXT.r_7066# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsgom pas / / +byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bsam pa'o // / +thabs la gnas pa'i pha rol phyin pa gang zhe na / /
column11: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1664419#1664419#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11166;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11167# 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am / / +so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yin no // /

column3: ji ste mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa la bya na ni mi rigs par bsam par bya ste / / +'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ba khyim bdag bden pa rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473556#473558#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3150# de la lam ni spyi'i gnas yin la gnas las zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bye brag tu bzhon pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las na zhi gnas dang lhag     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533781#533782#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# bdag tu rnam par rtog pa de dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536671#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357138#2357139#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357533#2357535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357963#2357966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386197#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403322#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404780#2404781#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406125#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220606#220621#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226115#226117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563# rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357710#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385674#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405367#2405368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220983#220984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237855#237858#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column26: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238005#238007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /
column27: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column28: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column29: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474858#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column31: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475263#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column33: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column35: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column36: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column37: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column38: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column39: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column40: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column41: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column42: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column43: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column44: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column45: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /

column48: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column49: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column50: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column51: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column52: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238220#238220#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3102;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104# ma 'ongs sdug bsngal snod gyur mi rung ngo // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column53: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469112#469112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2588;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589# 'od zer gyis kun du gsal bar byed do zhes 'byung  ngo ;; / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column54: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: them skas kyi them pa'i dpe bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +mthong ba'i lam  'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220619#220629#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /

column3: de la yang dag pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' dang  'tsho ba ni lte ba lta bu ste / / +tshul khrims kyi yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220630#220640#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_826# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin ni mu khyud lta bu'o // / +yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang  dag pa 'dren pa ni rtsibs lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220638#220650#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_827# slob dpon ngo bo nyid kyi 'grel ba las kyang phal cher de skad du ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las ni rnam grangs rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ston to // /

column3: ci'i phyir 'khor lo rin po che 'di'i chos mthun pa yin zhe na / / +dper na ni yul gzhan 'dor zhing gzhan gnon to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220651#220662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_829# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las ni rnam grangs rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ston to // / +dang po ni sbyin pa la sogs pa las rab tu ldog par gyur nas theg pa chung ngu la phyogs par     // /

column3: de bzhin du 'di yang bar chad med pa'i lam gzhan 'dor zhing rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon sum du byed pas gnon to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220663#220673#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_830# dang po ni sbyin pa la sogs pa las rab tu ldog par gyur nas theg pa chung ngu la phyogs par     // / +'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o // /

column3: bden     // / +pa la dmigs pa gzhan 'dor zhing gnon pa'i phyir ro // / +ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba las gnas pa'i phyir 'khor lo rin po che dang 'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220674#220699#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_831;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_832;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_833;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_834# ldog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgrub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: dper na de ni grong dang grong rdal ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la gnas so // /
de bzhin du 'di yang 'jig tshogs  la lta ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dag las ma rgyal ba las ni bar chad med pa'i lam gyis rgyal bar byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220700#220707#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_833;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_835# gsum pa ni yod pa dang med pa'i lta ba gnyis po dag ni tshu rol zhes bya'o // / +yod pa dang med par lta ba 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220708#220725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_835;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_836;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_837# yod pa dang med par lta ba 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // / +bzhi pa  ni kun tu sbyor ba'i 'ching ba dang bcas pas sbyin pa GTONG BA LA SOGS PA GANG yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i rnyed pa rgyun 'chad pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyal ba la ni gnas te / / +rnam par grol ba'i lam nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i rnyed pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro // /
'phar ba dang 'bab pa'i phyir yang  yin te / / +dper na 'khor lo rin po che kha cig tu ni 'phar / / +kha cig tu ni 'bab bo // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220849#220857#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_856# bsil bar byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya ste / / +'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni spyod yul rnams las shin tu gdung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi  bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: gang gis spong ba de nyid bar chad med pa'i lam dang  rnam par  grol ba'i lam yin par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220867#220875#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_857;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_859# khong khro 'dzoms pa'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya ste / / +khong khro bcom nas zad par byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rnam pa gsum mam bzhi spangs pa ni rigs su skye ba ste / / +tshe'i lhag ma gnyis sam gsum lus pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220876#220888#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_859;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_861# khong khro bcom nas zad par BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dge ba rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir brtson 'grus zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#963333#963333#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9437# brtson 'grus la  nyan pa dang  bsam pa la sogs pa'i brtson 'grus spyad pas tshe 'dir dge ba rgyun du 'phel ba'i phyir bdag la phan btags so // /
column6: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348826#1348826#TD4037E.TXT.r_4473;TD4037E.TXT.r_4474# rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; / +lhur sbyor ba'i phyir gus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  so sor brtags shing brtags shing dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams  cad kyis mi 'khrugs shing gzhan du bsgyur du med pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  khyad par thob pa chung ngu dang  ngan don tsam gyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /

column3: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa drug pa spangs pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'bring po'i chung ngu'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i  phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220889#220897#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_863# dge ba rnam par 'jog pa ni 'di'i stobs kyis grub pa'i phyir ro // / +sems 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan  zhes bya ste / /

column3: nyon mongs pa rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs pa ni bar chad gcig pa'o // / +rnam pa dgu pa ste chung ngu'i chung ngu spangs pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220898#220909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_863;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_865# yid nang du sdud pa'i phyir ro // / +de kho na nyid kyi chos shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya ste / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529361#529362#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10436# rnam par shes pa 'di sbed pa dang  sba bar bya ba dang  sbas pa 'dzin pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dag dang  phan tshun rkyen byed pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams nang gi bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang don rnam pa gsum gyis ston te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536549#536549#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11349;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11350# skye ba dang rga shi ni sdug bsngal gyi shing lta bur blta bar bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni rnam pa bcu gcig la brten nas gzhan gyi  dbang ston te / /

column3: yang 'jig rten 'dir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro // / +de ltar sa dang sar bar chad med pa dang  rnam par grol  ba'i lam dgu rim gyis srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa'i bar gyi nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa la bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa skyes par gyur ba nyid rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220910#220919#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_865# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni ser sna dang dbul ba 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs thob  par byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220920#220927#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_866# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni ser sna dang dbul ba 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs thob  par byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220928#220938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_867# 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang  ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa dang  bde 'gro dang  ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.019#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692798#1692798#TD4048E.TXT.r_1278# ser sna dang dbul ba 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyis tshogs thob par byed pas sbyin pa'o // /

column3: 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje dang mtshungs shing 'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220939#220946#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_868# khro ba dang  kho na zad par byed pa dang  bdag dang gzhan la bde ba la gnas par byed pa'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de la rnam par rtog pa mang ste / / +de la sdug bsngal  la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang  de bzhin du kun 'byung ba la rjes su rtogs pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang  'gog pa la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa bsam gtan dang  gzugs med pa dag nas bye brag gis sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa'i  rnam pa brgyad dang  lam la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478679#478681#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3731;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3732# 'di ni mi zad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zad pa med de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357709#2357711#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385676#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405365#2405368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220947#220956#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_869# le lo dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang bral bar byed pa dang  dge ba'i chos tshad med pa rnam par spel ba'i mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220957#220966#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870# le lo dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang bral bar byed pa dang  dge ba'i chos tshad med pa rnam par spel ba'i mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // / +rnam par gyeng ba sel ba dang  nang du sems gnas pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220967#220978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870# rnam par gyeng ba sel ba dang  nang du sems gnas pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya'o // / +lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220979#220989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237857#237859#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238005#238008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /

column16: 5.960#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692835#1692843#TD4048E.TXT.r_1282;TD4048E.TXT.r_1283# rnam par gyeng ba  sel ba dang  nang du sems gnas pa sgrub par byed pas bsam gtan no // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473557#473558#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3150# de la lam ni spyi'i gnas yin la gnas las zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bye brag tu bzhon pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las na zhi gnas dang lhag     // /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533779#533783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# bdag TU RNAM PAR RTOG PA DE dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536671#536672#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357138#2357139#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357533#2357535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357963#2357966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386198#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column26: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las NI RNAM PAR RIG PA tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column27: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column28: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403320#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column29: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404779#2404782#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column30: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406123#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column31: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220614#220615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /

column38: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398087#2398088#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506127#506128#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7453;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7454# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa dang sbyar na ni de la gzugs dang stong pa nyid ni tha dad pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'byung ba dang mthun par  bshad de / /
column40: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469112#469112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2588;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589# 'od zer gyis kun du gsal bar byed do zhes 'byung  ngo ;; / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column41: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405036#2405036#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11155;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni mtshan ma dang rtsol ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyo ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // /
column42: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535269#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /

column3: gang dag sa'i bye brag gis lam tha dad pa de dag gi ltar nas bdun gyi lam la nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis lhag par bsnan rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin brgyad cur 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220988#221000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de dag thams  cad 'dir rig par bya ste / / +'phags pa'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngus nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po spong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221012#221023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_873# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // / +'di ltar rgyu'i dus su 'chal ba'i tshul khrims rnam par zhi bar byas pas 'bras bu'i dus su ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa dang  ma 'ongs pa na bde 'gro len pa     // /

column3: de la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'phags pa'i lam de ni che ba'i phyir srid pa'i rtse mo nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i gnyen po ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221024#221037#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_876# dang  da ltar ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /

column3: de spangs na dgra bcom par 'gyur ro //// / +'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir 'os pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221035#221046#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_876# de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges pa'i tshig ci rigs par bshad par bya'o // / +bdag dang gzhan de dag bde ba la gnas par byed ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: yang na dgra zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dag ste / / +de dag 'dis bcom pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221047#221066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_877# bdag nyid kyi lus la  'khon pa'i nyes pa'i gnod pa med pa nyid kyis gzhan la sdug bsngal mi skye ba'i phyir bde ba thob par zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405057#2405057#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11157# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar mtshan ma thams  cad dang mngon bar 'du byed pa thams cad kyis de'i sems gyo bar mi nus pa'i phyir dang  sa bdun pa la mtshan ma thams cad kyis mi gyo zhing kun du mi 'byung mod kyi / /

column3: 'bras bu bzhi po rnams zhes bya ba la ci'i phyir  'bras bu bzhi po dge sbyong gi 'bras bur 'gyur / /
'di lta ste dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221067#221074#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyi 'grel ba las 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom pa dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bskyed pas 'bras bu'i dus su yang dbul ba 'joms  pa dang  longs spyod chen po thob pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de'i 'bras bu dag ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dag ste / / +de dag ni brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o // / +de lta yin du zin kyang rnam pa lngas  na rnam pa bzhir bzhag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221075#221086#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyi 'grel ba las 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom pa dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bskyed pas 'bras bu'i dus su yang dbul ba 'joms  pa dang  longs spyod chen po thob pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ste / / +nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column5: 2.980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535457#535457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column9: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238296#238297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // /

column11: 0.006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column14: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /

column26: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474728#474729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column7: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397248#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236838#236839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925# dpe nyid las kyang phal cher 'di dang mthun par 'byung bas 'dir ma brjod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397226#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382133#2382134#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8517;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8518;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8519# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems  dpa' rnams zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du gyur pa na sems rnam par gyeng bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhig khong du chud bar bgyi 'tshal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385108#2385112#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / /

column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231616#231620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /

column15: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262816#262818#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6129;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6130;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6131;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6132# 'di ltar gong ma lnga pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i skabs  nas thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gsungs pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba mtshan nyid rnam pa du dang ldan pa khong du ma chud pas de'i phyir 'dir yang bzlas te bstan pa yin no // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column40: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221969#221971#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
