column42: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248433#248435#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column43: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237159#237159#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column44: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228565#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column45: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398354#2398355#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column3: bsam gtan dang po nas bzung ste / / +rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag ni dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220352#220357#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_794;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_795# 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'i sgo nyid do / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242528#242535#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3642# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; / +'di ni zhu ba la gsol ba nyid do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column8: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239313#239315#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3253;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3254# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub  sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column9: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236165#236168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2850# yang na de bzhin gshegs pas  byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir / / +zhu ba 'di gsol ba yin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238778#238781#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3183# pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag las pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236518#236520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242215#242216#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3604# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column13: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117958#3117958#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214245#214245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222910#222910#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223707#223707#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224791#224791#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column20: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228596#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: de ltar de dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad yin te / / +bzhi ni zhugs pa'o // / +bzhi ni  'bras bu la gnas pa'o // /

column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225691#225691#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1513;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1514# legs par bsgoms pa ni bsgom pa'i shes rab ste / / +de dag gis bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub par nus par gyur pa'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1374557#1374557#TD4037E.TXT.r_7800;TD4037E.TXT.r_7801# bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ste / /
column7: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3034507#3034510#TD4018E.TXT.r_3989# de la rim zhes bya ba ni 'jungs pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa dang  ngang tshul ngan pa'i gnyen por tshul khrims dang  ngan  du smra ba la sogs pa khro ba'i gnyen por ji mi snyam zhing bzod pa dang  le lo'i gnyen por brtson 'grus dang  mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i gnyen por bsam gtan dang  ma rig pa'i gnyen por shes rab dang  thabs med pa'i gnyen por shes rab kyis thabs la mkhas pa dang  smon  pa med pa'i gnyen por bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam dang  rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi stobs chung ba'i gnyen por stobs dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa'i mi shes pa thams cad kyi gnyen por ye shes te / /
column8: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346084#1346084#TD4037E.TXT.r_4136;TD4037E.TXT.r_4137# srog gcod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can gyi  don bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang  'jug pa dang  ldog pa'i tshul khrims rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas bsrung ba'i tshul khrims dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims  dang ; / +sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims so // /
column9: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1882730#1882730#TD4039E.TXT.r_7977;TD4039E.TXT.r_7978# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang mthun pa ma yin pas na thabs med pa ma yin pa'o // / +chos mthun pa pa rnams dang  mtshungs pas na 'tsham pa'o // /

column3: rigs kyi bye brag gi sa drug tu 'gyur te / / +dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i rigs can so so'i skye bo gang yin pa de gnyis mthong ba'i lam la sems kyi skad cig bco lnga rnams la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba can ni de dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i ngang tshul can    yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381382#2381384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8431# 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems ni gnyi ga'i sgrib pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221194#221208#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_896;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_898# shes rab ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas bsdus so // / +ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397671#2397672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381877#2381877#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8489# rigs kyi bu ji tsam du rmugs pa dang gnyid yod pa dag yang dag bar legs par rab tu bsal bar gyur ba de tsam gyis na zhi gnas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag ba thob pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de    bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273800#273800#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7513# byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang  sbyor ba mchog dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang rnam par rgyu zhing 'du ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas     // / +yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220026#220026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_767# rigs kyi bu rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te // /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236532#236533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2889# rigs kyi  bu gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column13: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231024#231025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2178# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269557#269557#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6994# dngos po 'di ni sprul pa lta bur rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column16: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355498#2355498#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380427#2380427#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8311# rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dpag tu med pa ji snyed bstan PA GANG YIN PA DE dag thams cad  'dis bsdus pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column18: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348629#2348630#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4333# rigs kyi bu rgyun chags su yid la byed pa gang gis sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column19: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253448#253449#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4931# sems can du gdags    pa'i dngos po dang  de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po dang  de 'byung ba'i dngos po dang  de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po dang  de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang  de'i bye brag gi dngos po dang  ston par byed pa'i dngos po dang  bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang  'khor gyi dngos po'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237210#237212#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2968# yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa'i byang chub rgya chen pos ni phan yon don chen po byed do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column21: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342708#2342708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3698;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3699# gnyis ni gnyi ga'i yul gyi dmigs pa'i dngos po yin te 'di lta ste dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o     // / +zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345637#2345637#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396297#2396297#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402963#2402963#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10950;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10951# rigs kyi bu don chen po yongs su grub cing sngon ma 'dris pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob nas dga' ba chen po skye bas de'i phyir dang po ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes  bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column25: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246111#246111#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274713#274713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7642# khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs  pa ston to // /
column27: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271485#271485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: yang na rjes su 'brang ba ni rjes su 'brang ba ste / / +dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o // / +de de la yod pas dad pas rjes su 'brang ba can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221209#221220#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_898;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_899# ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ltar nus pa'i rjes su tshul khrims kyis snga ma gsum bsdus par gsungs te / /

column3: gzhan gyi man ngag gis bden pa rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro // / +chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba can ni de chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i  phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba can te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221219#221234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_899;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_900;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_901# tshul khrims kyi tshogs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang  tshul  khrims kyi 'khor du gtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rang gi rkyen gyi stobs kyis chos rnams la rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid bsgom pa'i lam la ni gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin te / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404605#2404608#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11109;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11110# 'di ltar sa 'di la bar chad med cing rgyun chad pa med par mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su zhugs pas na sa    drug pa ltar re zhig tsam du mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa dang  gzhan yang brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i sa dang nye bar gyur pas don rnam pa gnyis po 'di dang ldan pa'i phyir ring du song ba'i sa zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang don gyis mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405220#2405225#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11168;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11169;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11170# 'di  ltar sa 'di la rnam pa thams cad du chos sna tshogs ston pa la dbang thob pas thogs pa med cing yangs shing rgya che ba'i blo gros thob pa de yang shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs ba'i blo gros zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /

column14: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317610#2317610#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_795# zhi ba la phyogs pa dang  yongs su 'gyur ba'i nyan thos mdo 'di nyid dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa lta  bu'o // /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column22: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226166#226167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /

column25: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532734#532734#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10850# gal te de lta na ci'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las dpe  rnam pa gnyis tshang bar smos she na / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540239#540240#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /

column20: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /

column22: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column23: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column24: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column29: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column32: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column33: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /

column35: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column36: 0.024#TD4027E.TXT.r#561163#561164#TD4027E.TXT.r_1619# bstan  bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// /

column3: phyed du 'phar ba ni gang gnas gtsang ma rnams su skyes nas gnas gzhan bar du bor te 'og min du skye ba'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311604#2311604#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_96# nyon mongs pa dang  las dang  skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221460#221469#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_940;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_941;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_942;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_943# shes rab kyis ni lhag pa'i shes rab kho na bsdus so zhes 'byung gi / / +pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan  dang sbyar ba ni med de / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221470#221477#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_942;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_943;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_944# de'i phyir mdo 'di nyid las / / +pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yod de / /

column3: drug pa'i sems rnam par grol ba ni mi gyo ba'i // / +de la phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs na rgyun du zhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221478#221490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_944;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_945# tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang  shes rab kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims so // /

column3: de dag las rnam pa drug pa spangs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o // / +dam pa ma yin pa'i cha dang  mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221488#221498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_944;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_945;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_946;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_947# tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang  shes rab kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims so // / +de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221499#221507#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_946;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_947;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_948# bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / / +sems kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /

column3: dam pa ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba gang zhe na / / +'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  'jig tshogs la lta ba dang  tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang  the tshom mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221507#221516#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_948;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261135#261137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /

column3: gal  te rim gyis ltar na sngar ni gsum spangs la phyis ni kun du sbyor ba gnyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403223#2403225#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403706#2403708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11033;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11034# 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis nyon mongs pa'i shing bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404606#2404607#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11110# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang don gyis mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405220#2405222#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11168;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11169# 'di  ltar sa 'di la rnam pa thams cad du chos sna tshogs ston pa la dbang thob pas thogs pa med cing yangs shing rgya che ba'i blo gros thob pa de yang shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs ba'i blo gros zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221250#221252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_904# bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed  pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221517#221527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_952# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224977#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# bsdu  ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225804#225810#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1524;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1525# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241018#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253559#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /
column16: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330936#2330938#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2388;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2389;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2390# chos kyi 'khor lo gsum pa ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo yin no zhes bstan to // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column17: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229266#229266#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1958# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column19: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214079#214079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_10;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_11# kun tu rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len de dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang   dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226166#226167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236331#236331#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2866# 'di ni sa brgyad pa dang  dgu pa nas te mi gyo ba'i don ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las // /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487252#487252#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4959;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4960# rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba de yang dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo dang  tshig     // / +nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes 'byung ste / /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532734#532734#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10850# gal te de lta na ci'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las dpe  rnam pa gnyis tshang bar smos she na / /
column25: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216491#216491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /

column3: ji ste 'dod chags dang bral la sngar mthong ba'i lam du zhugs na ni / / +sngar kun du sbyor ba gnyis spangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221526#221537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_952;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_953# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / / +tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang  tshul khrims kyi rang    bzhin dang  tshul khrims kyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: phyis gsum mo // / +de la kun du sbyor ba gnyis ni lcags sgrog lta bu ste phyir mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221536#221547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_952;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_953;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_954;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_955;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_956# tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang  tshul khrims kyi rang    bzhin dang  tshul khrims kyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bsam gtan gyis ni lhag pa'i sems bsdus so // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221454#221454#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_939# tshul khrims kyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kho na bsdus so // / +bsam gtan gyis ni lhag pa'i sems kho na bsdus so // /

column3: dam pa zhes bya ba ni mchog go // / +dam pa ma yin pa ni dam pa ma yin pa ste ngan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221548#221556#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_955;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_957;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_958# brtson 'grus kyis ni gsum po kun tu 'gro ste / / +bslab pa gsum po dag ni slong ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te / /

column3: de gang zhe na / / +'dod pa'i khams so // / +de nyid cha ste khams gsum du bgrangs nas cha'i sgrar bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221555#221565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_957;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_958;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_959# 'di ni  las kyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don gyi mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad de / /

column3: de dang mthun pa ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o // / +de'i dam pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe  na ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221566#221574#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_958;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_961# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don gyi mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad de / / +de'i phyir de nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las / /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#462966#462967#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1781;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1782;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1783# sde gcig gi nang du kun la yang  bka' bzhin du bstan te / / +de'i phyir tshig le'ur byas pa las / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330567#2330569#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2344;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2345# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan  pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad de / / +de'i phyir de nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las / /

column3: mdo sde tshad mar yod pa'i phyir te / / +sems pa ngan pa la rnam par shes pa gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221575#221582#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_964# dang po gsum ni / / +rnam pa gnyis dang gcig dang gsum // / +zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: 'di ltar 'dod pa'i srid pa la'o zhe'o // / +ci'i phyir gcig tu bgrang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221583#221591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_966# 'di nyid kyi 'grel  pa las / / +de la dang po gsum zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: spong ba'i grangs kyi phyir te / / +khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spangs na dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221590#221600#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_967# pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum mo // / +rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni tshogs dang 'khor gnyis su 'gyur bas tshul khrims ni tshogs yin la / /

column3: mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'du byed kyi phung po bshad zin to // / +gal te phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221601#221619#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_968;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_969# rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni tshogs dang 'khor gnyis su 'gyur bas tshul khrims ni tshogs yin la / / +sbyin pa dang bzod pa ni 'khor yin pas so // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs par bstan pa de ji lta bu zhe na / /
'di la nyes pa med de / / +'di sgo gcig dang  sgo gnyis dang  sgo bzhi  pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221620#221631#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_968;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_969;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_970# dang po  gcig ces bya ba ni 'di ltar dang po gsum dang  gnyis pa ni bslab pa gsum las dang po tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin pas so // / +de la phyi ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2870574#2870580#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_375;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_376# pha rol tu phyin pa tha ma gnyis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /

column3: nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rtsa ba'i phyir te / / +'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni mthar 'dzin par lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221632#221642#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_969;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_971# de la phyi ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // / +yang gnyis zhes bya ba  ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po dag ni go rims bzhin du lhag pa'i sems dang  shes rab kyi bslab pa gnyis yin pas so // /

column3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'o // / +the tshom gyi rgyu las  byung ba ni log par lta ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221643#221654#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_971;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_972;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_973# yang gnyis zhes bya ba  ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po dag ni go rims bzhin du lhag pa'i sems dang  shes rab kyi bslab pa gnyis yin pas so // / +de la gcig ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: yang na de dag nyid thar pa la rab tu bar chad byed pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la 'jig tshogs la lta bas ni 'gro mi 'dod par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221655#221665#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_974# gsum zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa gcig po  'di ni bslab pa gsum po kun la khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: bar chad kyis 'jig pa'i phyir ro // / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ni / / +grangs can  la sogs pa'i lam mthong ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221666#221676#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_975;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_976;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_977# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las snga ma bzhis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus so // /

column3: des dag par 'gyur du re bas lam nor bar 'gyur ro // / +the tshom gyis ni yid gnyis za bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221677#221687#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_976;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_977# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / / +pha rol tu  phyin pa bzhi'i tshogs dang  rang bzhin dang  'khor dang  kun tu bsrung ba dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o // /

column3: dper na mi zhig lam du zhugs te 'gro ba la bar chad gsum yod de / /

column12: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506232#506232#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7463# de yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis bshad pa dang po dang mthun pas de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las yongs su grub pa 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang tha dad pa  yang ma yin tha mi dad pa yang ma yin no // /

column3: de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pa ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'o // / +des na rang gi rgyud dang  'brel pa rnams dang so sor brtags pa dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i 'thob pa dang 'thob pa med pa'o // /

column3: de la dge ba ni dad pa la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la  sogs pa smos pas ni brtson 'grus la sogs pa ston to // /

column3: lung du ma bstan pa ni sprul pa'i sems la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba la  sogs pa ston to // /

column3: de rnams zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis ni sngar bstan pa dang sbyar ro // / +gang dag la zhes bya ba 'di ni gang zag rnams dang sbyar te dge ba smos pas zag pa rnams las 'phangs pa'i phyir ro // /

column16: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /

column18: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /

column21: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245240#245246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /

column3: so so'i skye bo rnams la ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i thob pa med do // / +nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir 'phags pa rnams  la yang med do // /
khyod kyis khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro // / +de la ni 'dir 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ma spangs pa'i khyad par gyis der 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222035#222048#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1026;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1027;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1028;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1029;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1030# lhag ma gnyis ni tshogs rnam pa gnyis kar gtogs so // / +mdo'i tshig rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1321198#1321206#TD4037E.TXT.r_754;TD4037E.TXT.r_755;TD4037E.TXT.r_756;TD4037E.TXT.r_757# de  bas na rnam grangs des gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa brgyad po dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang  bde bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i tshe 'bras bu med cing don med pa de yang de dag la 'bras bu yod pa  dang don che bar 'gyur ro // / +de la bsod nams ni gang yin / /
column6: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136996#1136997#TD4047E.TXT.r_2265;TD4047E.TXT.r_2266;TD4047E.TXT.r_2267# bsod nams dang ye shes bstan pas bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi 'bras bu  yang bstan par nus pas / / +de la bsod nams ni gang yin / /

column3: nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ma spangs pa de'i mngon rtags su gyur pa'i chos gzhan dgos so // /

column3: sa bon ni sngar bkag pa'i phyir ro //// / +ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222057#222064#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1031;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1032;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1033;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1034;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1035# bsod NAMS ZHES BYA BA NI MDOR bsdu na pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ste / / +sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /

column3: thar par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang grol bar 'gyur ro // / +rigs pas 'thob pa bstan nas da ni lung gzhan gyis ston te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222073#222080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1036;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1037# brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsod nams kyi phyogs dang  ye shes kyi phyogs su rig par bya ste / /

column7: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2629009#2629010#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11596;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11597# ye shes kyi  tshogs chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // / +brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag ni gnyi gar gtogs pa'i phyir rnam pa gnyi ga yin te / /

column9: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1334069#1334069#TD4037E.TXT.r_2502# sbyin  pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang  tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang  brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi rjes kyang zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mda' brnyes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rje'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222081#222090#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1036;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1037;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1038# brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsod nams kyi phyogs dang  ye shes kyi phyogs su rig par bya ste / / +brtson 'grus la brten nas sbyin pa byin pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par  len cing bsrung ba dang  byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am / /

column3: mi  slob pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag ces bya ba la mi slob pa'i chos bcu po gang zhe na / /

column3: mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' de la zhe sdang dang  gti mug las byung ba'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha'  spangs pa ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha'i sgrar bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222100#222109#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1038;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1039;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1040# de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi phyogs kyi brtson 'grus so // / +brtson 'grus la brten nas thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyar bar byed do // /

column7: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1321315#1321318#TD4037E.TXT.r_770;TD4037E.TXT.r_771# so sor rtog pa 'di ni ye shes kyi phyogs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /

gzhan la rag las 'tsho ba yi // / +dge slong gis ni 'tsho sbyang dka' // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222146#222154#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1046;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# bsam gtan la brten nas thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing phung po la sogs pa rnams sna tshogs la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi phyogs kyi bsam gtan yin no zhes 'byung ba yin no // /

column3: zhes tshigs su bcad pa las byung ba'i phyir ro // / +yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par grol  ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222155#222168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1046;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# bsam gtan la brten nas thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing phung po la sogs pa rnams sna tshogs la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi phyogs kyi bsam gtan yin no zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222602#222608#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252315#252320#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487057#487059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4938# gsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni dri ba dris pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column8: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505987#505989#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7436# 'di ltar gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa 'di'i gnyen po yang bstan bcos rnams so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las / /
column9: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546764#546765#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12623# de la thun mong du bstan pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ji skad du / /
column10: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346440#2346442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4119# logs shig na bdag nyid du gyur pa ni med do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa mdzad pa las kyang 'di lta ste / /
column11: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347850#2347851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4246# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las // /
column12: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221310#221311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_914# de la bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column13: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252946#252947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4854# ma mo de dag la yang ming mang du yod pas     // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column14: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387392#2387392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#218506#218506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_569# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403597#2403597#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11024# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /

column3: 'dus byas dang  'dus ma byas so // / +'dus byas ni mos pa'i rang bzhin no // / +'dus ma byas ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222169#222177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1048# legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: 'dir ni 'dus ma byas yan lag nyid du bstan to // / +slob pa la rnam par grol ba yod du zin kyang de ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par grol ba  yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222178#222188#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1048# legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam  pa gnyis po 'di yang sngar mdo tsam du ming gi don bstan nas / /

column3: rgyud rnam par grol ba ni ma yin te / / +rgyud ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222189#222196#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1048;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1049# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam  pa gnyis po 'di yang sngar mdo tsam du ming gi don bstan nas / /

column3: mi slob pa ni ngo bo nyid dang rgyud rnam par grol ba'i phyir yan lag nyid du bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222197#222207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1049;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1051# de'i 'og tu phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu ba bstan par bya'o // / +de la ming gi don ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu bskyed cing bsod nams kyi rgyu byed pas / /
column5: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1775276#1775279#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9555# skul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos  po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i bsod nams dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus kyi / /

column3: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o // / +de gnyis  kyi mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to // / +bskyed pa dang 'thob byed dang ldan zhes bya ba'i sgra de dag gis brjod do zhes bye brag tu smra ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222204#222221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1051;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1052;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1053;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# de la ming gi don ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu bskyed cing bsod nams kyi rgyu byed pas / /
column5: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1774859#1774861#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9520;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9521# skul byed de bzhin du gang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di rnams dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i     // / +bsod nams dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam yin no zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi / /
column6: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1775276#1775279#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9555# skul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos  po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i bsod nams dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus kyi / /
column7: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1775363#1775365#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9565# skul byed de bzhin du dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di dag dang ldan pa de'i bsod nams dang  bsod nams kyi  'bras bu dang  bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi / /

column20: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360513#2360515#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5785# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column21: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235598#235598#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2774# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba la thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#454810#454810#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_631# de la gsum pa bsags pa rnam par phye bas sems kyi khyad par bstan pa zhes bya ba yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las ji skad du brgyus zhing 'brel pa'i phyir mdo zhes bya'o zhes  'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#482984#482984#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4354# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2318301#2318301#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_884# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las kyang / /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391342#2391342#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9548# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las / /
column26: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227737#227737#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column27: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389914#2389914#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9372# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221407#221407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column29: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487079#487079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4940# shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das    kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni gnas yod pa dang  tha dad pa'i tshig med par bstan pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang  bstan ba de rgya cher spel du rung ba dang  bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs  pas tshig tha dad pa med par bstan pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ngo // /
column30: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227342#227342#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1726# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346574#2346574#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4132;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4133# mtshon gyis ni rang nyid la mi gcod do zhes brjod pa dag dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477931#477932#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3632;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3633# mkhyen pa la 'dres pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan  pa rnams kyang yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las sems can rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pa la ltos nas / /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358147#2358147#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5514;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5515# bsgom pa rnam pa lngas logs shig tu 'bras bu'i ming rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa ste / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column34: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344366#2344367#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3895# sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni bcu gcig dge ba las shin tu sbyangs pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las lus yang zhing zo mdog bde ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu  sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad de / /
column35: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274195#274195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column36: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#468816#468816#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2548;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2549# rdo'i snying po ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas rin po che kha dog dmar zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column37: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473483#473483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column38: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475460#475460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column40: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: de la thob pa skyes nas chos dang thob pa'i thob pa dang  ldan pa yin no // /
thob pa'i thob pa skyes nas thob pa nyid dang ldan pa yin no // / +skad cig gnyis pa la ni thob pa gsum dang rjes su thob pa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222283#222291#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1063;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1064# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las / / +de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas  brtsams pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de bzhin du skad cig phyi ma phyi ma la rnam par 'phel bas rdzas tha dad pa mtha' yas pa dang skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222292#222300#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1066# de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas  brtsams pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las ni don rnam pa lngas bstan te / /

column3: de yang rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni rnam  pa gnyis so thob pa med pa ni ma rnyed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222299#222309#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1066;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1067# bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las ni don rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i don dang  gso ba'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  phun sum tshogs pa'i don te / /
column5: 0.012#TD4026E.TXT.r#276803#276805#TD4026E.TXT.r_336# kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang  khas len pa'i don dang  rtogs pa'i don dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i don te / /
column6: 0.012#TD4035E.TXT.r#186776#186782#TD4035E.TXT.r_10565;TD4035E.TXT.r_10566;TD4035E.TXT.r_10567# de la dbang po rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di lta ste / / +lta ba'i don dang  nyan pa'i don dang      // / +snom pa'i don dang  myang ba'i don dang  reg pa'i don dang  rnam par shes pa'i don to // /
column7: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2068727#2068728#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13120;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13121# stobs kyi don ni mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don to // / +mi 'jigs pa'i don ni mi zhum pa'i don to zhes zer ro // /
column8: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#186884#186889#TD4035E.TXT.r_10587# ngo bo nyid kyi don dang  rgyu'i don dang  'bras bu'i don dang   bya ba'i don dang  khyad par du sbyor ba'i don dang  'jigs pa'i don to // /
column9: 0.016#TD4019E.TXT.r#2409248#2409249#TD4019E.TXT.r_237;TD4019E.TXT.r_238# de ltar dgos pa'i  don bstan nas / / +bsdus pa'i don rnam pa lngas shes par bya ste / /
column10: 0.016#TD4026E.TXT.r#288151#288154#TD4026E.TXT.r_2279;TD4026E.TXT.r_2280# gal te gzung ba'i don las  'dzin pa'i don tha mi dad par mthong ba'am // /
column11: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2179542#2179547#TD4025E.TXT.r_2086# ngo bo'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  'bras bu'i don dang  las kyi don dang  ldan pa'i don dang  'jug pa'i  don dang  rtag pa'i don dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don no // /
column12: 0.020#TD4019E.TXT.r#2482220#2482220#TD4019E.TXT.r_9753;TD4019E.TXT.r_9754# dam bcas pa'ang zhes pa la sogs pas don de nyid rgyas par ston  te ; / / +dam bca' ba'i tshig dam bca' ba'i don shes pa dang de ltar bstan par 'dod pa las byung bar don gyis khas blangs pas zhes pa ste / /
column13: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1203052#1203053#TD4047E.TXT.r_11557;TD4047E.TXT.r_11558# bden pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don te / / +rnam pa de dang des phyin ci ma log pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column14: 0.021#TD4068E.TXT.r#573298#573298#TD4068E.TXT.r_310# dbang po'i don ci bdag po byed pa'am dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don te ci la dbang byed ce na / /
column15: 0.022#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170325#2170325#TD4025E.TXT.r_637# ngo bo'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  'bras  bu'i don dang  las kyi don dang  ldan pa'i don dang  'jug pa'i don dang  gnas skabs kyis rab tu dbye ba'i don dang  kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang  mi 'gyur ba'i don dang  dbyer med pa'i don to // /
column16: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2922515#2922515#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7576# chu'i khams ni skam pa dang skye ba'i gtan tshigs kyis skad cig mar brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2922675#2922675#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7589# rlung yang skad cig mar brjod pa ni rang bzhin gyis gyo ba'i gtan tshigs dang  skye ba'i gtan tshigs dang  'bri ba'i  gtan tshigs kyis skad cig mar brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1428904#1428905#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3318# gal te brda sprod pa'i tshul tu dbang po'i rtags ni dbang po'o zhes bya bar bye brag tu bshad pa ni dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don to  zhes bya bar nyams par 'gyur ba zhig na dbang byed pa'i don yin par yang 'dod do // /
column19: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1226741#1226741#TD4047E.TXT.r_14958# dri ma'i  don dang mi mthun pa'i don 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir thob par bya ba la gegs byed pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya bas bstan to // /
column20: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2138339#2138339#TD4029E.TXT.r_2324;TD4029E.TXT.r_2325# ming tsam du mthong bar 'gyur ro ZHES BYA BA NI MNGON par brjod pa tsam du ste ZHES BYA BA NI MNGON par brjod pa ni yid kyi brjod pa tsam zhes bya ba'i don te / / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su don dang bral bar ro zhes bshad do // /
column21: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2294164#2294164#TD4049E.TXT.r_1252# byed pa po med pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel  par 'byung ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang  gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bur    mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#767214#767214#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_75;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_76# gang zhig gang gi don yin pa ni don bzhin no // / +don ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas don bzhin ston pa ste / /

column3: dper na thob pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan lta bu'o // / +rnam par nyams pa ni sngon btang ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222307#222322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1066;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1067;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1070# yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i don dang  gso ba'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  phun sum tshogs pa'i don te / /

column3: dper na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams nas yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi thob pa dag skye ba  lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222318#222337#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1072;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1073;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1074# tshogs zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i don yin te / / +'dis byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222349#222350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1076;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1077# yan lag mang po phun sum tshogs pa'i don yang yin te / / +'dis byang chub kyi chos phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o  zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250240#1250241#TD4051E.TXT.r_2527;TD4051E.TXT.r_2528# bsnyen bkur byed pa la sogs pa tshe 'di'i 'bras bu la chags par mi sems pa'i phyir dang  byang chub chen po thob par bya bar sems pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2924636#2924636#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7869;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7870;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7871# skad cig ma phyi ma rnams kha dog dang  dbyibs la sogs pa skad cig ma snga ma dang 'dra ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung bas na / / +de dag gis skad cig mar ma shes so // / +don de nyid  gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.028#TD4051E.TXT.r#1232638#1232638#TD4051E.TXT.r_22;TD4051E.TXT.r_23# yang na 'di byang chub kyi phyir sran thub pas na byang chub sems dpa'o // / +theg pa chen po'i che ba'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni zab pa dang  rgya che ba gnyis kyis bla na med pa'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2084582#2084582#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15453;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15454# sangs rgyas kyi sras po ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung bar zhugs pa rnams med  pa'i phyir dang  rtog ge ngan pa rnams kyi tshig dang  don sgro btags pas dkrugs pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar thub pa'i bstan pa lkog mar srog phyin pa dang 'dra ba dang  dri ma rnams stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas te / /

column3: de nyid rnyed nas skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni ldan pa zhes bya'o // / +de las bzlog pa ni thob pa med pa ste snga nas med pa'i rnyed pa med cing nyams pa'i rnyed pa yang med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222337#222350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1073;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1074;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1075;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1076;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1077# 'dis byang chub kyi chos yongs su gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyu'i don yang yin te / /

column3: thob pa dang thob pa med pa de gnyis kyang rang gi rgyud la gnas  pa'i chos rnams nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rgyud la gnas pa ma yin pa dang  sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa rnams kyi yang ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222322#222330#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1072;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1073# 'dis byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +yongs su 'dzin pa'i don yang yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222349#222366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1076;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1077;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1078;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1079# yan lag mang po phun sum tshogs pa'i don yang yin te / / +'dis byang chub kyi chos phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o  zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221434#221435#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_937# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu ba'i bye  brag bstan pa yang legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las / /

column18: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216995#216995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: gang dang zhe na / / +so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang ngo // / +so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang ldan pa su zhe na / /
