column3: 'phags pa thams cad dang  so so'i skye bo kha  cig go zhes 'byung ngo // / +gang yang glang po che dang rta la sogs pa dang ldan par tha snyad btags pa de dang der ldan pa'i sgra ni dbang la bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222446#222458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1090;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1091;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1092# chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i shes rab ni ye shes kyi sgo'o // / +shes rab kyang bsam gtan gyi rgyu la ltos dgos la / /

column3: de la thob pa ni rnam pa gsum ste zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum mo // / +grib ma rjes su 'brang ba lta bu dang  khyu mchog gi rjes su 'brang ba lta bu dang   be'u rjes su 'brang ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222457#222471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1092;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1093;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1095# bsam gtan yang nges  par brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs la ltos so zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de ni grib ma lta bur rjes su 'brang ba'i ngang tshul can no // / +gzhan yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222472#222479#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1095# phyi ma gnyis dang gsum pa ni ye shes yin te / / +dge bsnyen gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i mdo'i nang nas bkod pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250674#250676#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4606# 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo'i nang nas dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229484#229485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1984# yongs su bsngo pa rgya cher bshad pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed ba'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo'i nang nas yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222790#222790#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1152# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo'i nang nas shes rab bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: dang po grib ma rjes su 'brang ba lta bu ni 'di lta ste / / +lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi nyid de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222480#222490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1097# dge bsnyen gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i mdo'i nang nas bkod pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: lung du ma  bstan pa'i chos rnams ni nyam chung ba'i phyir sngar dang phyis skye ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222489#222499#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1098# sbyin pa dang   tshul khrims dang  brtson 'grus ni bsod nams kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o // / +bzod pa dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab ni ye shes kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: gnyis pa ni 'di lta ste / / +gong nas zhes bya ba la gong ma'i sgra ni gzugs kyi khams dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222500#222507#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1100# bzod pa dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab ni ye shes kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gsum pa ni snga ma gnyis ni bsod nams yin no // /

column3: ci'i phyir de lta zhe na / / +gang shi 'phos pa de nyid du bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222508#222517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1100;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1102# phyi ma gcig ni ye shes yin no // / +gsum pa ni  rnam pa gnyis kar gtogs pa yin te / /

column3: phyi rol gyi sa  bon dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +gang du sa bon btab pa de nyid du myu gu skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222518#222529#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1102;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1104# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las ji skad du / / +tshogs pa gnyis kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsdu ba ji lta bu zhe na / /

column3: mtshams sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod par gtogs pa'i dge ba la sogs pa dad pa la sogs pa dang  mi dge ba la sogs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa skyes nas thob pa rnams kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222528#222542#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1105;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1106;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1107;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1108;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1109# tshig le'ur byas pa las / / +dang po gnyis ni bsod nams tshogs // /

column3: dper na  khyu mchog ni ba'i tshogs kyi mdun du 'gro'o // / +de bzhin du thob pa rnams sngar skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222543#222552#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1107;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1108;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1111# lnga po yang ni ye shes tshogs // / +zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / /

column3: gsum pa ni 'di lta ste thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba la tshogs pa rnams kyi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222551#222561#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1111;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1112;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1113# sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims ni bsod nams kyi bdag nyid do // / +shes rab ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid do // /

column3: de la skyes nas thob pa'i shes rab la brten nas thos    pa las byung ba skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222562#222570#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1112;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1113;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1115# bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan gsum ni tshogs gnyi ga'i rgyu ste / / +'di ltar gnyi ga'i byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#840706#840706#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12233;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12234# phal che ba'i tshul las rten nas lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu la sogs pa la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar de dag gi snga phyi'i rim pa med pa'i phyir dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mi 'dra ba'i phyir  ma 'ongs pa yang yin par 'dod do // /

column3: thos pa las byung ba la brten nas bsams pa las byung ba skye'o // / +bsams pa las byung ba la brten nas bsgoms pa las byung ba skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222569#222585#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1113;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1115;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1116;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1117;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1118# 'di ltar gnyi ga'i byed pa'i phyir ro // / +lnga po de dag kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te / / +'di ltar ye shes kyis bsdos pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: ming la brten nas don go ba ni thos pa las byung ba'o // / +ming dang don la dmigs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba ste / /
ched 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren to // / +ched 'ga' ni don gyis yi ge 'dren to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222586#222593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1117;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1118;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1119;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# bzhi pa ni dang po gsum ni bsod nams yin no // / +phyi ma gcig ni ye shes so / / +gzhan ni    rnam pa gnyi gar gtogs te / /

column3: de la dmigs pa kho na ni bsgoms pa las byung ba ste / / +de ni yi ge la mi ltos par don la 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403223#2403224#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221517#221518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222594#222602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1119;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# gzhan ni    rnam pa gnyi gar gtogs te / / +mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241016#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261135#261137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /
column9: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column10: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403706#2403707#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11033;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11034# 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis nyon mongs pa'i shing bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang / /
column12: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404606#2404606#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11110# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang don gyis mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405220#2405221#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11168;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11169# 'di  ltar sa 'di la rnam pa thams cad du chos sna tshogs ston pa la dbang thob pas thogs pa med cing yangs shing rgya che ba'i blo gros thob pa de yang shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs ba'i blo gros zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221250#221251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_904# bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed  pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224977#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# bsdu  ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225804#225807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1524;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1525# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column18: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214079#214079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_10;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_11# kun tu rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len de dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang   dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /
column19: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column20: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226166#226167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216491#216491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /

column3: lhan cig skyes pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang  lhan cig skyes pa gang yin pa dang  de ltar byung ba gang yin pa de bkol te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#468581#468582#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2516# bstan bcos rnams  las kyang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358245#2358247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5527# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  de'i 'gab lo la bsgyur ba  las bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222157#222162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1046;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# bsam gtan la brten nas thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing phung po la sogs pa rnams sna tshogs la MKHAS PA GANG YIN PA DE NI ye shes kyi phyogs kyi bsam gtan yin no zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222601#222613#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233775#233778#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2530;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2531# mdo'i tshig dang sbyar ba ni med do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa las ni / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247386#247390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4250# gnas gyur pa'i mtshan  nyid de yang rgyu cher ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag dang  bstan bcos kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan  ba dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#218506#218506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_569# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237745#237746#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3033# rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las 'chad do // /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535790#535791#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11242# rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bye brag gi don rgya cher bshad pa ni  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237661#237661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3024# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#484040#484041#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4520;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4521# 'di ni theg pa gnyis kyi yid la byed pa rgyangs bcad de spangs pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de bzhin du bshad do // /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536928#536928#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11399# rgya cher ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537341#537341#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11471# rgya cher ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382539#2382539#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8567# mdo  dag dang mi mthun pa dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de lta bu'i bshad pa med pa'i phyir tshad mar gzung du mi rung ngo // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353974#2353974#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5017# chos kyi mdo bzhi'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de ma yin pa gzhan ni ma 'ongs pa ste / / +dper na be'u ma'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba bzhin du shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222614#222628#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1121;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1122# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222666#222667#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1126;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1127# shes rab kyi  pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa rab tu sel ba'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +drug pa ni dang po lnga ni bsod nams yin la / /

column3: de la zhes bya ba ni thob pa rnams la'o // / +mdor bstan na zhes bya ba ni mdor bshad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222625#222635#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1121;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1122;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1123# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // / +lnga pa ni dang po lnga bsod nams yin la / /

column3: 'dod  pa smos pas gzugs na spyod pa bsal bar 'gyur ro // / +dge ba dang mi dge ba smos pas ni 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs bsal bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222634#222647#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1122;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1124# phyi ma gcig ni ye shes yin te / / +gya'i mdo las ji skad du grogs su gyur pa'i  lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222416#222419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang gnyi ga las bzlog pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi ni lhan cig skyes pa ste de ltar byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222646#222655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1124;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1125;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1126# spong pa'i lam du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367865#2367865#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6753# de la yang bcos ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde la ni tshig 'bru rgyas pa yin la don bsdus pa yin pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la ni don rgyas pa yin la tshig 'bru bsdus pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin bar rig par bya'o zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224163#224164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1329# bla na med pa mi skye ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273888#273889#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7525;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7526# de'i phyir mdo 'di nyid las 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel  pa las ; /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270688#270689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341447#2341448#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3545;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3546# des ni sems can yongs su bzla bar mdzad // / +ces gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379454#2379456#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8193;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194# chos de rkyen las skyes ma yin // / +zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380257#2380259#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8291;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8292# sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rab tu dbye bar bya'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: phyi nas  skyes pa ni 'das pa'i ste / / +ma 'ongs pa ni ma yin no // / +tshe phyi mas yang tshe phyi ma pa ma yin par 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222656#222663#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1125;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1126;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1127# pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag ni bsod nams bskyed pa'o // / +shes rab kyi  pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa rab tu sel ba'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: tshe phyi ma pa ma yin pa yang tshe phyi ma par 'gyur ro // / +de ltar bye brag tu byas na rnam par smin pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i gzugs gzhan gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i thob pa  grub par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222664#222681#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1126;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1127;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1129;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1130# shes rab kyi  pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa rab tu sel ba'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +drug pa ni dang po lnga ni bsod nams yin la / /

column3: ci lung du ma bstan pa'i chos thams cad kyi nges pa 'di yin nam / / +smras pa ma yin te // / +mngon par shes pa'i sems dang sprul pa'i sems ma gtogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222682#222693#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1129;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1130;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1131;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1132# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo'i nang nas / / +seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250674#250674#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4606# 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo'i nang nas dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: de la mngon par shes pa gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa ste / / +lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba'o // / +sprul pa'i sems kyang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222692#222701#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1131;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1132;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1133;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1134# de la bsod nams kyis brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas / /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#909123#909123#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2372;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2373# pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu PHYIN PA STE / / +chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes pas ma ni shes rab kyi pha  rol tu phyin pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1260518#1260518#TD4051E.TXT.r_4112;TD4051E.TXT.r_4113;TD4051E.TXT.r_4114# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu PHYIN PA STE / / +'di ltar de nyid las  kyang ; / +byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byong ngo // /

column3: sprul pa'i sems de dag kyang bcu bzhi ste / / +bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa la sprul pa'i sems gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222700#222710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1133;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1134;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1135# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyis brgyan pa ma yin pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'o // / +bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa la gsum mo // / +bsam gtan     // / +gsum pa'i sa pa la bzhi'o // / +bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa la lnga'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222709#222718#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1135;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1136;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1137# sa dang po nas sa  bcu'i bar gyi gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / /

column3: ci'i phyir de dag gi thob pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin zhe na / / +stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba'i khyad par las grub pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222719#222730#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1136;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1137;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1138;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1139# de la sa zhes bya ba ni shes rab la bya ste / / +de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#453092#453094#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_393;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_394# yang dag pa dang gnyi ga la brten nas rang gi ngo bo dang gzugs  brnyan yod par bstan pa de ji ltar shes PAR BYA ZHE NA / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514825#514826#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8491;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8492# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533710#533710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10965# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340795#2340795#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3484# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las zhi gnas ni 'di lta ste / /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341359#2341360#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3536;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3537# theg pa chen po zhes bya ba de yang bstan bcos mos pa bskyed pa dang  'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i mdo las ni don rnam pa gsum gyis theg pa chen po zhes bstan to // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni don rnam pa bdun gyis theg pa chen po zhes ston to // /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346013#2346013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4070# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med    kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347819#2347820#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4243# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366105#2366106#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6500# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397774#2397775#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10296# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni / /
column14: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222271#222272#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column15: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222388#222389#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1082# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ji skad du / /
column16: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247526#247529#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4266;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4267# skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang  chos kyi sku de la ni spros pa dang  skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ste / / +'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263325#263326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217# yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column18: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269929#269931#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7051# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column19: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397968#2397969#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10318# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#454810#454810#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_631# de la gsum pa bsags pa rnam par phye bas sems kyi khyad par bstan pa zhes bya ba yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las ji skad du brgyus zhing 'brel pa'i phyir mdo zhes bya'o zhes  'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#482984#482984#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4354# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2318301#2318301#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_884# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las kyang / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360514#2360515#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5785# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391342#2391342#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9548# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las / /
column25: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372838#2372839#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7387;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7388# bshad  pa gzhan du na mngon par zhen pa'i ming dmigs su med pas mthong ba'i tshe kun du brtags pa'i ming la sogs pa de dag gi gnas gzhan gyi dbang dang ming la sogs pa la yang mi rtog ste de ni 'di skad du de bzhin nyid bsgom pa la zhugs nas mngon par zhen pa bsal ba na gzhan gyi dbang dang ming  la sogs pa snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i stong pa dang  rang gi ngo bo nyid ci yang med par brtags pa la rnam par sel bar zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur te / / +de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227737#227737#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column27: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221407#221407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column28: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#483769#483769#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4468;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4469# nam ring yang nam ring bar mi tshor ba bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par lon pa dag kyang de bzhin te / / +de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column29: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487079#487079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4940# shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das    kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni gnas yod pa dang  tha dad pa'i tshig med par bstan pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang  bstan ba de rgya cher spel du rung ba dang  bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs  pas tshig tha dad pa med par bstan pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ngo // /
column30: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227342#227342#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1726# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346574#2346574#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4132;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4133# mtshon gyis ni rang nyid la mi gcod do zhes brjod pa dag dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477931#477932#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3632;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3633# mkhyen pa la 'dres pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan  pa rnams kyang yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las sems can rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pa la ltos nas / /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358147#2358147#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5514;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5515# bsgom pa rnam pa lngas logs shig tu 'bras bu'i ming rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa ste / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column34: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505733#505733#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7403# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column35: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#486683#486683#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4887;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4888# 'bras bu de'i spong ba dang  de'i 'bras bu'o // / +de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus  pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473483#473483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column37: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475460#475460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid YIN PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column38: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column39: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: bzo'i gnas las kyang cung zad yin te shin tu  goms pa'o // / +'di lta ste / / +lha'i bu las sna tshogs pa dang  lha ma yin shes ldan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222731#222742#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1138;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1139;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1140;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1141;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1142;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1143# chos bdag med pa'i shes pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni sa zhes bya'o zhes bshad  do // / +bdun pa ni snga ma lnga ni bsod nams yin la / /

column3: spyod lam pa yang yin te / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang  'di lta ste / / +tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lo // / +de'i thob pa ni 'das pa dang de ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222743#222756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1141;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1142;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1143;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1144;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1145# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las / / +ji skad du / / +lnga po yang ni ye shes tshogs // /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thob pa ni dus gsum ste / / +dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro // / +rnam par smin pa las byung ba dang  spyod lam dang  bzo'i gnas gzhan thams cad kyi ni lhan cig skyes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222757#222770#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1144;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1145;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1146;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1147;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1148;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1149# zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar phyi ma shes rab kyi sa yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang ye shes     // / +kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: bsgribs pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs kyi ni  bsgrib pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222771#222779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1148;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1149;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1150;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1151# 'di ltar shes rab kyis yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro // / +brgyad pa ni sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims  dang  bsam gtan ni bsod nams so // /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis dris na ma shes la / / +de 'khor dang 'brel pa'i phyir gyo byas te lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas byung bar gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222778#222796#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1149;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1150;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1151;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1152;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1153# brgyad pa ni sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims  dang  bsam gtan ni bsod nams so // / +shes rab ni ye shes so // / +bzod pa dang brtson 'grus gnyis kar gtogs te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222479#222479#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1095# dge bsnyen gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i mdo'i nang nas bkod pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: de'i gyo las byung ba'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs  so ; / / +ci'i phyir de lhan cig skyes pa yin zhe na mthu chung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222797#222809#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1152;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1153;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1156# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo'i nang nas shes rab bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du / / +ji ltar tshogs rnam pa gnyis la mkhas pa gang yin zhe na / /
column5: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1134113#1134113#TD4047E.TXT.r_1864# gang bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4013E.TXT.r#615936#615936#TD4013E.TXT.r_788;TD4013E.TXT.r_789;TD4013E.TXT.r_790# goms par byed pa'i phyir bsod nams so // / +shes pa'i phyir ye shes te / / +bsod nams dang ye shes de dag gi mi zad pa ni yongs su mi gtugs pa'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1321373#1321373#TD4037E.TXT.r_781;TD4037E.TXT.r_782# tshad med par rig par bya'o // / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyu gang zhe na / /
column8: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136987#1136987#TD4047E.TXT.r_2264;TD4047E.TXT.r_2265# don med par 'gyur ro // / +bsod nams dang ye shes bstan pas bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi 'bras bu  yang bstan par nus pas / /

column3: ci'i phyir mthu chung ba nyid yin zhe na sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams na bsgribs pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs med ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222807#222820#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1156;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1157;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1158# bsod  nams dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang yin pa'o // / +bsod nams gang zhe na 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172536#2172536#TD4025E.TXT.r_932;TD4025E.TXT.r_933;TD4025E.TXT.r_934# gnas gsum gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +mngon par  shes pa dang  zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang  zag pa zad pa'o // /

column3: kun nas slong ba po med pa'i phyir ro // / +'di na 'jig  tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ni bsgribs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222821#222828#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1158;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1159;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1160# shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas 'dus pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /

column3: de gnyis ni rnam par rig byed kun nas slong ba por mi 'gyur te // / +de gnyis nang du bltas te 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222829#222839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1159;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1160;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1161# zhib tu de  nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kun kyang bsod nams dang ye shes su gtogs pa yin te / /

column3: phyi rol du bltas pa'i sems kyis ni rnam par rig byed bskyed do // / +gal te de lta na log par lta ba  las log par rtog pa 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222838#222852#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1160;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1161;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1162# yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kun kyang bsod nams dang ye shes su gtogs pa yin te / / +pha rol tu phyin pa re re yang phan tshun gcig gis gcig grogs byas pas so so nas drug po dag dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: log par rtog pas log pa'i tshig smra'o // / +log pa'i tshig las log pa'i las kyi mtha'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222853#222863#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1163;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1164# mdo sde dang bstan bcos  rnams las dbang po'i rjes su rnam pa sna tshogs mi mthun par bstan pa yin la 'gal ba med do //// /
column5: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225839#225843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1526;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1527;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1528# pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan  bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu dgu pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219443#219447#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_693;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_694# don rnam pa 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni bla na med pa zhes  bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu bdun pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216358#216362#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_286;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_287;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad bstan pa dang  'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub kyi yon tan  brjod pa'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu drug pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402890#2402894#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10941;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10943# rigs kyi bu de ltar yan lag bcu gcig po de dag gis sa rnams ma lus par bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa  spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //// / +bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column9: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2621194#2621194#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10562;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10563# gang la rgod pa lhag la le lo ni bag la zha bar 'dug pa de ni rgod pa yin pas 'di  gnyis la bye brag yod pa'i phyir mdo las so sor smos pa dang 'gal ba med do //// / +bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa / /

column3: log pa'i las kyi mtha' las log pa'i 'tsho ba 'byung ngo zhes bya ba mdo'i tshig 'di ji ltar sbyar / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397096#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397228#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397246#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397571#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214017#214023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3# bam po lnga bcu lnga pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216182#216185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220199#220202#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221935#221937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1013# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222862#222874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1163;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165# mdo sde dang bstan bcos  rnams las dbang po'i rjes su rnam pa sna tshogs mi mthun par bstan pa yin la 'gal ba med do //// / +bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223638#223641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1263# mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad  ces gsol to // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226439#226441#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236440#236443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2881;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2882# bam po drug cu gsum pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to ; / /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236635#236638#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245208#245210#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3998# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis    bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246049#246050#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4094# de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121003#3121006#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4182# de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column21: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228538#228538#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1865# bam po drug cu pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239774#239775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3312# bam po drug cu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column23: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237243#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column24: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219871#219872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224732#224732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1407# brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur bas zhib tu ma  bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column26: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244097#244097#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3856# bskal pa dpag tu med pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs  so ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column28: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231593#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column29: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235731#235731#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2794# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad  par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: 'di la nyes pa med de / / +rgyu 'byung ba    ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +rgyu 'byung ba dang de'i skad cig la 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222875#222884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244119#244120#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3859# yon tan ni gang lags par rig par  bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345349#2345349#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4005# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs pa'i sems yul du gyur pa na nang du yid la bgyid pa'i sems ji srid du  lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ma thob pa de'i bar du yid la bgyid pa de la ming ci zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang rjes su 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269394#269396#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6980# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358796#2358796#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5586# bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang las rtogs shing gang las thob par 'tshal bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gsum pa rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i sa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271904#271905#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7294# bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon  par byang chub pa gang lags pa dang  yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang lags pa dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gang lags pa rnam pa gsum po de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la  sogs pa la gsum po dag gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248690#248690#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262775#262775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6128# bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa du mchis par rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rgol ba dag gi rjes su bzlas te rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: de la mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rgyu kun nas slong ba ste / / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba slong ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388442#2388446#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222885#222894#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236669#236672#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237159#237163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238742#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / /
column9: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236479#236483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column10: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237278#237282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220249#220251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_790# bslab par bya ba'i rnam grangs mang nyung bstan pa'i sgo dang  bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang  mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bslab par  bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par  dag pa'i rnam pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo dang  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis las rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang  shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa     // /

column3: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni rgyu kun nas slong ba dang  de'i skad cig la kun nas slong ba'o // / +de ltar gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de brjod pa'i phyir de la nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223705#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228594#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231630#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380776#2380777#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244131#244133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column16: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245278#245282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005# de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column19: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361725#2361725#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5947# de dag bsdus pa las so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa 'dris pa rnam par bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column20: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264934#264934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column21: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272668#272668#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column22: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361674#2361674#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5943# de dag so so las yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ma  'dres par rnam par bshad pa bston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol pa'o // /
column23: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column24: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247722#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column25: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248700#248701#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column26: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398352#2398354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10369;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370# ji ltar yan lag rnam pa bcu gcig gis sa rnams bsdus par  'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa yan lag bcu gcig sdud par ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column27: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231619#231620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column28: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245239#245241#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column29: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229978#229978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2055;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056# 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa'o // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column30: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230654#230654#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2140;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2141# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi rnam par smin pa 'bras bu rnam par 'byed pa'o // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column31: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253206#253206#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4893# 'di ni dang po'i dngos po bzhi rnam par bshad pa'o // / +'di  yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column32: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239835#239835#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3318# 'di ni dang po'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa'i grangs mang nyung rab tu dbye ba'o // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253419#253419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4930# dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad par ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /

column3: lhag ma gang zhe na sems las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge ba ste / / +'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni so sor dus gsum pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399142#2399144#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10457;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10458# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni gong du rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u las bshad pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa de las yang dag  par 'das nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rgyud la yod pa'i 'jug go zhes gsungs so // /

column3: rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa'o // / +slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyi ni zhes bya ba de la slob pa rnams kyi ni slob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223012#223023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do zhes bstan pa dang  mdo dag las ji tsam du theg pa chen po bstan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu  phyin pa'i sde snod de zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: mi slob pa rnams kyi ni mi slob pa'o // / +slob pa yang     // / +ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams kyi ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos de dag gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223024#223036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do zhes bstan pa dang  mdo dag las ji tsam du theg pa chen po bstan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu  phyin pa'i sde snod de zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la rgya che ba dang  zab par bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1035448#1035448#TD4054E.TXT.r_7210;TD4054E.TXT.r_7211# de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'o // / +ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la rgya che ba dang zab par yang bstan ce na / /
column6: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2306000#2306000#TD4049E.TXT.r_3216;TD4049E.TXT.r_3217# der pha rol TU PHYIN PA RNAMS KYI grangs bstan pa dang  mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  go rims bstan pa dang  nges pa'i tshig bstan pa dang  bsgom pa bstan pa dang  rab tu dbye ba bstan pa dang  bsdus pa bstan pa dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan  pa dang  yon tan gyi bsngags pa bstan pa dang  gcig la gcig nges par bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la rgya che ba dang  zab par bstan ce na / /

column3: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams te bslab pa gsum la mi slob pa'i phyir ro // / +mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa zhes  bya ba'am / / +mi slob pa zhes bya ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223037#223045#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1183# gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la rgya che ba dang  zab par bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +de'i 'og tu chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu dag las thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab gya nom pas  nan tan gyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // /

column3: slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba smras pa / / +slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'o zhes bstan bcos las 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223046#223059#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1183;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1184;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1185# de'i 'og tu chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu dag las thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab gya nom pas  nan tan gyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // /

column3: ci'i phyir de lta zhe na / / +bral ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de la zag  pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa rnams dang  so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang  'jig rten pa'i lam gyis thob pa de thams cad ni slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223060#223077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1184;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1185;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1186;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1187# chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu ni / / +gong du bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam  gyis thob pa'i ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'o // / +slob pa'i lam gyis so sor brtags pas 'gog pa 'thob pa ni rigs na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223078#223090#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1186;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1187# mdo'i  tshig 'di la bshad pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re chos spyod rnam pa bcu ni shes rab rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir shes rab gsum ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i phyir te / /

column3: mi slob pas go so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ji ltar 'thob / / +des kyang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223091#223099#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1187;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1188;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1189# kha cig na re chos spyod rnam pa bcu ni shes rab rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir shes rab gsum ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230837#230837#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2156# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni go rims nor ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las 'bras bu bdun bstan pa dang  mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dus bzhi po dag na bral ba'i  thob pa'i rnyed pa thob pa rnyed de / / +de la mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi bral ba'i thob pa'i rnyed pa ni dus bzhi po dag na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223100#223115#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1188;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1189;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1190;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1191# de'i phyir mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang /// / +chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu po de dag la thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis zhes gsungs so // /

column3: 'dod pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi ni dus gsum po dag na'o // / +gzugs na spyod pa dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang  bar bya ba rnams kyi dgra bcom pa'i dus na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223116#223130#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1190;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1191;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1192;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1193# gzhan yang dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / / +chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu po dag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du / /

column3: gang bar ma do'i spong ba de ni 'bras bu'i lam gyis bsdus par rig par bya'o // /

column3: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad dang  de dang ldan pa tshor ba la sogs pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523839#523841#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9679;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9680# khams bco brgyad po dag la dmigs pa ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las / /

column6: 0.018#TD4032E.TXT.r#1920144#1920145#TD4032E.TXT.r_53# nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba thob pa dang  bstan bcos dbus dang mtha'  rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'di ni sems la gnas pa'i phyir dang 'di zhes mngon sum du bstan to // /

column3: bsgom  pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa bcu po dag dang de dag dang ldan pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa dang  rnam par smin pa las byung ba dang  spyod lam pa dang  bzo'i gnas dang  sprul pa'i sems dang  gang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyi ni bsgom pas spang    bar bya ba'i thob pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223177#223192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1202;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1203;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1204;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1205;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1206;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1207;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1208;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1209# tshig le 'ur byas pa las / / +de ni chos spyod rnam bcu dang / /

column3: dri ma med pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i  so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o // /
