column3: de ni 'thob pa med pa brjod par bya ste / / +de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o // / +thob pa med pa ni thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can ma yin la lung du ma bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223201#223221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1211;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1212;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1214# de nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +theg pa chen po chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4027E.TXT.r#559197#559202#TD4027E.TXT.r_1241# theg pa chen po'i ye ge 'dri ba dang  mchod pa dang  gzhan dgal sbyin pa dang  gzhan klog pa la nyan pa dang  bdag nyid klog pa dang  len pa dang  tshig dang don 'chad pa dang  kha ton byed pa dang  sems pa dang sgom  pa'o // /

column3: dge ba ma yin te dge ba'i rtsa ba chad  pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang chad par mi 'gyur te / /
dge ba'i thob pa med pa yod pa'i phyir ro // / +mi dge ba yang ma yin te / / +'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba la thob pa med pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223222#223233#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1214;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1215;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1216# yi ge 'dri ba dang  mchod pa dang  gzhan dag la sbyin pa dang  gzhan klog pa dang  nyan pa dang  bdag nyid klog pa dang  len pa dang  tshig dang don 'chad pa dang  kha ton byed pa dang   sems pa dang  bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung ba yin no zhes zer te / / +bshad pa ni phyi ma bzang ngo // /
column5: 0.018#TD4027E.TXT.r#559169#559169#TD4027E.TXT.r_1234;TD4027E.TXT.r_1235# yid la byed pa sgrub pa ste // / +de yang chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus yongs su gzung bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro // / +de'i phyir thob pa med pa de ni thob pa bzhin  du bye brag mang du med de rnam pa'i khyad par du ma med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223234#223248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1216;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1217;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1218# bstan bcos de las yid la byed pa yang dag par sgrub pa de yang chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus yongs su 'dzin pas so zhes 'byung bas so // /

column3: 'on kyang zhig pa zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i chos rnams te / / +de ltar gyi dus las rab tu zhig pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223249#223260#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1217;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1218;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1219# byang chub sems kyi  rjes su srung BA ZHES BYA BA NI GSUM pa byang chub kyi sems srung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +yongs su mi nyams par srung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems srung ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa rnams te / / +de ltar gyi dus su ma phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223261#223268#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1219;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1220# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rgya cher bshad pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mdo las    bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar tshogs na  gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu 'byin gyi rdzas kyi 'bras bu ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223269#223276#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1220;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1221# byang chub sems kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de la 'das pa spangs pa rnams kyi thob pa med pa ni dus gsum pa'o // / +de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa ma phyin pa rnams kyi yang dus gsum pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223277#223288#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1220;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1221;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1222;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1223# byang chub sems kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin no // / +dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa la brten pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i mtshan nyid ston te / /

column3: de ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni dus gnyis pa ste 'das pa dang ma  'ongs pa'o // / +de yang lung du ma bstan par shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223289#223298#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1222;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1223;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1224# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du / / +yan lag brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya ste / /

column3: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med par rtogs pa rnams kyi ni so sor khams gsum pa'o // / +'dod par gtogs pa rnams kyi khams gsum pa ni de la thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'i yon tan ma thob pa  rnams kyi dang  'dod chags dang ma bral bas ma thob pa gzugs na spyod pa'i skye bas 'thob pa rnams kyi dang  thos pa las byung ba rnams kyi dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams kyi dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i skye bas 'thob pa rnams kyi dang  bsgoms pa las     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223299#223309#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1223;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1226# yan lag brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas shing ma nyams pa dang   skyon med par byed pas tshul khrims la gnas pa yin / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223309#223326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1229;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1230;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1231# blo ma byang ba ma yin pas mang du thos pa yin / / +bsgoms PA LAS BYUNG BA'I DGE ba gang yang rung ba thob cing / /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354178#1354188#TD4037E.TXT.r_5100;TD4037E.TXT.r_5101;TD4037E.TXT.r_5102;TD4037E.TXT.r_5103# byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims rnams la gnas shing ma nyams pa dang  skyon  med par byed pas tshul khrims la gnas pa yin / / +blo ma byang ba ma yin pas mang du thos pa yin / /

column3: byung ba rnams kyi'o // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i gang zag ni khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams dang yang ldan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223327#223335#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1229;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1230;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1232# tshe 'di  la rang gi bde bar gnas pa yal bar bor nas / / +gzhan dag la sbyor ba yin / / +gzhan dag la chos ston pa na bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pas dran pa dang  spobs pa nyams pa med pas 'jigs pa med pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354203#1354210#TD4037E.TXT.r_5105;TD4037E.TXT.r_5106;TD4037E.TXT.r_5107# de tshe 'di la rang gi bde  bar gnas pa yal bar bor nas gzhan dag gi don la sbyor ba yin / / +de gzhan dag la chos ston pa ni bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pas dran pa dang  spobs pa nyams pa med pas 'jigs pa med pa yin / /

column3: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa'i gang zag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin no // / +dbang po rtul  po yang dbang po rnon pos bsdus pa'i dge ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223336#223348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1232# gzhan dag la chos ston pa na bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pas dran pa dang  spobs pa nyams pa med pas 'jigs pa med PA YIN TE / / +gzhan dag gis brnyas pa rnams dang  'phya ba dang  bsting ba dang   ngan du brjod pa dang  ngan pa 'ongs pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams dang  sems can gyi log par zhugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bzod pa yin / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354219#1354226#TD4037E.TXT.r_5107;TD4037E.TXT.r_5108# gzhan dag gis brnyas pa rnams dang  'phya ba dang  bsting ba dang  ngan du brjod pa dang  ngan du  smra ba la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams dang  sems can gyi log par zhugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnams bzod pa yin / /

column3: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i skye bas 'thob pa rnams kyang bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin no // / +de bzhin du gzugs med pa na spyod par yang ji ltar mthun mthun du brjod par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223349#223363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1232;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1233;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1234# gzhan dag gis brnyas pa rnams dang  'phya ba dang  bsting ba dang   ngan du brjod pa dang  ngan pa 'ongs pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams dang  sems can gyi log par zhugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bzod pa yin / / +'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston pa la stobs dang ldan zhing ngal ba med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin / /

column3: khams gsum pa'i de ni ngo bo nyid du na gang du skyes pa de nyid yin par rig par bya'o // / +chos kyi gnas kyi dbang gis ni khams gsum par rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223362#223380#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1234;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1235# tshig gi chos nyid  las ma nyams shing gsal ba tshig gi bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i tshig dang ldan pa yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / /

column3: thob pa med pa la ni dri ma med pa gang yang med do // / +gal te yod pa lta na zag pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir  'phags pa nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223380#223390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1235;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1236;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1237# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi mdo dang sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228933#228935#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1913# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu ni 'og nas mdo las bstan pa    bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526823#526823#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10081# la lar ni lnga kho na'o zhes gsungs te 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo DANG DRI MA MED PAR GRAGS pas bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: so so'i skye bo nyid ces bya ba la / / +so so'i skye bo nyid gang yin zhe na / / +'phags pa'i chos rnams ma thob pa'o zhes bya ba de la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223388#223398#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1235;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1236;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1238# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi mdo dang sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +gzhan  yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354435#1354436#TD4037E.TXT.r_5141;TD4037E.TXT.r_5142# stobs kyi rigs kyi le'u las rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste / /

column3: 'phags pa'i chos ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas bzung nas mi skye ba shes pa'i bar dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223399#223409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1238;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1239# de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste / / +dus dus su nad gyog dang  tha mal pa'i gyog bya ba dang  byams pa dang  gus pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan     // /
column5: 0.007#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354445#1354458#TD4037E.TXT.r_5143# dus dus  su nad gyog dang  tha mal pa'i gyog byed pa byams pa dang  gus pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod par bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang   mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pa chos dang mthun pa'i don la dbang byed la / /

column3: de dag  ma thob pa'o // / +de dag kyang rigs gsum gyi phyir 'phags pa nyan thos ni rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyun dang mi ldan pas de so so'i skye bor 'gyur ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223408#223422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1238;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1239# dus dus su nad gyog dang  tha mal pa'i gyog bya ba dang  byams pa dang  gus pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan     // / +pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod pa bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gso sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod  pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pas chos dang mthun pas don la dbang byed la / /
column5: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339643#1339644#TD4037E.TXT.r_3247;TD4037E.TXT.r_3248# de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir bram ze dang  khyim bdag dad pa can rnams las chos bzhin du gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos     // /
column6: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#163159#163159#TD4035E.TXT.r_6691# gang du 'di lta bu'i bza' ba dag za zhing btung ba dag 'thung ba dang  de lta bu'i gos dang  zas dang  mal stan dang  nad kyi gso sman dang   yo byad rnams rnyed pa'i nye du de dag dang  bdag ci'i phyir bral bar gyur / /

column3: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa yang so so'i skye bo yin par 'gyur ram / / +de ni thob  pa med pas gang ma thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223423#223434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1239;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1240# pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod pa bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gso sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod  pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pas chos dang mthun pas don la dbang byed la / /
column5: 0.008#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354467#1354467#TD4037E.TXT.r_5143# dus dus  su nad gyog dang  tha mal pa'i gyog byed pa byams pa dang  gus pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod par bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang   mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pa chos dang mthun pa'i don la dbang byed la / /

column3: nyid ces bya ba'i sgra brjod dgos so // / +mi dgos te tshig gcig gis bsnan pa yang yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223433#223442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1239;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1240# pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod pa bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gso sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod  pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pas chos dang mthun pas don la dbang byed la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354475#1354477#TD4037E.TXT.r_5143;TD4037E.TXT.r_5144# dus dus  su nad gyog dang  tha mal pa'i gyog byed pa byams pa dang  gus pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  dus dus su gus par smra ba dang  phyag bya ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyar ba dang  'dud par bya ba dang  mchod par bya ba dang  chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang  zas dang   mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad sbyin pas mchod pa dang  gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang  rnam par gzud pa chos dang mthun pa'i don la dbang byed la / / +rnam par mi gyo zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'chags pa dang  dus shes par bya ba'i bsam  pas drung du 'gro ba dang  bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  'dri ba dang  nyan pa'o // /

column3: dper na chu za rlung za zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +gang dag rgyun la 'phags pa'i chos ma skyes pa ni so so'i skye bo nyid du 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na rgyun la 'phags  pa'i chos 'byung ba las 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyun gzhan med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223443#223452#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1241# rnam par mi gyo zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'chags pa dang  dus dus su shes par bya ba'i bsam pas drung du 'gro ba dang  bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  dri ba dang nyan  pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223453#223467#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1243# rnam par mi gyo zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'chags pa dang  dus dus su shes par bya ba'i bsam pas drung du 'gro ba dang  bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  dri ba dang nyan  pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bas bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rgyun mi 'chad par nan tan gyis sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan te / /

column3: bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir de dag nyid so so'i skye bo nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223468#223476#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1243;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1244# rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bas bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rgyun mi 'chad par nan tan gyis sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan te / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ji skad du / /

column3: ji ste ma skyes pa tsam rdzas med pa yin na ni / / +de lta na go mdo las dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa    ci yang med do zhes nga smra'o zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223475#223495#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1246# rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi  'chad pa'i tshul du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517813#517818#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8821# de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bsgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +'thob pa'i bsgom pa dang  bstan pa'i bsgom pa dang  gnyen po'i bsgom pa dang  thag bsring ba'i bsgom pa'o 'di ltar  bsgom pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos gang la brten nas rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column6: 0.022#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692444#1692445#TD4048E.TXT.r_1219# bstan pa la mos pa dang  ro myong ba dang  rjes su yi rang ba dang  mngon par dga' ba yid la byed pas kyang rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#1253467#1253468#TD4051E.TXT.r_3017# 'di ltar 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la kun du spyod pa'i sbyor ba med kyang rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sbyor na  tshul khrims 'chal bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na / /

column3: so so'i skye bo nyid ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o zhes ma yin nam 'di la nyes pa med de / / +dper na seng ge ma bsgribs shing lung du ma bstan pa'i phug tu gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223496#223510#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1247;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1248;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1249# 'di ni rgyun ring po dang  bar chad med pa dang  gus pa dang  lus med pa'i bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi las bar chad med pa'i bsgom pa nyid do // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam  du grub pa las ni yang yan lag gi sems kyis bsnan te / /

column3: srog chags rnams la gnod par byed pa de bzhin  du so so'i skye bo nyid la gnas te sdig pa dag rtsom mo // / +thob pa med pa de ni chos gang gis thob pa med pa de'i de rnyed nas rnam par nyams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223509#223528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1248;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1249;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1250;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1251# mdo 'di nyid kyi don ston to // / +de la mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par 'dod pas mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga phun sum tshogs par bya dgos te / /

column3: so so'i skye bo nyid khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa'i chos thob nas rnam par nyams so // / +phyi rol gyi lam gyis ni gong du skyes  nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo nyid rnam par nyams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223527#223546#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1250;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1251;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1252# dang po ni gsung  rab kyi yan lag la mos pa ste / / +gal te bstan pa la ma brten na spyod pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas spong ngo // / +de bas na bye brag tu smra ba las kyang 'phags pa ni sngar so so'i skye bo nyid rnam par nyams la phyis spong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223545#223561#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1252;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1253;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1254;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1255# gnyis pa ni 'phags pa'i gsung rab la mngon par yid ches par gyur nas chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus shes rab gsum skyed par byed de spyod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: so so'i skye bo ni sngar so so'i skye bo nyid spangs la phyis  rnam par nyams so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223562#223570#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1254;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1255;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1257# bzhi pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ste / / +rkyen khyad par du 'phags pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la thob pa bcad pa ni rnam par nyams pa'o // / +chos bcad pa ni spangs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223571#223578#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1257;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1258# myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +bstan    bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bsgom pa rnam pa lnga zhes bshad de / /

column3: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brjod par bya ste / / +snyoms par 'jug pa 'di la 'du shes med pas na 'di ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223579#223591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1258;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1259# bstan    bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bsgom pa rnam pa lnga zhes bshad de / / +kun tu spyod pa las sbyor bas bsgom pa dang  mos pas bsgom pa dang  yid la byed pas bsgom pa dang  thabs la mkhas pas bsgom pa dang  bya ba bsgrub pas bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356397#2356403#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5307# lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste / / +'dres par bsgom pa dang  mtshan ma med par bsgom pa dang  lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa dang  'bar bar bsgom pa dang  chog par mi  'dzin par bsgom pas so zhes 'byung ste / /

column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398502#2398502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10381;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10382# bcu gcig ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du rigs la gnas pa dang  mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa dang  rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa dang  lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang  lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang  byang chub kyi  phyogs dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang  bden pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang  mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i mtshan  ma med pa la gnas pa dang  rtsol ba med cing lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan  pa bzhin no // /

column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220256#220258#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_790# bslab par bya ba'i rnam grangs mang nyung bstan pa'i sgo dang  bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang  mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bslab par  bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par  dag pa'i rnam pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo dang  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis las rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang  shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo dang  pha rol tu phyin pa     // /

column3: de bas na 'gal  ba'i chos gzhan gang gis dus gzhan na mi skye ba thob pa ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223741#223750#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1273;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1274;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1275# grangs smos pa dang  rgyan gnyis so sor bstan pa dang  rkyen rnam pa gnyis so sor bsdu ba dang  rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir grangs de ltar nges par 'gyur ro     // /

column3: byis pa thar pa'i 'du shes can dag de skyed de / / +'phags pa dag ni srid pa las 'byung ba'i 'du shes can du mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223751#223760#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1274;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1275;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1276;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1277# 'di ni dang po grangs smos nas rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir grangs de ltar nges par 'gyur ro     // / +zhes mdor lan gsungs pa'o // /

column3: srid pas srid pa las mi 'byung ba dang thar pa dang thar pa'i lam mngon sum du gyur  pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223761#223778#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1276;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1277;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1278;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1279# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i ma do las ni dngos po gnyis te zhes 'byung ngo // / +sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen POR GYUR PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES bya ba ni gnyis pa rkyen  rnam pa gnyis so sor bstan pa ste / /

column3: 'phags pa'i lam gyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir // / +'phags pa rnams kyis ni de ngan song gi gnas lta bur dgongs pa'o // /
de'i phyir de thob pa ni nges par gyur pa la mi 'jug go // / +de'i rnam par smin pa la myong bar nges pas 'di ni myong bar 'gyur bas nges pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223779#223789#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1278;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1279;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1280# mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +de la dang po gsum ni sems can rnams la phan gdags pa yin la / /

column3: gdon mi za bar 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir ro // / +'dis ni 'di'i myong bar 'gyur ba ma nges pa nyid spong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223790#223800#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1280;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1281# phyi ma gsum ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas ni gsum pa dang po dang phyi ma'i rnam pa  gsum rkyen gnyis su so sor bsdu ba ston to // /

column3: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba nyid de dus gzhan ma yin no // / +'dis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin gyi 'phen pa ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223799#223809#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1280;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1281;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1282# phyi ma gsum ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas ni gsum pa dang po dang phyi ma'i rnam pa  gsum rkyen gnyis su so sor bsdu ba ston to // / +'di ltar sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa gsum ni sems can la phan 'dogs par byed do // /

column3: sems med pa'i phyir ro // / +sems    dang sems las byung ba 'gog pa'i bdag nyid du 'du shes med ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa myong ba de skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223810#223824#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1281;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1282;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1283# 'di ltar sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa gsum ni sems can la phan 'dogs par byed do // / +brtson 'grus la sogs pa gsum ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pas so // /

column3: 'dis ni 'di'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba spong ngo // / +'di ni 'bad pas 'thob kyi zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i stobs kyis bsgrub pa'i  phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223825#223838#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1283;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1284;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1285# dang po gsum gyis sems can rnams  la phan 'dogs pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pas ni yo byad nye bar bsgrubs nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs so // /
column5: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119113#3119120#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3951;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3952;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3953# de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pas ni sems can rnams la yo byad nye bar bsgrub pas phan 'dogs pas phan 'dogs so // / +tshul khrims kyis ni phongs pa dang  gnod pa dang rnam par tho 'tshams pa nye bar ni sgrub pa'i phan 'dogs pas phan 'dogs  so ; / /

column3: 'dod chags dang bral bas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di bsam gtan gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam gyis 'thob pa ma yin te ma goms pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223836#223848#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1284;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1285# tshul khrims ni gnod pa dang  phongs pa dang  rnam par tho 'tshams pa nye bar mi bsgrub pas sems can la phan 'dogs so // / +bzod  pas ni gnod pa dang  phongs pa dang  rnam par tho 'tshams pa de dag la ji mi snyam par bzod pas sems can la phan thogs SO ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni bzhi pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni 'gog pas na 'gog pa'o // / +sems dang sems las  byung ba'i chos rnams ni dgag par bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223849#223860#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1285;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1286;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1287# bzod  pas ni gnod pa dang  phongs pa dang  rnam par tho 'tshams pa de dag la ji mi snyam par bzod pas sems can la phan thogs SO ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni bzhi pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230034#230036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2062# 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang phyug dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams las shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta PA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste  bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239987#239989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3341# de'i phyir grogs yang dag par bcom pa'i bag la nyal zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362656#2362656#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6059# 'du byed thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang yin PA'O ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni  gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column8: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392000#2392001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9611# ji ltar  na sems kyi skye ba la mkhas pa yin zhe NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column9: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253185#253186#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4890# dngos po bzhi gang zhe NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231777#231779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2260# de la pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yang rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad  pa ston to // /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360870#2360872#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5829# ming gang zhe NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394280#2394280#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9886# de la gnas kyi gnas ngan len rig pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa go rims  bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241929#241929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3580# spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pa'i phyir ni nges rab tu phye ba yin NO ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kho na bstan pa dang  rkang la yod pa lta bu spangs pa nyid bstan cing logs shig tu rnam par phye ste ma bstan pa'o // /

column3: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni rdzas yin te snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas des ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzhan na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yang dag par 'gag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223859#223871#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1286;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1287;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1288;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1289# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +dang po phan 'dogs  pa gsum bstan pa dang  phyi ma gnyen por gyur pa gsum pa bstan pa ste / /

column3: 'byung ba mi rnyed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +ci yang  med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223872#223883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1288;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1289;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1290# 'di ni dang po sems can la phan 'dogs pa gsum bstan pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel pa'i mdo la sogs pa las / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341622#2341623#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3564# rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun  te mdo 'di nyid dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni khyab pa'i dmigs pa rnam pa bzhi'i ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni ma gsungs so // /

column3: srid pa'i rtse mo'i zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223884#223903#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1290;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1291# pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni go rims bzhin du phan  'dogs pa rnam pa gsum po yo byad nye bar bsgrubs nas phan 'dogs pa dang  gnod pa mi byed pas phan 'dogs pa dang  gnod pa byed pa la lan bya ba'i sems med pas phan 'dogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: ji ltar na sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur // / +smras pa / / +'byung ba chen po mnyam pa nyid du byed pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404822#2404824#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11130;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11131# gnas ba bcu'i 'grel pa las ni khams gsum pa las  thag ring por gyur cing chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang nye bar gyur pa'i phyir ring du song ba'i sa zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mtshan ma med pa'i gnas pa mthar phyin cing / /
column5: 0.022#TD4009E.TXT.r#329725#329725#TD4009E.TXT.r_1334;TD4009E.TXT.r_1335# byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste thog ma dang  bar ma dang  tha ma dag tu sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par sgrub pa'i     // / +gnas su gyur pas phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa byed pa thams cad kyis sems ma zin pa'i phyir sems dang mtshungs pa yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373072#2373073#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7409;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7410# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las     // / +bstan pa'i don brjod par bya'o // /

column3: 'byung ba chen po mnyam pa nyid ni gcig tu mkhregs par gyur pa ste / / +de'i phyir rdo rjes kyang shigs par mi nus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223904#223915#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1290;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1291;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1293# pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni go rims bzhin du phan  'dogs pa rnam pa gsum po yo byad nye bar bsgrubs nas phan 'dogs pa dang  gnod pa mi byed pas phan 'dogs pa dang  gnod pa byed pa la lan bya ba'i sems med pas phan 'dogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: je phra je phra nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems kyi 'og tu rnyed pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223914#223923#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1293# gzhan yang dang po gsum ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa dag yin te / / +de dag la yo byad sbyin zhing de dag la gnod par mi byed pa'i phyir dang  de dag gis gnod pa byas pa bzod cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de'i phyir srid pa'i rtse mo pa ste dge ba dang  skye gnas pa dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang  myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa ste zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223924#223935#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294# de dag la yo byad sbyin zhing de dag la gnod par mi byed pa'i phyir dang  de dag gis gnod pa byas pa bzod cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224069#224077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1310;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1312# nan tan gyis dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor zhing gnyen por bsgoms nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gnon cing nye bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus     // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502208#502209#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6942# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502830#502831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7038;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7039# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las ni 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtsod pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347967#2347967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4261# 'di ni bstan bcos sa mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528036#528036#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10248# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543035#543035#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320969#2320969#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536217#536217#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11297# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na / /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358455#2358456#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5554;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5555# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa ni brag pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir sa bcu dang sbyar te bstan to // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni rnam pa gsum du bsngags pa brjod nas 'bras bu lnga sdud par ston to // /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363683#2363691#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6188# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column15: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364571#2364572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column16: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224604#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /
column17: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519413#519413#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9048;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9049# yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni yang dag  pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520729#520729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9241;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9242# bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317526#2317526#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_784;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_785# gnyis pa gzhan med do zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes bshad de / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column20: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354317#2354317#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5057# gang zag gnyis po de  nyid la mtshan ma med par spyod pa can zhes kyang bya'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis ni tshogs kyi lam dang mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa / /

column3: dge ba dang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o // / +skyes nas myong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223934#223944#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1295# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba  ni phyir mi 'ong ba yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi'o // / +tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba 'byung bas skyo nas tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir de la 'jug ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223943#223952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1295;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1296# phyi ma gsum nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus kyis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par ma bcil / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223952#223965#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1296;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1297# bag la nyal ba thams cad ma bcom par yang nan tan  gyis dge ba'i phyogs rnams sgom par byed pas nyon mongs pa de dag gis dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i las bskyed par mi nus so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119149#3119154#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3956;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3957# de ni nyon mongs pas dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba las bskyod par mi nus so // /

column3: bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa snyoms par     // / +'jug go // / +de med pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam med pa'i phyir ro // /

column15: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250699#250699#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4609# tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis spyod par nus so zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: de'i 'brel  pas ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'o // / +de'i gnas pa ni 'brel pas bsdus pa rab tu 'bab pa gnas pa'o // /

column3: gang dang ldan na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa skad cig la gnas pa'i 'du byed rnams la yang sems can dmyal ba la sogs par bstan pa 'thob pa de ni srog gi dbang po  zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224223#224233#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1336# lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su myong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas sems can 'gro ba drug gi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa  drug bskyed pa yin pas mi mang mi nyung ngo zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: rnam par smin pa mngon par grub na zhes bya ba  smos te / / +'dir rnam par smin pa'i sgra ni srog gi dbang por bstan to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216493#216498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224277#224294#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1342;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# kha cig la ni don rnam pa gnyis kyis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yod de / / +mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226169#226170#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /

column6: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241689#241691#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3555# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du sa'i mdun rol dang  sa bcu po dag tu 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba la brten nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du sa re re zhing lpags shun la yod pa lta  bu la sogs pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /

column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra MO KUN DU 'BYUNG BA 'JIG tshogs la LTA BA LA SOGS PA'I ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column30: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229365#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: gzugs med par skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs la dge ba'i sems mngon du byed pa ni dad pa la sogs pa'o // / +bsgribs pa'i sems mngon du  byed pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o // /

column6: 0.016#TD4018E.TXT.r#3086925#3086926#TD4018E.TXT.r_10781# rab tu dag pa'i sa la gang  zag dang chos la bdag med pa khong du chud pa nas bdag dang bdag gir mngon par chags pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzung ba yongs su spangs te / /

column9: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#308627#308627#TD4026E.TXT.r_6147# 'khor ba'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yongs su longs spyod pa dang  sgrib pa lnga dor ba dang  nyan thos dang rang  sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dor ba dang  sa la 'jug pa dang  sa bdun pa la mtshan ma med par gnas pa dang  sa brgyad pa la lung bstan pa thob pa dang  dgu pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang  bcu pa la dbang bskur ba dang  gsum car la zhing rnam par dag  par bya ba'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas kyis la mthar thug par bya ba'i phyir / /
column10: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#283505#283505#TD4026E.TXT.r_1455# de bzhin nyid tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas nyid kyang de rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nyid     // /

column5: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032569#1032569#TD4054E.TXT.r_6818;TD4054E.TXT.r_6819# gcig la gcig rnam par nges par bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +de la grangs ni rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: med du zin na zhes bya ba ni gal te srog gi dbang po med par gyur na de'i tshe gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dge ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na 'jig pa dang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224362#224374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1354;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1355;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1356;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1357;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1358# nges pa'i grangs ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs ni drug kho na yod pas mi mang mi nyung ngo zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338019#2338023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3166;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3167# nges pa'i grangs ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs ni drug po kho na yod pas de las mi mang mi nyung ngo zhes bshad do // /

column3: 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams su lus kyi dbang po la  sogs pa 'thob pa dang  de'i rgyun 'chad pa gnyis kyis skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba brtag par nus la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224375#224394#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1357;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1360;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1364# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te / / +dang po ni mngon par mtho ba'i lam ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224422#224424#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1373# 'khor ba la mi gnas so zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224422#224433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1374# 'khor ba la mi gnas so zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: gzugs med pa na ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs med pa brjod do //// / +chos mngon pa la 'jug pa rgya cher 'grel pa snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224394#224404#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1367# 'di ni rkyen dang po'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin  pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032683#1032683#TD4054E.TXT.r_6836;TD4054E.TXT.r_6837# de la brten nas mngon par shes pa rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +yang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyid de / /
column6: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1209143#1209143#TD4047E.TXT.r_12537# de bzhin du sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ma shes pa'i phyir byang chub kyi thabs legs par rtogs pa ma yin no // /

column3: bam po lnga pa ste tha ma / / +skal pa  mnyam pa nyid ni sems can rnams kyi don gcig la 'dod pa'i rgyu'o zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224403#224414#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1369# gzhan yang de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin  pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i grangs su drug kho na'o // / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / /

column3: sems can rnams zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems can zhes brjod pa ma yin pa rtsa la sogs pa sel to // /
de ni don kyang yin la gcig kyang yin pas don gcig ste / / +de ni bdag la chags pa la sogs pa'o // / +de la 'dod pa  ni mngon par 'dod pa'o // /
column4: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858830#1858830#TD4039E.TXT.r_5083# snga ma bzhin du 'du byed thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang  de ma yin pa'i byed pa po'i sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167739#1167739#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272938#272938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7427# de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i  las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong  bar mi nus so // /
column7: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136706#1136706#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /

column3: 'dod pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de nyid ni skal ba mnyam pa nyid do // / +de la brten pa mthun pa ni skal ba mnyam pa ste spyod pa mthun pa'i rang bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224434#224445#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1376# gzhan yang de nyid las sems can sdud cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / /

column3: de'i dbang po ni skal ba mnyam pa nyid de 'gro ba gcig tu skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang dbang po dang dbyibs dang spyod pa dang kha zas la  sogs pa 'dra ba'i rgyu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224444#224458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1377# 'di ni mdo 'di nyid las gsum pa dang mthun par don rnam pa gnyis kyi drug  tu gsungs par bstan te 'di ni rkyen rnam pa gsum pa'o // /

column3: phan tshun mngon par dga' ba 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / +bdag la chags pa zhes bya ba ni bdag la sred pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224459#224468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378# kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang yod de / /
column5: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343064#2343065#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3743# don 'di'i bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373062#2373068#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7408;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7409# rnal 'byor gyi sgo de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229799#229800#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2027;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2028# kha cig las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis bstan  pa yang yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du mtshan nyid bdun po 'di dag ni dam pa bdun gyis yongs su sdud pas gdod pha rol tu phyin pa zhes rnam par gzhag pa yin te / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529561#529561#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10458;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10459# chos rnams kyi sa bon  bsags nas chos rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir te / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226386#226386#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1601# kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis bstan pa yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pas ji skad du rab tu 'dren pa dang  rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang   rags pa dang  phra ba dang  sla ba dang dka' ba'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522567#522567#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9503;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9504# de la sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni sems dang yid dang  rnam par shes pa'i ming la yang spyi dang bye brag yod de / / +bstan bcos  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du 'di lta ste / /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#538073#538074#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11558;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11559# bstan pa kha cig    las gnyis ka dang ldan pa yang yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391006#2391006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9510# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du sbyor ba'i gnas skabs la gnas pa des mtshan ma'i 'ching ba yongs su ma bsal bas / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401106#2401106#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10717;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10718# mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa nyid kyi  yid la byed pa rnam pa gnyis lhag par btang snyoms su gzhag par mi nus pa ste / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311816#2311816#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_116;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_117# slob dpon chos skyong ni bshad pa snga ma ltar 'dod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385997#2385997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8937# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228461#228461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1852;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1853# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po  dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag mdo tsam du bstan pa yang / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346888#2346888#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4162# sems de dag yul la dmigs pa'i rigs pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2310760#2310760#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10# yang rnal 'byor gyi sgo brjod na gnas skabs rnam pa lnga yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532331#532331#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10801;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10802# yang na mdo sde las dpe rnam pa gnyis gsungs pa'i dgongs pa tha dad pas dpe snga ma ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don gyi dper bstan  pa yin te / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column20: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246171#246171#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4107# de la ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po snang BA ZHES BYA BA NI BSTAN bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241737#241737#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3557;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3558# mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu dbye ba'i phyir gnas pa dag gis gsum po dag spong ngo zhes bshad de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: kha zas ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +kham gyis za ba de rags pa dang phra ba'o // / +rags pa ni kham du byas nas za ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224469#224487#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1381# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373065#2373065#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7408# rnal 'byor gyi sgo de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: phra ba ni bkru ba dang bsku ba dang gtor pa la sogs    pa ste ; / +de ni dri dang ro dang reg bya'i ngo bo nyid do // /
reg pa ni yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i reg pa'o // / +yid kyis kun du sems pa ni yid kyi las te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224488#224499#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1381# dang po ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa la yang don rnam pa gnyis te / / +sgrib pa bcu rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang  de bzhin nyid bcu mngon du byed pa'i phyir dang  gnyis pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang  don rnam pa bzhi yod de / /

column3: gdags pa las ji skad du sgo nga gang dag ma la dran pa brjed pa med pa de dag rul bar mi 'gyur  ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224498#224508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1381;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1382# sgrib pa bcu rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang  de bzhin nyid bcu mngon du byed pa'i phyir dang  gnyis pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang  don rnam pa bzhi yod de / /

column3: rnam par shes pa ni gang srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o // / +de la kham gyis za ba ni dbang po rnams rgyas par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224509#224520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1382# dang po ni rgyu rnam pa gsum la brten nas ni mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa rnam pa drug rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang  rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa'i phyir dang rim gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir te / /

column3: reg pa ni rten pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyas par byed pa'o // / +de gnyis kyis btsas par 'gyur ba la phan par byed pa'i phyir ma ma lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224519#224531#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1384;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1385# dang po ni rgyu rnam pa gsum la brten nas ni mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa rnam pa drug rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang  rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa'i phyir dang rim gyis sems can yongs su SMIN PAR BYED PA'I PHYIR TE / /

column3: yid kyis kun du sems pa ni yang srid pa 'phen pa'o // / +de ltar 'phangs par zad la thob pa ni ma yin te / /

column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546880#546880#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12635# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363747#2363747#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6195# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin  du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341673#2341673#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3567# de'i phyir chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /

column3: rgyun la yongs su bsgos pa'i phyir yang srid par skye bar rnam par shes pa'i nus pa ste / / +de gnyis ni skyes pa'i ma lta bu ste ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224540#224554#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1387# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam grangs dang po nas bstan pa dang mthun no // /

column3: kha zas  'dod par sems can so sor mthun pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems can skal ba mnyam pa nyid tha dad pa ma yin par sdud do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224555#224566#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1389# gsum pa ni sems can la phan 'dogs shing sgrib  pa rab tu sel ba dang  mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun no // /

column3: so sor zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyab par 'dod pa'i tshig ste / / +sems can sems can zhes so sor gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224567#224576#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1389# bzhi pa ni mi gnas pa'i lam gyis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / / +dang po gsum gyi phyir ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa dang  phyi ma gsum gyi phyir ni 'khor ba la mi gnas pa gang yin pa ste / /

column3: gal te gcig par gyur du zin na ni  sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba 'dres par 'gyur ro // /

column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220573#220574#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_821# byang  chub sems dpa' ji tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgom pa dag ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir spyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni phul du  byung ba'i don gyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540747#540747#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11896;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11897# zhib tu de nyid las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang 'di dang mthun par ston to // /

column3: tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba ni sems can khams la sogs pa tha dad pa rnams kyi so so pa ste rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i spyod pa ston pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224703#224713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1405# bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhi rnam pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir dang  bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  bdag dang  gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gzhi rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i lam drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i bslab pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.014#TD4091E.TXT.r#748777#748777#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /

column10: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2055809#2055809#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11201# 'dod  pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtsa mo dag na ni go rims bzhin du mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir dang  mi gsal ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i lam med do // /
column11: 0.016#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530137#1530140#TD4061E.TXT.r_2402# 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag las bzlog nas ji srid du bgrod par bya bar gshegs pa'i phyir dang  'gro ba bzang por gshegs pa'i phyir dang  phyir mi ldog par gshegs pa'i phyir te / /

column14: 0.017#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2597208#2597208#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7699;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7700# ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gal te lam la rjes su shes pas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i spangs pa yang dag par 'dzin pas de'i phyir mthong ba'i lam du gyur na / /

column16: 0.017#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2052990#2052990#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10809# mthong bas thos pa re re'o zhes bya ba ni de ni lam gnyi gas brtan por byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te / /
column17: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068261#1068261#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2562;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2563;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2564# skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o // / +bgrod pa'i don gyis lam mo // / +rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o // /

column19: 0.019#TD4097E.TXT.r#2214946#2214947#TD4097E.TXT.r_1410# lam la log par rtogs pa'i phyir lam mthong bas spang bar bya'o // /
column20: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#629425#629426#TD4069E.TXT.r_941;TD4069E.TXT.r_942# 'jig tshogs kun 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam yongs  su mkhyen pa'i phyir lam mkhyen pa'o // / +'jig tshogs 'gog par 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir mngon sum du mdzad pa brnyes pa'i phyir lam thugs su chud pa ste / /

column23: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136708#1136708#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column24: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530641#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632115#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070011#2070011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2050288#2050288#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10451;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10452# dbang po rno ba'i phyir na mi gyo ba ste / / +'di gyo bar mi nus pa'i  phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /
column28: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235249#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column29: 0.025#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column30: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column31: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column32: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /
column33: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column34: 0.025#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column35: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column36: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970574#970574#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /
column37: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035520#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column38: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350815#2350815#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4626# bzhi po 'di dag ni gzugs can gyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir dang  gzugs can gyi chos    thams cad rab tu nyams par byas pa'i phyir dang  gzugs kyi chos 'dir skye ba'i skabs med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column39: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332810#1332811#TD4037E.TXT.r_2327# sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column40: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#634934#634934#TD4069E.TXT.r_1722;TD4069E.TXT.r_1723# the tshom dang ldan pa'i phyir mi gsal ba'o // / +log pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o // /
column41: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#664728#664728#TD4069E.TXT.r_5903;TD4069E.TXT.r_5904# 'o na de lta na ni gzugs mang po las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan pa ni 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar byas pas 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir  yin zhe na / /
column42: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603089#2603090#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // / +yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column43: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794975#794975#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4724;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4725# phan tshun 'brel pa'i  phyir dang  phan tshun 'dren par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i khams rnams ni du zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste / /
column44: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1477061#1477061#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8958# mi dge ba ni sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin par mi srid pa'i phyir dang  de ma spangs par sa gong mar skye ba'i sems mi     // /

column3: 'chi 'pho ba yang med cing skye ba yang med la / / +de skal ba mnyam pa nyid mi 'dor ba yang yod de nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224713#224730#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1407# bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhi rnam pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir dang  bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  bdag dang  gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gzhi rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i lam drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po'i bslab pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1069452#1069452#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2789# lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir / /
column6: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#748777#748777#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4027E.TXT.r#557162#557164#TD4027E.TXT.r_846;TD4027E.TXT.r_847# de gnyis zhi ba'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa'o // / +gnyen po'i phyir lam gyi bden pa'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1465087#1465087#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7610;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7611# khyad par can ni rgyu'i rnam pa lhag ma re res rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro // / +dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i la ma ni drug gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu  yin no zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gyi skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin te / /
column9: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2052990#2052990#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10809# mthong bas thos pa re re'o zhes bya ba ni de ni lam gnyi gas brtan por byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te / /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311823#2311823#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_118# mthong ba'i  lam dang nye ba'i phyir sbyor ba'i ming rnam par gzhag pa yin te // /
column11: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2596990#2596990#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7667# de bzhin du shes pa brgyad dang rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'i phyir dang  zhugs pa'i lam rnam par nyams pa'i phyir dang  rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam kho na yin te / /

column15: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2055809#2055809#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11201# 'dod  pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtsa mo dag na ni go rims bzhin du mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir dang  mi gsal ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i lam med do // /

column30: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264976#264976#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6445# de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mthun  par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

thob pa 'dor ba 'am / / +ma thob pa 'thob pa med de / / +so so'i skye bo  nyid 'dus byas thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro // /
