column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224859#224867#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1424# phyi ma bzhi kho nar gyur pa  yang snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur cing yongs su rdzogs par byed pas mi nyung mi mang ba'i phyir / /

column3: chos kyi sgras ni gzugs la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin to // / +de ni rang yang yin la nus pa yang yin pas rang gi nus pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224868#224877#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1426# phyi ma bzhi kho nar gyur pa  yang snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur cing yongs su rdzogs par byed pas mi nyung mi mang ba'i phyir / / +thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa gsum gyi grogs su gyur pa yin no // /

column3: ma 'ongs pa'i chos skyed nus pa'o // / +rang gi nus pa 'thob pa ni rang rang gi  nus pa rnyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224878#224886#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1427# smon lam ni brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa yin no // / +stobs ni bsam  gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa yin no // /

column3: de'i rgyu ni rang gi nus pa 'thob pa'i rgyu ste / / +ma 'ongs pa'i chos da ltar byung ba'i gnas su 'byin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224887#224899#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1428# ye shes ni shes rab kyi grogs su gyur pa yin te so so nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224954#224965#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435# 'di dang po thabs rnam pa gsum gyi    grogs su gyur pa nyid rnam par bshad pa ste / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung nas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed do // /

column3: de ni nang gi yan lag kyang yin la rang gi nus pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yin pas nang gi yan lag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224900#224907#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1428# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang  yin pa bsdu pa'i dngos por zin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: rang gi nus pa 'thob pa'i rgyu'o // / +thun mong gi rgyu ma yin pas  nang gi yan lag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224908#224917#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1429# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang  yin pa bsdu pa'i dngos por zin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: chos skye ba'i nang gi yan lag gi nus pa 'thob pa'i rgyu'o // / +chos skye ba'i nang gi yan lag rang gi nus pa 'thob pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224916#224933#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1431# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang  yin pa bsdu pa'i dngos por zin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi rnam par phye ste bshad pa nyid kyis  rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263965#263965#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6316;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6317# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rnam par phye ste / / +bshad pa 'di nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261034#261034#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5885;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5886# 'di yang rigs pa rnam pa bzhis rnam par phye ste / / +bshad pa nyid las rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / /

column3: phyi'i yan lag ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams te 'og nas 'byung ngo // / +rgyu dang rkyen rnams ni phyi'i yan lag rgyu'i dngos po ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224932#224943#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1433# 'di ni dang po thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyi grogs su gyur par bstan pa'o // / +re re la yang rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /

column3: de dag gzugs  la sogs pa'i skye ba'i thun mong gi rgyu yin bas gtso bo ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224944#224952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1434# pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gsum la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // / +'di dang po thabs rnam pa gsum gyi    grogs su gyur pa nyid rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: rigs pas yod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir / / +de med du zin na bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224892#224894#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1428# ye shes ni shes rab kyi grogs su gyur pa yin te so so nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang  yin pa bsdu pa'i dngos por zin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed de ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA NI gnyis la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225005#225006#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: skye ba med du zin na rgyu dang rkyen rnams yod kyang nam mkha' bzhin du chos skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang  nam mkha' la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba ni  ji ltar skye ba med na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403223#2403225#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403706#2403707#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11033;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11034# 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis nyon mongs pa'i shing bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404605#2404607#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11109;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11110# 'di ltar sa 'di la bar chad med cing rgyun chad pa med par mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su zhugs pas na sa    drug pa ltar re zhig tsam du mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa dang  gzhan yang brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i sa dang nye bar gyur pas don rnam pa gnyis po 'di dang ldan pa'i phyir ring du song ba'i sa zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang don gyis mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405220#2405221#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11168;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11169# 'di  ltar sa 'di la rnam pa thams cad du chos sna tshogs ston pa la dbang thob pas thogs pa med cing yangs shing rgya che ba'i blo gros thob pa de yang shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs ba'i blo gros zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221250#221251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_904# bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed  pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221517#221518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224966#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung nas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed do // / +bsdu  ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225807#225807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1525# mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253559#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column15: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241018#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /
column16: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261137#261137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /
column17: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229266#229266#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1958# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214079#214079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_10;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_11# kun tu rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len de dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang   dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226166#226167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa 'dus byas nyid yin pa de bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa yang 'dus byas nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224979#224989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487252#487252#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4959;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4960# rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba de yang dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo dang  tshig     // / +nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532734#532734#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10850# gal te de lta na ci'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las dpe  rnam pa gnyis tshang bar smos she na / /

column3: skye ba med du 'dra na ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ni 'dus byas yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224990#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // / +yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu  ba'i dngos po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242614#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column8: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382520#2382520#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385730#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column11: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386183#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column14: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387235#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397726#2397727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398618#2398618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10395# kha cig ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba la brten nas sa re re la yang sgrib pa gsum gsum spangs nas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thob bar 'gyur ba las brtsams nas sa bcu gcig po dag ston te / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398997#2398997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: 'bras bu 'di las 'bras bu gzhan ni 'bras bu gzhan no // / +'bras bu gzhan gyi 'phen pa ni 'bras bu gzhan 'phen pa'o // /

column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225318#225318#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471# de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa  yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225625#225625#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1504# de'i phyir ngas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste mdo de nyid kyis brda    phrad par zad do // /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225796#225796#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1523# de'i phyir ngas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: 'phen par byed pas 'phen pa ste / / +chos skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa'o // / +de'i dbang gis chos skye ba'i skye ba la bgegs su ma gyur pa'o // /

column3: 'bras bu gzhan 'phen pa'i dus de'i gnas ni 'bras bu gzhan 'phen pa'i dus kyi gnas te dus ji srid du 'bras bu gzhan 'phen nus par gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225043#225054#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#467822#467822#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2408;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2409# de'i rgyu bsgrub tu  gzhug pa'i phyir dang  rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mgu ba khyad par can rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa la mos pa rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa'o // / +khams bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'dir bsdus shing gnas par    gyur pa yin no // /

column3: gnas par ma gyur na 'bras bu 'phen mi nus so // / +gnas par 'gyur ba de'i rgyu gang yin pa de  ni gnas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gang gi dbang gis zhes bya ba ni gang gi mthus so // / +rga ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba de brjod de 'bras bu gnyis pa 'phen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225072#225080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1444# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus PAS ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225220#225224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1461# phyi ma la nyon mongs pa  yang zhing chung ba nyid du sems kyis yang dag par smon par byed pa ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225298#225299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1469# smon lam de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa yang zhing srab    mor gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom nus par 'gyur BAS ZHES BYA BAS NI gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /
column7: 0.014#TD4000E.TXT.r#2799327#2799327#TD4000E.TXT.r_640# yang dag par yid la bya bas rjes    su 'gro ba NA ZHES BYA BA NI SHES rab 'di rnams kyis phyin ci ma log par sbyor bas rjes su 'gro bar bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1184763#1184763#TD4047E.TXT.r_9122;TD4047E.TXT.r_9123# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhes bya ba ste / / +shes rab thams cad ni 'jig rten pa'i dang  'jig rten  las 'das pas bsdus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o // /
column9: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225773#225774#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1521# ye shes de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par nus par 'gyur BAS ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa ye shes shes rab kyi grogs yin par bstan pa ste /// /
column10: 0.017#TD4061E.TXT.r#1534364#1534366#TD4061E.TXT.r_2974# ji ltar rnam par shes par byed pas na rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba de bzhin du rab tu shes par byed pas na shes rab po zhes bya ba yang rigs par  bshad pa yin no // /
column11: 0.017#TD4009E.TXT.r#322366#322366#TD4009E.TXT.r_328# smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig dam par 'dzin pa ma YIN ZHES BYA BA NI SGRUB pa snying por byed pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i shes rab rab  tu 'thob bo // /
column12: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2549438#2549439#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1689# mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur BA ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI la mthong ba'i tshe la myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pas na mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i  las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba yin no // /
column13: 0.025#TD4067E.TXT.r#1092135#1092135#TD4067E.TXT.r_949# nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams la bdag gam bdag gir yang dag par rjes su lta ba'i shes rab nyon mongs pa can gang yin PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI 'JIG par 'gyur bas 'jig pa'o // /
column14: 0.025#TD4044E.TXT.r#382812#382812#TD4044E.TXT.r_248;TD4044E.TXT.r_249# go rims bzhin du ma bstan te de'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sdom pa bsrung ba dang  spel pa dang sems rtse  gcig pa dang  sgrib pa rnam par sbyang ba dang  yid la byed pa goms par byed pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i don ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas nas de'i rjes su 'brangs nas bstan par rig par bya'o // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags rnams bsdus pa'i don ni shes rab kyi pha     // /
column15: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2458244#2458244#TD4019E.TXT.r_6741;TD4019E.TXT.r_6742# dad pa dang las dang 'bras bu'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i shes rab kyis kyang / / +zag pa dang bcas pa'i las dge ba kun nas slong bar byed pa'o // /
column16: 0.025#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570162#1570162#TD4087E.TXT.r_1765;TD4087E.TXT.r_1766# blon po rin po che de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang  ci la yang thogs pa med pa'i rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan te / / +de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column17: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350443#1350443#TD4037E.TXT.r_4653;TD4037E.TXT.r_4654# spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang  phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang  bdag gi smra ba rnam par gzhag pa thams  cad rnam par 'jog pa'i shes rab dang  khyim brgyud legs par bskyang ba dang  khyim 'byor bar bya ba'i shes rab dang  rgyal po'i tshul dang  'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyi tshul rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i shes rab bo // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'di dang gzhan du bde bar  'gyur ba'i shes rab gang zhe na / /
column18: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348676#1348676#TD4037E.TXT.r_4461# nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnam par sdong bar byed pa dang  dkar po'i chos sgrub par byed pa dang  las yongs su dag par byed pa dang   shes rab rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o // /
column19: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1941829#1941830#TD4032E.TXT.r_3485;TD4032E.TXT.r_3486;TD4032E.TXT.r_3487# mtshan nyid dang rnam par rig pa'i de kho na gnyis kyis ni chos mnyam pa'o // / +rnam par dag pa'i de kho nas ni byang chub mnyam pa'o // / +yang dag par sgrub pa'i de kho nas ni shes rab mnyam par  bstan to // /
column20: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1134207#1134208#TD4047E.TXT.r_1877;TD4047E.TXT.r_1878# 'phen pa chen po  nyid dang  gnas pa chen po nyid do // / +byang chub sems dpa' bde 'gror skyes par gyur pa'i tshe ring bar 'phen pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshe ni ring ba nyid dang ldan par 'gyur gyi thung bar mi 'gyur te / /
column21: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350251#1350251#TD4037E.TXT.r_4633;TD4037E.TXT.r_4634# thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang  bsam pa las  byung ba'i shes rab dang  so sor brtags nas byang chub sems dpa'i BYA BA LA 'JUG PA dang  bya ba ma yin pa las ldog pa'o // / +so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis bsdus pa'i shes rab dang  bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bsdus pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa'i shes rab tshad med pa'o // /
column22: 0.028#TD4044E.TXT.r#386116#386116#TD4044E.TXT.r_860;TD4044E.TXT.r_861;TD4044E.TXT.r_862# ye shes nyid las 'byung ba'o // / +rig pa'i bzo dang las kyi GNAS ZHES BYA BA NI / / +rig pa nyid dang  ldan pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas skyes bu'i byed pa ste / /
column23: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#14220#14220#TD4036E.TXT.r_2111# ldang ba'i 'du shes gnyis pas ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i seng ge'i nyal stangs las lhag chad med par nyal bar byed do // /
column24: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#884937#884937#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18958;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18959# bsam gtan  gnyis pa'i sa pa dag ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde bas so // / +bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa dag ni dga' ba med pa'i bde bas te / /
column25: 0.029#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954810#1954810#TD4032E.TXT.r_5415;TD4032E.TXT.r_5416# bsgom pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes rab kyis goms par byed pa'o // / +dang ZHES BYA BA NI BSDU ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2622417#2622417#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10703;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10704# yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI 'DIS mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pas na sgrub pa'o // / +des par 'byin par byed PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI  gtan du nges par 'byin par byed pas na nges par 'byin bar byed pa'o // /
column27: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#614702#614702#TD4013E.TXT.r_585;TD4013E.TXT.r_586# las dang  nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin rnams so / / +de la las ni byas shing bsags pas rtogs pa'i     // /
column28: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155284#1155284#TD4047E.TXT.r_5020# legs par bslabs pa ni las de la mkhas par byas pas de lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa'o // /
column29: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#335443#335443#TD4009E.TXT.r_2049# rigs de yang phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang  phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan  las 'das pas rab tu phye ba dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'das pas rab tu phye ba'o // /
column30: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#663502#663502#TD4069E.TXT.r_5750;TD4069E.TXT.r_5751# bdag tu lta bas kun du brtags pa ni bdag tu lta ba dag gis kun du brtags pa'o // / +de bzhin du rab tu shes par byed pas na shes rab bo zhes bya ba yang rigs par bshad ba yin no  ZHES BYA BA NI SHES rab tsam la byed pa po nyid du snyad gdags kyi bdag tu lta bas kun du brtags pa'i byed pa po ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'bras bu gnyis pa 'phen nus pa la gnod pa'i rgyu ni nyam chung bar byed pa ste rga ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225079#225088#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1447# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234025#234026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397682#2397682#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10283;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10284# rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / / +'di ni dang po rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508608#508608#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7749# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#499243#499243#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6546;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6547# gzhan yang chos 'phags ngas don dam pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul yin par bshad la rtog pa  dang dpyod pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i spyod yul la spyod par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: de lta na ni skad cig par mi 'gyur ro // / +zhes bya ba ni chos de skad cig du mar yang 'dug pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225089#225097#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1447# 'di ni dang po rnam par bshad pa'o // / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +smon lam 'debs pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang  smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su 'gyur ba nyid du bstan pa'o // /

column3: rga ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu gcig 'phen pa'i nus pa yongs su nyams na 'bras bu gzhan 'phen pa'i dus su gnas pa mi thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225098#225111#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1451# smon lam 'debs pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang  smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su 'gyur ba nyid du bstan pa'o // / +'di ni dang po smon lam 'debs pa'i rgyu bstan pa ste / /

column3: mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs su bab nas / / +gnod pa byed nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225112#225122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1453# mdo'i tshig 'di yang rkyen rnam pa gsum du dbye'o // / +dang po ni byang chub sems dpa'     // / +rnams mthong ba'i chos la nyon mongs pa mang ba'i phyir / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542587#542587#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12113;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12114# nyams par 'gyur ba rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par  bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pas na / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522461#522461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9480# mdo sde'i mjug gi tshig mngon par bstod DO ZHES BYA BA NI 'phags pa 'jam dpal tha mar 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: rga bas 'bras bu  gnyis pa la sogs pa 'phen pa la gnod par byed nus / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225121#225130#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1455# rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos bsgom par mi nus te / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni lus kyi mngon sum du zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: chos 'das pa'i dus su 'phen pa'i rgyu ni mi rtag pa nyid do // / +'dus byas zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams 'dus te tshogs nas byas pas 'dus byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225129#225143#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1455# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni lus kyi mngon sum du zhes 'byung ngo // / +gnyis pa ni / / +lhag pa'i bsam pa'i  stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par gyeng ba'i gnas skabs kyi mos pa yin pa'i phyir rkyen rnam pa 'di gnyis kyis sems kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par mi nus pa ste / /

column3: de ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po ste gang dag gis gzugs la sogs par rtogs pa yongs  su gcod pa de dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225144#225155#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1456# lhag pa'i bsam pa'i  stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par gyeng ba'i gnas skabs kyi mos pa yin pa'i phyir rkyen rnam pa 'di gnyis kyis sems kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par mi nus pa ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241245#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391027#2391027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385439#2385439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8881# so so'i skye bo  nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225711#225711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229716#229716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231870#231870#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2272# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag re re dag la yang gsum yongs su dag pa chen po ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rgya cher bstan to // /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383886#2383886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8710# lang gi tshe bsgyur ba theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397825#2397826#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10307# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230367#230367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2110# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230322#230322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2105# theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams zhes bya ba'i don 'di la khungs su mdo sde 'byin te / / +gsum po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225156#225166#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1456# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni 'bras  bu'i 'og mar skye ba smon pa dang  sems dman pa rgyun du bsgom pa dang  sems nang du 'jog par mi nus zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: gnas pa dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ni gnas pa dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ste rga ba'o // / +gnas pa dang  gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni mtshan nyid gcig tu bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225167#225180#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1457# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni 'bras  bu'i 'og mar skye ba smon pa dang  sems dman pa rgyun du bsgom pa dang  sems nang du 'jog par mi nus zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ci'i phyir zhe na gnas pa ni kun du chags pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // / +rga bas gnas pa zin na de la kun du chags pa ldog par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225181#225191#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1458# gsum du ni theg pa chen po'i bstan pa nyan par mi nus pa dang  bsam gtan la dmigs shing legs par bsgom par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi  'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub mi nus pa'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935272#2935272#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9277;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9278# gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtha' med PA'I PHYIR TE / / +de lta bu'i bsam gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa  la yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1112915#1112918#TD4050E.TXT.r_2193;TD4050E.TXT.r_2194# sems mnyam pa rnams mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1993859#1993859#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2169;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2170# sbyor ba la de'i sgra nye bar btags pa'i  phyir ro // / +bsam gtan gyi sdom pa'i sbyor bas kyang bar ma mi dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gtong ngo // /

column3: dpal can ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sna nag ma zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rgud pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225192#225201#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1458;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1459# gsum du ni theg pa chen po'i bstan pa nyan par mi nus pa dang  bsam gtan la dmigs shing legs par bsgom par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi  'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub mi nus pa'o // / +gong du bstan pa'i rkyen rnam pa gsum gyi phyir / /

column3: de skad    du 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa zhes kyang gsungs so // / +chos ni gzugs la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225202#225210#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1461# smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs te / /

column3: bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa ni don gzhan du gyur pa dag go // / +de ni 'di skad du gzugs la sogs pa nyid skye ba la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225211#225222#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1461# de bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs te / / +phyi ma la nyon mongs pa  yang zhing chung ba nyid du sems kyis yang dag par smon par byed pa zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /

column3: gal te bdag nyid du gyur na ni gzhan  yin par 'gyur te / / +'dis ni gzhan ma yin par smra ba'i nyes pa brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225221#225233#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1463# phyi ma la nyon mongs pa  yang zhing chung ba nyid du sems kyis yang dag par smon par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /

column3: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi ni gzugs la sogs pa'o // / +mtshan nyid rnams ni skye ba la sogs pa'o // / +tha dad pa ma yin pa ni gcig pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225234#225244#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1465# smon lam 'debs pa yang dag par bstan pa dang  smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa  nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: de ltar na ni rga ba dang gnas pa yang gcig tu 'gyur te / / +tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid do // / +de ni ma  mthong ste 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225245#225254#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1466# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs nas 'di skad du smon lam 'debs te / /

column3: mi skye ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gal te yod par ma gyur na chos skye bar ji ltar 'gyur te rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba ma mthong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225255#225262#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1466# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs nas 'di skad du smon lam 'debs te / / +bsod nams 'di'i mthus ma 'ongs pa na  nyon mongs pa spangs shing chung ba nyid du gyur cig zer ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225263#225270#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1467# bsod nams 'di'i mthus ma 'ongs pa na  nyon mongs pa spangs shing chung ba nyid du gyur cig zer ba'o // /

column3: de la skye bas ni chos skyed / / +gnas pas ni gnas par byed / / +rga bas ni rga bar byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225271#225280#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1468# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tsha bsgyur ba las ni dge ba'i rtsa ba srab cing chung ba zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: mi rtag pas ni rnam par 'jig par byed na mtshan  nyid kyi gzhi dang lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ji ltar bya ba byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225281#225291#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1469# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tsha bsgyur ba las ni dge ba'i rtsa ba srab cing chung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +de ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de'i tshe 'di skye 'am / / +gnas sam / / +rga 'am / /
column4: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225072#225072#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /

column3: rnam par 'jig gam / / +ji lta bu zhig / / +smras pa ma 'ongs pa'i skye bas bya ba byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225300#225310#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471# smon lam de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa yang zhing srab    mor gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: bya ba zhes bya ba ni nus pa la bya'o // / +de la chos gsum ni ma 'ongs pa'i bya bar 'dod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225309#225319#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471# mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa  yin par yongs su bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS PA mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225624#225625#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1504# de'i phyir ngas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS PA mjug bsdu ba ste mdo de nyid kyis brda    phrad par zad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225795#225796#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1523# de'i phyir ngas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan TE ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS PA mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column7: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119273#3119274#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3969# de'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin no // /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225024#225024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1439# de'i phyir ngas  thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snga ma gsum po dag gi grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS PA mjug bsdu pa bstan te / /

column3: sdug bsngal  la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang mar me dang skye ba'o // / +sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye ba'i tshe na so so'i skye bo nyid rnam par spong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225320#225340#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1472# de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa  yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232706#232706#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2386# de'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234387#234387#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2597# de ni bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i mtshan  nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226142#226142#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1566# de'i phyir ngas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes bya ba gsum pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: skyes pa'i tshe ni rnam par spangs so // / +mar me skye ba'i tshe ni mun pa sel to // /
skyes pa'i tshe ni bsal to // / +skye ba skye ba'i tshe ni lhan cig 'byung ba rnams la skye ba dang mthun pa'i dngos  pos bskyed par bya ba skyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225341#225353#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1472# gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyes bu dam pa la yang dag par brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos mnyan nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rgyu dang rkyen bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam  pa stobs chung ba nyid bzlog nas lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa dang  khams dang mos pa la gya nom pa yang thob par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum pa stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: skye ba skyes pa'i tshe ni skyes so // / +skyes par gyur pa ni skye bas bskyed do // /

column3: gnas pa'i dbang gis ni gnas so // / +gnas pa'i dbang gis gnas pa na rga bas ni rga bar byed / /

column3: mi rtag pas ni rnam par 'jig gi / / +rgas nas ma yin rnam par zhig nas ma yin te rga'o // /
'jig go // / +de'i phyir da ltar gnas pa la sogs pa dus gcig tu bya bar 'gal ba med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225378#225390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1477;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1478# stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang  stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su 'gyur ba nyid bstan pa'o // / +'di ni dang po stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bstan pa ste / /

column3: gnas pa ni rga bas rga bar byed / / +mi rtag pas rnam par 'jig go // / +mtshan nyid rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid rnams kyi skye ba'i skye ba ni skye ba'i skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225391#225402#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1478;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1480# 'di ltar byang chub  sems dpa' rnams rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang  mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +de la rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  yang dag pa'i chos mnyan pa dang  tshul bzhin du yid la byed  pa'o ; / /

column3: sogs pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag skye     // / +ba'i skye ba la sogs pa dag go // / +sogs pa smos pas ni gnas pa'i gnas pa dang  rga ba'i rga ba dang  mi rtag pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid yongs su sdud do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225401#225417#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1480# de la rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  yang dag pa'i chos mnyan pa dang  tshul bzhin du yid la byed  pa'o ; / /

column3: bzhi po de dag ni mtshan nyid rnams kyi rjes su 'gro bas rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams so // / +gal te rga ba la yang  rga ba 'dod na de lta na ni de'i yang gzhan te thug pa med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225418#225433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1480;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1481;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1484# rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa 'di gsum lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba las ldog nas lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa dang khams dang  mos pa gya nom pa yang thob par 'gyur bas chos gsum po 'di la stobs zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: de bas na 'di las thug pa med par yang mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos so // / +ci'i phyir zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225434#225442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1485# mos pa zhes bya ba la bye brag ci yod ce na / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las / /

column3: smras pa / / +'di ltar rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid dag ni zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mtshan nyid rnams so // / +chos brgyad po dag la 'jug go zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi  dngos por gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225443#225456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1486# stobs chung ba nyid ldog pa las ltos pa dang  stobs thob pa las ltos pa dang  khams khyad par 'phags pas nang du sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces gsungs pa dang sbyar na de la     // /

column3: rtsa ba'i chos dang mtshan nyid gsum po rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi po rnams la'o zhes bya ba de lta bu brgyad po dag la 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225457#225467#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1487# stobs chung ba nyid ldog pa las ltos pa dang  stobs thob pa las ltos pa dang  khams khyad par 'phags pas nang du sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces gsungs pa dang sbyar na de la     // / +stobs chung ba las ldog pa las ltos pa zhes bya ba ni khams dman pa dang  mos pa zhan pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni re re la'o zhes bya ba ni 'jug go zhes bya bar snyegs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225468#225475#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1488# stobs chung ba las ldog pa las ltos PA ZHES BYA BA NI khams dman pa dang  mos pa zhan pa gang yin pa'o // / +stobs thob pa la ltos PA ZHES BYA BA NI 'DOD pa'i khams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par thob pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: ji lta zhe na / / +skye ba'i skye ba ni skye ba nyid  kyi yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // / +mtshan nyid rnams ni rtsa ba'i chos la gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225476#225487#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1488;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1490# stobs thob pa la ltos pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par thob pa gang yin pa'o // / +nang du sems rtse gcig  pa nyid ces bya ba ni bsam gtan la bya'o // /

column3: rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dag ni mtshan nyid rnams la gnas so // / +'di ltar de'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis thug pa med pa'i skyon med pas ji skad du smras pa rigs pa nyid du ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225486#225502#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1492# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +sems chung ba de nyid ldog nas / /

column3: ming gi tshogs la sogs  pa brjod par bya ba de brjod de / / +ming gi tshogs la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs yongs su sdud do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225503#225517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1493# dge ba'i stobs 'phel ba dang  de bzhin nyid dang  chos kyi dbyings de la gnas pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +mdo 'di las lhag pa'i bsam  pa stobs chung ba nyid ldog nas zhes gsungs pa ni dman pa'i bsam pa spangs nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa thob par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: mi ldan pa de dag kyang don go bar byed pa'o // / +ci'i phyir sgra don go bar byed pa ma yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225518#225526#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1493# mdo 'di las lhag pa'i bsam  pa stobs chung ba nyid ldog nas zhes gsungs pa ni dman pa'i bsam pa spangs nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +yang thob par 'gyur bzhes bya ba ni khams dman pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi khams gya nom pa yang thob par 'gyur ba gang  yin pa de ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +yi ge'i 'bru 'am tshig yongs  su bcad pa'i sgra don go bar byed par 'gyur grang na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225527#225539#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1493;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1495# yang thob par 'gyur bzhes bya ba ni khams dman pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi khams gya nom pa yang thob par 'gyur ba gang  yin pa de ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225711#225720#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1517;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1518# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229365#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358185#2358188#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5520# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382518#2382522#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8565;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# mdo las ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par gyeng ba zhes ma gsungs  pa ni ting nge 'dzin la sgrib par byed pa'i ring du gyur pa'i phyir dang  sgrib ba mchog ma yin pa'i phyir mdor bsdus nas ma gsungs so // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385730#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386557#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386797#2386797#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column14: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387235#2387237#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column15: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397726#2397728#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column16: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398618#2398618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10395# kha cig ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba la brten nas sa re re la yang sgrib pa gsum gsum spangs nas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thob bar 'gyur ba las brtsams nas sa bcu gcig po dag ston te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398997#2398998#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column18: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399357#2399360#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10487;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10488# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha  rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar te / /

column20: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402254#2402255#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /

column22: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220522#220523#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_811# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshungs pa med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes  bstan te / /

column24: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224292#224294#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column25: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224997#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu  ba'i dngos po bzhi YIN PA'I PHYIR RO // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /
column26: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241689#241690#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3555# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du sa'i mdun rol dang  sa bcu po dag tu 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba la brten nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du sa re re zhing lpags shun la yod pa lta  bu la sogs pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /

column3: dper na goo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra ni don dgu la 'jug ste tshig dang  phyogs dang  sa dang  'od zer dang  rdo rje dang  mig dang  phyugs dang  mtho ris dang chu rnams don dgu la 'jug ste / /

column3: goo zhes bya ba'i sgra ni mkhas pas gzung ngo // / +de la yi  ge'i 'bru ni don go bar byed pa ma yin te yi ge'i 'bru so so la don med pa dang  cig car du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar tshig gis    ming brjod nus pa de bzhin du don kyang brjod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  sgra rnams ni tshogs pa med do zhes bya ba de'i phyir sus yi ge 'bru gcig po de thos pa des don de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di ni skyon du mi 'gyur te chos rnams kyi nus pa so sor nges par snang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225317#225318#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471# de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa  yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /

column6: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119307#3119307#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3973# des sems nang du 'jog nus pas de'i phyir stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin no // /

column3: gang tshogs pa med pas sus gcig po de thos pa des don de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de dang sgras don rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni mtshungs pa nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225635#225644#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1504;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1505;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1506# de'i phyir ngas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste mdo de nyid kyis brda    phrad par zad do // / +gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225644#225652#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1505;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1506# gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir / / +bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub nus pa gang yin PA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni bzhi pa ye shes rang gi grogs byed  pa nyid du bstan pa'o // /

column3: ngag rnams la rag las te skye ba zhes bya ba la / / +ngag gi bdag nyid kyi sgra ni ngag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225662#225671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1507;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1508;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1510# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: ngag dag ngag la rag las te skye ba de dag ni ngag la rag las te skye ba dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225670#225681#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1510;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1512# ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bstan pa dang  ye shes shes rab kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: rag las pa ni kha na las pa'o // / +de ni 'di skad du ngag yod na 'di dag 'byung ngo zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225679#225696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1513;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1514;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1515# 'di  ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos par nus pa ni thos pa'i shes rab bo // /
column5: 0.009#TD4018E.TXT.r#3034507#3034510#TD4018E.TXT.r_3989# de la rim zhes bya ba ni 'jungs pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa dang  ngang tshul ngan pa'i gnyen por tshul khrims dang  ngan  du smra ba la sogs pa khro ba'i gnyen por ji mi snyam zhing bzod pa dang  le lo'i gnyen por brtson 'grus dang  mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i gnyen por bsam gtan dang  ma rig pa'i gnyen por shes rab dang  thabs med pa'i gnyen por shes rab kyis thabs la mkhas pa dang  smon  pa med pa'i gnyen por bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam dang  rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi stobs chung ba'i gnyen por stobs dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa'i mi shes pa thams cad kyi gnyen por ye shes te / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221185#221185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_894;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_895# rigs kyi bu dang po gsum ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pas bsdus par rig par bya'o // / +bsam gtan ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pas bsdus pas so // /
column7: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1113579#1113579#TD4050E.TXT.r_2276# yang gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni gang gis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pas gnas pa'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692992#1692992#TD4048E.TXT.r_1300;TD4048E.TXT.r_1301# byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du mi ngoms pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan  dang ; / +shes rab kyi bsam par 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350502#1350502#TD4037E.TXT.r_4659;TD4037E.TXT.r_4660# yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa'i shes rab gang zhe na / /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370731#2370731#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7119;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7120;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7121# thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis thos pa'i shes rab ni ming la dmigs pa'o // / +bsams pa'i shes rab ni ming dang don la dmigs pa'o // / +bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni don la dmigs pa'o zhes bstan te / /
column11: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#652254#652255#TD4069E.TXT.r_4175;TD4069E.TXT.r_4176# de kho na  'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid nges par 'byed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par byed pas na nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab bo // /
column12: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2022960#2022960#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6540# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa'i bde ba'i dbang po'i zag pa med pa'i chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yin no // /
column13: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#165760#165760#TD4035E.TXT.r_7172;TD4035E.TXT.r_7173# thos pa las byung ba'i  shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o // / +don la dmigs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#300107#300107#TD4026E.TXT.r_4435;TD4026E.TXT.r_4436# de la brdar  btags pas thob pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa'o // / +chos nyid kyis thob pa ni bsam gtan dang  zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa'o // /

column3: shes pa bzhin du  don gyi tshul gyi gnas lta bu zhes bya ba la don ni gzugs la sogs pa ste yul lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225697#225704#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1514;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516# de dag gis bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub par nus par gyur pa'o // / +yang na nang gi  yid la byed pas bsam gtan bskyed pa bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis bsdus pa'o // /
column5: 0.029#TD4097E.TXT.r#2223594#2223594#TD4097E.TXT.r_2782;TD4097E.TXT.r_2783# snyoms par 'jug pa 'di la 'du shes med pas na 'di ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug  pa'o ; / / +yang na 'du shes med par snyoms par 'jug pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o // /

column3: tshul ni rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +don gyi tshul gyi gnas ni ngag la don gyi tshul 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385439#2385439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8881# so so'i skye bo  nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402255#2402255#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397825#2397828#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10307;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10308# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391391#2391391#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9553# kha cig na re mdo'i tshig 'di ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang mthun par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyi gus shes pa dman pa'i khyi gu 'byin par bstan pa yin no zhe'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228195#228195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1815# mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang  mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du yongs su  'dzin pa gsum po yongs su ngal ba med pa dang  bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang  'khor 'dul ba'i las dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column10: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390246#2390247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9417# phan yon rnam pa brgyad dang  rnam pa bcu ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column11: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398998#2398998#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397727#2397728#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220523#220523#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_811# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshungs pa med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes  bstan te / /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column15: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358073#2358073#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5504# chos kyi sku thob pa dang  yongs su grub pa dang  yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen  po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa de'i 'gab lo dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las 'bras bu bzhi rnam par rtog par 'byung bas / /
column16: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387236#2387237#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column17: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241245#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269882#269883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7043# gzhan yang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column19: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391027#2391028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column20: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399359#2399360#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10488# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar te / /
column21: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225536#225537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385937#2385937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401892#2401892#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10818# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las / /
column24: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386555#2386556#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column26: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382521#2382521#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
