column30: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242616#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column31: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228884#228884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1906# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column32: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228420#228420#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1845# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum yod pa rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnam     // /
column33: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229526#229526#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1991# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /

column3: don gyi tshul gyi gnas dang 'dra bas don gyi tshul gyi gnas lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225719#225736#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1517;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1518# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / / +'grel pa de las ni / / +byang chub sems dpa'i sde  snod kyi tshig 'bru la dmigs pa las byung ba'i thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang  pha rol po'i gnas lnga la dmigs pa'i shes pa de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mdun rol na yod pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi  rjes la yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: des na 'di ltar don gyi tshul gyi  gnas lta bu'i rnam pa gang dag yin pa de dag don gyi tshul gyi gnas lta bu'i rnam pa dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225737#225746#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1518# byang chub sems dpa'i sde  snod kyi tshig 'bru la dmigs pa las byung ba'i thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang  pha rol po'i gnas lnga la dmigs pa'i shes pa de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mdun rol na yod pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi  rjes la yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: don lta bur snang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +shes pa dang mtshungs pas shes pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225747#225762#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1519# byang chub sems dpa'i sde  snod kyi tshig 'bru la dmigs pa las byung ba'i thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang  pha rol po'i gnas lnga la dmigs pa'i shes pa de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mdun rol na yod pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi  rjes la yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: dper na sngon po la sogs pa phyi rol gyi yul gyis bsgyur ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ltar de dag kyang de bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225762#225770#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1519;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1521# ye shes des ting nge 'dzin skyes pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rab tu 'dren par byed pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  grogs su gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#1259192#1259192#TD4051E.TXT.r_3889# sems mnyam par gzhag pa sngar  bshad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge bas brtan pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#1245818#1245818#TD4051E.TXT.r_1852;TD4051E.TXT.r_1853# zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi  mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#909122#909122#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2372;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2373# pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / / +chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes pas ma ni shes rab kyi pha  rol tu phyin pa'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2937911#2937911#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9611;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9612# gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na / / +shes  rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // /

column3: bum pa la  sogs pa'i ming la sogs pa ni mgul gyen du 'dug pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225769#225786#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1521;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1522;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1523# de ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / / +ye shes de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ye shes shes rab kyi grogs yin par bstan pa ste /// /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225068#225069#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // /
column6: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1184741#1184741#TD4047E.TXT.r_9119# rig pa'i gnas lnga po zhes bya ba la rig pa'i gnas lnga po dag la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i shes rab  kyang de dag la dmigs pa zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o // /
column7: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2908136#2908137#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5639;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5640# mos pas spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos ni sa dang po'i zhi ba nas khyad par can de ji ltar thob par bya zhes dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +shes rab kyi dbang po'i    dmigs par bya ba'i yul ni lhag mthong ste / /
column8: 0.018#TD4029E.TXT.r#2162381#2162383#TD4029E.TXT.r_5508# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220012#1220012#TD4047E.TXT.r_14002;TD4047E.TXT.r_14003# de spangs ma thag nyid du de'i gnyen po'i ye shes 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir / / +rnam par dag pa'i ye shes nyid kyang yin no zhes bya ba la / /
column10: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#1253905#1253905#TD4051E.TXT.r_3091# sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so // /
column11: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#652591#652592#TD4069E.TXT.r_4236;TD4069E.TXT.r_4237# de nyid las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'di ltar  tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de nyid las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab thob pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ste / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344071#2344071#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3867;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3868# ji ltar legs par bsams pa'i chos de dag gcig tu dben par 'dug ste yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bsams pa'i shes rab bstan pa ste / / +bsams pa'i shes rab de ni thos pa'i shes rab kyis bsams pa'i chos     // /
column13: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3042016#3042016#TD4018E.TXT.r_4893# chud pa'i rgyud de nyid la sems can gzud pa'i phyir rtag pa dang  bdag dang byed pa por smra ba mngon par zhen pa  rnams mi rtag pa dang  bdag med pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  mi mdzes pa dang  stong pa'i chos de kho na nyid yongs su shes par bya ba dang  'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang  bdag  dang gzhan la phan par bya ba dang  byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang  bsod nams dang ye shes mngon par spel bar bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang thabs la mkhas par bstan to // /
column14: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#328863#328863#TD4009E.TXT.r_1261# tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub ba dang  mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pas ni 'jig rten pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa la brten nas bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang  mthu bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu myong bas 'jig rten pa'i  shes rab rnam par dag par rig par bya'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900350#900350#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1390;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1391# de'i yon tan dang nyes pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +shes rab kyis 'khor ba stong par mthong bas 'khor ba'i nyes pa la mi rtog / /
column16: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1217206#1217206#TD4047E.TXT.r_13614# kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas ye shes dang  mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa gnon pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no // /
column17: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2908148#2908148#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5641# shes rab kyis ni sa dang por rtogs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ji ltar thob par bya zhes dmigs par byed pa'i phyir / /
column18: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1522700#1522701#TD4061E.TXT.r_1352;TD4061E.TXT.r_1353# rnam par grol ba thob pa'i phyir ro // / +shes rab kyis so sor 'bigs par byed  do zhes bya ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis so // /
column19: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1370192#1370192#TD4037E.TXT.r_7234;TD4037E.TXT.r_7235# gnas pa de yang sa bdun pa la sbyor ba las 'byung ba'i spyod pa  mthar thug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon po gang yin pa des bsdus par rig par bya'o // / +de chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du gyur pas byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen  rnams kyang 'dren par byed pa 'jig rten pa rnams kyi 'dus byas kyi gnas pas kyang gnas par mi byed do // /
column20: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2160485#2160485#TD4029E.TXT.r_5250;TD4029E.TXT.r_5251# pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu spyod pas phun sum tshogs pa dang skye ba la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ni des nges par 'gyur ba'o // / +rtag tu lhun gyis grub par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro  zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la sogs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas lhun gyis grub par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907779#907779#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2205;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2206# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la bya'o // / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  BSGOM PA LA SOGS PA'I SGO nas tshol ba nyid  byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1245818#1245818#TD4051E.TXT.r_1852;TD4051E.TXT.r_1853# zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi  mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / /
column23: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2911705#2911705#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6126# de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum las kyang gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so // /
column24: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3057248#3057248#TD4018E.TXT.r_6880;TD4018E.TXT.r_6881# brtags pa las skye bas na de lta bu'i phyir kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid do // / +yang dag pa'i ye shes ni shes rab dpyod pa'i rang bzhin no // /
column25: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231066#231066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2182# snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  rtag  tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column26: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#621804#621804#TD4013E.TXT.r_1508# de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang  mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir bsod nams shin du khyad par du 'phags par rig  par bya'o // /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256176#256176#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5235# yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: de bas na shes bya rnams kyang shes pa bzhin no // / +rang gi don khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba la / /
de ni rang yang yin la don yang yin pas rang gi don te / / +phyi rol gyi yul lo // / +khong du chud pa  ni rtogs pa ste nges zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119329#3119332#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3976;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3977;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3978# des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub nus par 'gyur bas / / +de'i phyir ngas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225024#225024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1439# de'i phyir ngas  thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snga ma gsum po dag gi grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu pa bstan te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403223#2403225#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /

column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224977#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# bsdu  ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /

column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column18: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362931#2362935#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6097;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6098# phyi ma bzhi ni bden pa bzhi yin no zhes bshad do // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung bas / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226525#226527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214079#214079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_10;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_11# kun tu rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len de dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang   dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225855#225868#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221970#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225869#225884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1531;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1532# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228566#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231003#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236140#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236670#236673#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245240#245242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246078#246082#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272278#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273602#273605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229979#229980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2057# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388443#2388444#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column19: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column20: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column21: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column22: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237160#237164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column23: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column24: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242523#242523#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640# bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; /
column25: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248703#248703#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column26: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column27: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237283#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column28: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360973#2360973#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5844# tshig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshig rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column29: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361054#2361054#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5855# yi ge gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa yi ge'i rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column30: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221161#221166#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column31: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271459#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column32: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column33: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238744#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column34: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354620#2354621#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5096# zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'dres pa'i chos la  dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355499#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359981#2359981#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5714# kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba mthun par chos rnams yid la byed ba dang  bar chad med pa'i sems de yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan zhes bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched DU'O ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381237#2381238#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8412# 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnams la 'dod pa bzhin du ma thob pa ni lhag mthong gi gags yin NO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388512#2388515#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9191# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed DE ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402964#2402966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10950;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10951# rigs kyi bu don chen po yongs su grub cing sngon ma 'dris pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob nas dga' ba chen po skye bas de'i phyir dang po ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes  bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214268#214269#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_29;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_30# rigs kyi bus de dag la kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni bcu gcig yod do zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231654#231657#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2248# rigs kyi bu nga ni nams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams gong du bstan pa bzhi mtshan nyid lnga po ma gtogs par rnam par dag pa gzhan yod par mi smra mod kyi  ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column26: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264975#264977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6445# de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mthun  par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid DO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS  ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column41: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371533#2371536#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7222# 'on kyang 'dir khyod la mdor bsdus te de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas  yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column42: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392059#2392059#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9621# yang dag  pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rnam pa bcu drug gi skye ba rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi skye ba la mkhas pa zhes bya'o zhes pa la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column43: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393919#2393919#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9847# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na tshor ba rnam pa gnyis ma lus par 'gag par 'gyur TE ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston  to // /
column44: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398546#2398546#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10386# byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngar mos pas spyod  pa'i sa la chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu la brten nas mos pa'i bzod pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column48: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348628#2348630#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4333# rigs kyi bu rgyun chags su yid la byed pa gang gis sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column49: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247759#247759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4297# rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column51: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345522#2345522#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4024# lhag mthong gi rjes su mthun pa'i  mos pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column52: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380427#2380427#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8311# rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dpag tu med pa ji snyed bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad  'dis bsdus pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column53: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397594#2397594#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10267# rigs kyi bu sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: mig la sogs pa la rag las te rnam par shes pa de dag skye ba ni gnyi  ga'i kha na las te rnam par shes pa 'byung mod kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yin pas dbang po rnams kyis brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225926#225939#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1537;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1539# lan mdor  gsungs pa dang  gzhung bzhin rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni sgra la sogs pa sdud do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225938#225947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1539;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1540# 'di ni dang po de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / / +ngas rab tu 'dren par byed pa la dgongs pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims de ltar bstan te / /

column3: tshul gyi gnas lta bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba gang dag ce na / / +rnam par shes pa rnams so // / +rang gi don  khong du chud par byed pa ni gzugs la sogs pa khong du chud par byed pa dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225948#225961#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1539;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1540;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1541;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1542# ngas rab tu 'dren par byed pa la dgongs pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims de ltar bstan te / / +phyi ma phyi ma'i    don nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1532137#1532137#TD4061E.TXT.r_2666;TD4061E.TXT.r_2667# su zhig yid ches par 'gyur zhes gsungs nas spyan legs kyi skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa ni bdag nyid la dad pa nyid du 'gyur bar yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +don  'di ston te / /
column6: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2084582#2084582#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15453;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15454# sangs rgyas kyi sras po ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung bar zhugs pa rnams med  pa'i phyir dang  rtog ge ngan pa rnams kyi tshig dang  don sgro btags pas dkrugs pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar thub pa'i bstan pa lkog mar srog phyin pa dang 'dra ba dang  dri ma rnams stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119362#3119362#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3980;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3981# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de dag gong nas gong du 'grub pa'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir te / / +byang chub sems dpa' lus dang longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims  yang dag par len par byed do // /

column3: ngag gi sgras ni don brjod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba la / / +ngag nyid sgra yin pas ngag gi sgra ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225962#225980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1541;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1542;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1543;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1544# de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed do // / +tshul khrims yang dag par bsrungs na bzod pa sgom par byed do // /
column5: 0.012#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119374#3119381#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3983;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3984# bzod pa dang ldan brtson 'grus brtsam par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2249569#2249570#TD4010E.TXT.r_2380;TD4010E.TXT.r_2381;TD4010E.TXT.r_2382# tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +bzod pa sgom par byed / / +brtson 'grus rtsom par byed / /

column3: ngag gi sgra des don brjod par mi 'gyur te bsnyad par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.009#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1065103#1065105#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2043;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2044# dad par gyur  pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1321023#1321023#TD4037E.TXT.r_730# brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur zhing / /
column6: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869855#2869856#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_249# de'i rim pa yang brtson 'grus brtsams na bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732193#1732194#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4397;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4398# stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang   spro ba dang  brtan pa dang pha rol gnon pa khur mi 'dor ba gang gis pags pa dang  rtsa rgyus dang  rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang  khrag skams kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang dang  stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang  spro ba dang  brtan  pa dang  pha rol gnon pa dang  khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te / / +de 'di snyam du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas nas lus ngal ba skyes sam / /
column8: 0.024#TD4027E.TXT.r#557829#557830#TD4027E.TXT.r_967;TD4027E.TXT.r_968# rgyu dang 'bras bu la dad par gyur ba'i rgyus 'bras bu la brtson 'grus rtsom mo // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni dran pa nye bar  gnas so // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226097#226098#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1560# gnyen po la mi brjed pas brtson 'grus rtsom mo // / +brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems mnyam par 'jog go // /
column10: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#642165#642165#TD4069E.TXT.r_2746# lus dub par gyur pa dang  sems dub par gyur pa na brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /

column3: ci'i phyir zhe na / / +me zhes brjod pas tshig par gyur ta re / / +'di la ngag gi sgra ni mngon par brjod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225981#225989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1544;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1545# brtson 'grus brtsams nas bsam gtan sgrub par 'gyur ro // / +bsam gtan dang ldan na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gzhung bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snga phyir go rims rgya cher bshad pa'o // /

column3: brjod par bya ba ni ming ngo // / +don ni brjod par bya ba yang ma yin par brjod pa yang ma yin no // / +gal te ngag gi sgra brjod par bya ba don du gyur na ni de'i phyir tshig par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225990#226006#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1545;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1546;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1547# bsam gtan dang ldan na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gzhung bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snga phyir go rims rgya cher bshad pa'o // /

column3: ji lta zhe na / / +'di la sgras don phrad nas 'dzin tam ma phrad par 'dzin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226005#226015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1546;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1547;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1548# 'di ni bstan bcos  mdo sde'i rgyan las rab tu 'dren pa'i go rims zhes bstan pa nyid de / /

column3: de la    ma phrad par don 'dzin par mi rung ste / / +sgra ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir lag pa la sogs pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226016#226026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1547;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1548;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1549;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1550;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1551# de'i phyir bstan bcos de la snga ma la phyi ma zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / / +snga ma la brten nas phyi ma 'byung ba'o // /

column3: lag pa la sogs pa ni ma phrad par reg pa 'dzin pa'i mthu med do // / +ci ste sna la sogs pa bzhin du phrad nas don 'dzin par 'dod na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226027#226040#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1550;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1551;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1552;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1553# longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims yang dag par len to // / +tshul khrims dang ldan  pas bzod pa skyed do // /

column3: de lta na ni me dang phrad pas sgra tshig pa'i skyon du 'gyur te / / +sgra ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226041#226051#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1552;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1554;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1555# bzod pa bskyed nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed do // / +ting nge 'dzin bskyed nas de kho na nyid kyi chos rab tu shes par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252683#252683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4821# spong ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan NYID YIN PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / /

column3: de bas na ngag gis don brjod par mi 'gyur bar grub po // / +gal te don brjod par bya ba ma yin na gang yin snyam pa la de'i phyir ngag ces bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226052#226066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1554;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1555# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / / +ci'i phyir pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims bstan ce na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ngag gi sgras ni ming brjod do // / +ming gis ni don go bar byed de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226067#226075#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1556# ci'i phyir pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims bstan ce na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478205#478206#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3668;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3669# sems can gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang  sprul pa'i sku las gud na med do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la dbus dang mtha' med pa de  bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan yang de bzhin te / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478693#478694#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3733;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3734# nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel ba las ni ji ltar nam mkha' de mtha' med pa / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529728#529729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10487# gnas zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang / /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405392#2405392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11183;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11184# blo gros shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar so so  yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur cing / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469130#469131#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2590# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang gong ma'i rnam par bshad pa gsum char dang ldan  no ;; /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476012#476013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3424# de bzhin du byis pa chung du la sogs pas kyang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534910#534912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11140;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11141# kun du rtog pa tsam du dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni nor ba'i rnam par shes pas brtags pa nyi tshe yod par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356926#2356928#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5368;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5369# nyon mongs pa shin tu nyams smad par byed pa'i phyir yang 'jig  par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233841#233843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2535# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474177#474178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3218;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3219# bcom ldan 'das  kyi yon tan khyad par can gsungs pa dang  gzhan dag rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226775#226775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1648# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536695#536695#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11365;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11366# nyon  mongs pa can gyi yid do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: de'i blo skyed pa'i phyir ro // / +ming ni rjod par  byed pa ma yin pas brjod pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226074#226084#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1556# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs  spyod la ma chags na tshul khrims bsrung nus so // /

column3: ming gis rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ming gis don khong du chud par byed pa ni rigs kyi sgras ni ma yin te / /

column10: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386198#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403320#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404779#2404781#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406123#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220613#220615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226107#226127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1561;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1564# sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag  pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir / / +rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237855#237858#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357710#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385674#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405365#2405368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags PA THOB PA'I PHYIR RO zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220983#220984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column26: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238005#238007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /

column28: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226151#226160#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /

column3: 'du byed kyi dngos po ni 'di snyed do zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226344#226351#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1591;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1592# snga ma ni tha ma  yin la / / +phyi ma ni rab yin no // / +gsum pa ni rags pa dang phra ba ste / /

column3: ji ltar bstan pa de ltar bshad par bya ste / / +de'i phyir da ni rnam par shes pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226352#226363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1595# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las ba tus pa las bstan pa dang mthun te / /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa yul  gyi dngos po zhes bya ba la / / +dngos po smos pas ni rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa ma yin no zhes de skad ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226362#226374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1597# de'i phyir de de nyid kyi tshig le'ur BYAS PA LAS / / +snga ma la brten phyi ma skye // /

column3: gang zla ba gnyis mthong ba yang yin nam / / +de ni zla ba'i gzugs la sogs pa de nyid la dmigs nas 'khrul pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226375#226390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1601# pha  rol phyin drug go rims bstan // / +mi 'khrugs pa la rgyu gsum yod // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224464#224464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378# kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: gal te dmigs pa la mi ltos par  rnam par shes pa 'byung na / / +de ltar gyur na ni gnas la mi ltos par yang 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226272#226273#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1580# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ji skad du / / +rab tu 'dren pa dang rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  rags pa dang  phra ba zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: de lta na ni rnam par shes pa drug rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur ro // / +mdo las gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226403#226422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1604# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pas ji skad du rab tu 'dren pa dang  rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang   rags pa dang  phra ba dang  sla ba dang dka' ba'o // / +yang na sla ba dang  dka' bas gong ma'i rags pa dang  phra ba bstan pa yin te / /

column3: tsam zhes bya    ba smos pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid bsal ba'i don to // / +des na rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi yul ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya bas don der 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226423#226431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1604;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605# snga ma snga mas phyi ma phyi ma rab tu 'dren pa dang  phyi ma phyi mas snga ma snga ma rnam par  dag par byed pa dang  snga ma snga ma ni rags pa yin la / /
column5: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#660376#660376#TD4069E.TXT.r_5313;TD4069E.TXT.r_5314# rnyed par dka' ba nyid du yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ni gang sngon ma bshad pa da  bshad pas so // / +snga ma snga ma la rnam par spyod pa'i phyir ni snga ma snga ma la yang yongs su rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: so sor zhes bya ba'i tshig ni khyab par 'dod pa'i tha tshig go // / +don dang don so sor dmigs pa ni so sor rnam par rig pa'o zhes gal te rnam par shes  pa thams cad kyi yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397224#2397227#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397244#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397268#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397570#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214021#214024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220203#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221935#221937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1013# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222909#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223639#223641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1263# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad  ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226430#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226441#226448#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column20: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column21: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column22: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236442#236443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2882# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to ; / /
column23: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236638#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column29: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216406#216409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column30: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235783#235786#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column31: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245279#245282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005# de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column32: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231592#231604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column33: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236093#236099#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2839# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column34: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236517#236518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column35: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237127#237128#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2957;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2958# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rgyu ni gang lags / /
column36: 0.017#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /

column38: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238777#238777#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3183# pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag las pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyid ces bya BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /

column40: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226477#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column42: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244717#244717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column43: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#485008#485008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4644# byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zab mo dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba dang  byang chub sems dpa'  sems dpa' chen po tshul bzhin kun tu 'dri ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros shin tu rnam par dag pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa'i blo gros dang  byang chub  sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan 'byung gnas dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam yang dag 'phags dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang    byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la sogs pa ni gtso bor gyur te zhes bya bas ni gsum pa gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas ming smos pa zhes bya ba bstan te / /
column44: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216366#216366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: chos mngon pa las yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas sngon po'o zhes rnam par shes pas so zhes 'byung ba de ji lta bu / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226449#226457#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: 'du shes dang ldan pas de skad du ston to // / +mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang skyon 'di ji ltar mi 'byung zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226458#226469#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380776#2380777#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi LAS STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388443#2388446#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237160#237163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239243#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235755#235756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238743#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244131#244133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column16: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column19: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236670#236672#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361725#2361725#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5947# de dag bsdus pa las so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI lnga pa 'dris pa rnam par bshad PA BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column21: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column22: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264934#264934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad PA BSTAN TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column23: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272668#272668#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column24: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361674#2361674#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5943# de dag so so las yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI bzhi pa ma  'dres par rnam par bshad PA BSTON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol pa'o // /
column25: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231619#231622#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column26: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column27: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247722#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i SKU STON TO // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column28: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245239#245241#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column29: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398352#2398353#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10369;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370# ji ltar yan lag rnam pa bcu gcig gis sa rnams bsdus par  'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa yan lag bcu gcig sdud PAR STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253419#253419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4930# dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad PAR STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column31: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246079#246079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /

column3: 'du shes zhan pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi don ni 'grel pa las ston te / / +mig la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa zhes bya ba ni tshor ba la sogs pa dang  snang ba la sogs pa gang du byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226470#226487#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1611# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs PAS BSTAN TE / / +'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // /

column12: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220199#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad DO ZHES BYA BA NI GSUM pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column19: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha DAD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231592#231592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom PA LA 'JOG PA GANG yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column23: 0.023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /

column25: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235833#235833#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2807# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / / +rnam pa lnga po de dag re re la yang las re re yod par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so // /

column3: des yongs su zin na 'byung ba ni dper na gzugs brnyan 'byung nus pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343603#2343606#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3805# mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang lung bstan pa'i sde dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du    brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs  pas lan du gsungs pa yang dag par ston to // /
