column5: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119407#3119416#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3988;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3989# sbyin pa rnam pa gsum ni chos sbyin pa dang  zang zing sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o // /

column3: de ni 'di skad du / / +mig la sogs pa  yang sems can du gdags pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin mod kyi / / +'on kyang dngos su na rnam par shes pa nyid de gdags pa'i rgyu yin gyi mig la sogs pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226689#226696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1635;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1637;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1638# 'di yang rnam pa drug bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa drug tu dbye ste / / +'di ni dang po sbyin ba rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa yul so sor rnam par rig pa ni gzugs la sogs pa so sor yongs su gcod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226708#226719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1641;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1642;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1643;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1644# ser sna'i dri ma dang  sog 'jog gi dri ma bsal nas bzang po dang  gcang ba dang  rung ba sbyin par byed pa ste / /

column3: so sor rnam par rig par byed pa nyid gang yin pa de so sor rnam par rig par byed pa ste / / +'di ltar mig gis bltas nas rnam par shes pas rnam par shes  so ; / /

column3: rtsva dang sog ma'i me zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +de'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi ste zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403881#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# bstan bcos theg pa chen po  bsdus pa las ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226747#226760#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po  de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang  chos dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527910#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dmar po dang  dkar po de dag dang  grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu gyur ces  bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323907#2323908#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1587# mthong ba'i chos dang  tshe rabs phyi ma la dge ba'i chos gong nas gong du 'phel ba dang  yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390581#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# der mngon sum du 'gyur zhing khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397793#2397793#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10299;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404472#2404473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11101# bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i shes pa'i gnas yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238145#238145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column14: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column15: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column16: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473917#473917#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3190# yang na padma'i 'dab ma mnga' ba'i phyir rnam shes gsungs so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las tshig 'di gcig gis gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan te / /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column22: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column23: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /

column30: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column31: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387662#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column42: 0.023#TD4019E.TXT.r#2481429#2481429#TD4019E.TXT.r_9657# gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa las slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis / /

column3: de gang zhe na / / +sna  tshogs shes pas rnam par shes pa'o zhes smos pa'o // / +mtshan nyid bsam pa'i skabs su smos pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid bsam pa'i skabs su'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474177#474178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3218;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3219# bcom ldan 'das  kyi yon tan khyad par can gsungs pa dang  gzhan dag rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226761#226777#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1648# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469130#469131#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2590# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang gong ma'i rnam par bshad pa gsum char dang ldan  no ;; /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529728#529729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10487# GNAS ZHES BYA BA NI rgyu'i don to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang / /

column5: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221692#1221694#TD4047E.TXT.r_14242;TD4047E.TXT.r_14243# gang  gi tshe gdul bya gdul dka' ba bdag nyid kyis 'dul bar mi nus pa de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do // / +mi 'dzin par mi byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir mi 'dzin par yang mi byed do zhes bya ba'o // /
column6: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2769199#2769200#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9573# 'di ltar dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams legs par zhu bas ni 'phel bar byed la mi mthun par zhu bas ni 'grib par byed kyi / /
column7: 0.017#TD4099E.TXT.r#117280#117281#TD4099E.TXT.r_2511;TD4099E.TXT.r_2512# kha cig mngon par rgyug par byed la / / +de dag lhag par zhen par byed cing lhag par rgyug par byed pa dag mig  dang ldan pas mthong ngo // /
column8: 0.021#TD4099E.TXT.r#117295#117297#TD4099E.TXT.r_2513;TD4099E.TXT.r_2514# mtha' gnyis po 'di dag mthong ba na zhen par mi byed rgyug par mi byed la / / +de dag lhag par zhen par mi byed cing lhag par rgyug par mi byed pa yang mig dang ldan pas mthong ngo // /
column9: 0.023#TD4018E.TXT.r#3024043#3024043#TD4018E.TXT.r_2697;TD4018E.TXT.r_2698# gsung ba'i tshig dang  gzung  ba med pa'i tshig ni shes pa 'di sa chud par byed de / / +rtogs par byed 'dzin par skyed pas na gzung ba'i tshig go // /
column10: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141147#1141147#TD4047E.TXT.r_2880;TD4047E.TXT.r_2881# thams cad  la sems mnyam pa'i phyir gzhan la phun tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de dag la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyang mi byed do // / +gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston par byed do // /
column11: 0.024#TD4082E.TXT.r#1808336#1808337#TD4082E.TXT.r_167;TD4082E.TXT.r_168;TD4082E.TXT.r_169# khro bas zil gyis non nas lag pa'am / / +bong ba'am dbyig pas sems can rnams la rdeg par  byed / /
column12: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339998#1339998#TD4037E.TXT.r_3298;TD4037E.TXT.r_3299;TD4037E.TXT.r_3300# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par byed pa ni gzhan dag la mi  bsten par yang mi byed / / +ha cang bsten par yang mi byed / / +dus ma yin par yang bsten par yang mi byed / /
column13: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2751032#2751032#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7076;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7077;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7078;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7079# shes rab dang ldan pa de dag la ni / / +bkur stir byed / / +bla mar byed / / +ri mor byed / /
column14: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1864619#1864619#TD4039E.TXT.r_5726# reg pa dag dang  mi sdug pa'i lag pa dang   dbyug pa dang  bong ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag gi kun du spyod pa byas kyang de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i 'du shes byed de dag la yang mi rtag par yang dag par mthong bas rjes su chags par yang mi byed khong khro bar yang mi byed de / /
column15: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#686435#686435#TD4083E.TXT.r_275;TD4083E.TXT.r_276;TD4083E.TXT.r_277# gzhan dag la mi bsten par yang mi byed / / +ha cang bsten par yang mi byed / / +dus ma yin par bsten par yang mi byed / /
column16: 0.025#TD4087E.TXT.r#1562811#1562811#TD4087E.TXT.r_745;TD4087E.TXT.r_746;TD4087E.TXT.r_747# dge sbyong bram ze rnams kyis bzod par byed // / +des ni gnang bar bya ba'i chos rnams  gang // / +bde bar byed dang dge ba'i gtso bo gang // /
column17: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125678#3125678#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4738# des kyang de byed la mi  byed na yang log pa'i chos yongs su bsngo bas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391152#2391152#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9526# rnal 'byor ba yang shin tu sbyangs pa'i tshogs kyis lus kyi gnas ngan len gyi tshogs mngon par 'byin par byed mngon par sel bar byed / /
column19: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772785#2772785#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10016;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10017# shin tu sbyangs pa'i tshogs kyis gnas ngan  len gyi tshogs mngon par 'byin par byed / / +mngon par sel bar byed / /
column20: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1016821#1016822#TD4054E.TXT.r_4355;TD4054E.TXT.r_4356# 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar lus rnam pa sna  tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa de dag ni nags sbyor rnams zhes bya ba'o // /
column21: 0.026#TD4009E.TXT.r#325738#325738#TD4009E.TXT.r_823;TD4009E.TXT.r_824# thos pa'i shes rab kyis brten pa'i phyir 'khor  ba'i 'jigs pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro // / +dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba ni bstan pa las rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba'i gnyen por rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du  'dzud pas log pa'i bstan pa las ring du gyur pa yin te / /
column22: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1750611#1750611#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6650;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6651# de bzhin gshegs pa rang nyid kyis mkhyen cing mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'chad par byed / / +ston par byed / /
column23: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#12511#12512#TD4036E.TXT.r_1818;TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# chags pa dang zhen pa dang  'chums pa dang mdud pa por bas yongs su longs spyod par byed do // / +de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / /
column24: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#19807#19807#TD4036E.TXT.r_2898;TD4036E.TXT.r_2899;TD4036E.TXT.r_2900# nyes par bsam pa sems pa dang  nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang  nyes par bya ba'i las byed cing / / +chos brtan par sems par mi byed / / +dam por sems par mi byed pas / /
column25: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#704782#704783#TD4091E.TXT.r_1894;TD4091E.TXT.r_1895# de la skye bas ni chos de skyed par byed do // / +gnas pas ni gnas par byed do // /
column26: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3044935#3044935#TD4018E.TXT.r_5317;TD4018E.TXT.r_5318# brjod pa'i  don chud par byed la / / +byed pa dang byed pa por mngon par 'brel par yang chud par byed do // /
column27: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1933073#1933073#TD4032E.TXT.r_2146;TD4032E.TXT.r_2147# de la  srid pa la chags pa dang  longs spyod la chags pas ni bde 'gror sems sngo bar byed do // / +sems zhum pas ni nyan thos kyi theg par sngo bar byed do // /
column28: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296290#1296290#TD4086E.TXT.r_2025;TD4086E.TXT.r_2026;TD4086E.TXT.r_2027# btsun par byed / / +ri mor byed / / +mchod par byed do // /

column3: kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang  gsungs te / / +log par lta ba la sogs pa log par rtog pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226873#226877#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1660;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1661# mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas ni de dag 'khor sdud par byed do // / +chos kyi sbyin pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  rnam par grol ba de dag yongs su smin par byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226878#226886#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1661;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1662# chos kyi sbyin pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  rnam par grol ba de dag yongs su smin par byed do // /

column3: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang gsungs te / / +dge slong ngag khyed kyis srog gcod pa'i sems can mthong na de la khyed kyis kye ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226887#226898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1662;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1663;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1664# don de dag  dang ldan pa'i phyir sbyin pa la rnam pa gsum bshad do zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: sems can dmyal ba 'am sems can dmyal ba gang yang rung ba zhig mthong ngo  snyam du nges par shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226899#226912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1664;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1665# mi dge ba las ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshul  khrims rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /

column3: dge slong dag khyed kyis srog gcod pa spangs pa'i sems can mthong na / / +de la khyed kyis lha'am lha gang yang rung ba zhig mthong ngo snyam du sems par shes par bya'o zhes 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226911#226930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1665;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1666;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1667;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1668# ming cung zad mi mthun pa yang don ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column5: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338165#1338166#TD4037E.TXT.r_3076;TD4037E.TXT.r_3077# khyim pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la brten pa'i tshul khrims de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / / +sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims  so ; / /
column6: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#300988#300990#TD4026E.TXT.r_4637# ces bya ba la tshul khrims rnam pa gsum ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims te / /

column3: byed pa'i rgyu yang gsungs te / / +mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig  gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226931#226938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1667;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1668;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1669# sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang   dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni khyim pa dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la brten pa'i tshul khrims rnam par gzhag pa ni / /

column3: dge slong dag de ltar na mig ni bdag po'o // / +gzugs rnams ni dmigs pa'o zhes 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226939#226946#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1668;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1669;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1670;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1671# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni khyim pa dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la brten pa'i tshul khrims rnam par gzhag pa ni / / +mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: de la sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin pas sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226947#226956#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1671;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1672;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1673# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ris bdun po dag gi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: phan  tshun zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig go // / +mtshungs par ldan pa'i yul 'dzin pa'i phyir mnyam du 'jug pas de'i phyir mtshungs pa dang ldan pa dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226952#226968#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1671;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1672;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1673;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1674# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ris bdun po dag gi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gang yin pa'o // / +dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338204#1338210#TD4037E.TXT.r_3081# de la dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpas sdom pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu byang chub chen po'i phyir lus dang ngag gis dge ba bsags pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag  thams cad ni mdor bsdu na / /

column3: mtshungs par ldan pa nyid mtshungs par ldan pa ste / / +de ni mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin la / / +rgyu yang yin pas mtshungs par ldan pa'i     // / +rgyu'o // / +dpe bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226969#226978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1674;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1675;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1676# lus dang ngag gis dge ba bsags pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni mdor bsdu na dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims su shes par bya'o // /

column3: 'di lta ste sems ni tshor ba nas shes rab kyi bar dag gi'o zhes bya ba smos te mtshungs bar ldan pa'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490882#490884#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5501# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje  gcod pa'i 'grel pa las bshad pa'i dgongs pa dang sbyar nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398083#2398085#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10338;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# rgya cher rnam  par dbye ba ni tshigs su bcad ba gsum pa dang 'grel pa nyid las bstan te / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226979#226999#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1675;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1676;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1679# sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste / / +byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228087#228088#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1801;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1802;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1803# byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan la brten nas sems can gyi bya ba dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang  sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug  bsngal sel ba dang  rigs pa ston pa dang  byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor te phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  'jigs pa rnams las byung ba dang  yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang  yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang  sems dang mthun  par 'jug pa dang  yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang  legs par tshar gcod pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang  'dun par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzod pa'i 'grel  pa las / /
column8: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227303#227306#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1720# yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529703#529707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474725#474726#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380102#2380103#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8272;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8273# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +do ni de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyi bstan bcos nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477880#477881#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: bar dag gi zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sems la sogs pa yongs su sdud do // / +char ba la sogs pa de dag kyang sems kyi mtshungs  par ldan pa'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403597#2403599#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11024# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226999#227007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1679;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1680;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / / +dang po ni rten du gyur pa yin te / /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227305#227306#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1720# yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya BA LA SOGS PA RGYA cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487055#487059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4938# gsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni dri ba dris pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column8: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252314#252316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column9: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252946#252947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4854# ma mo de dag la yang ming mang du yod pas     // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221310#221311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_914# de la bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346439#2346442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4119# logs shig na bdag nyid du gyur pa ni med do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa mdzad pa las kyang 'di lta ste / /

column15: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540238#540238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /

column17: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347849#2347851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4246# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las // /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546764#546765#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12623# de la thun mong du bstan pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ji skad du / /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222164#222164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column20: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380103#2380103#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8272;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8273# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +do ni de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyi bstan bcos nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477550#477550#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314616#2314616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column23: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387663#2387663#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od zer dang bral bar mi 'byung ngo // / +de bzhin du sems kyang tshor ba la sogs pa dang bral bar mi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227006#227019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1680;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681# tshul khrims gzhan rnam pa  gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir / / +de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // /

column3: phan tshun 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gang dag phan tshun du 'bras bu yin pa de dag ni phan tshun 'bras bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473482#473483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475458#475461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475708#475712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227020#227032#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1683;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1684# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // /
column8: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487079#487079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4940# shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das    kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni gnas yod pa dang  tha dad pa'i tshig med par bstan pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang  bstan ba de rgya cher spel du rung ba dang  bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs  pas tshig tha dad pa med par bstan pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227342#227343#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1726# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403346#2403348#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10995;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10996# tshul khrims yongs su grub pa'i phyir dang  'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don gyis  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475605#475605#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3375# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las 'di ltar dus thams cad du shes rab yongs su sbyangs pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i  lam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i bdag nyid goms par byas pas bag chags thams cad dang gtan du bral ba'i gnas su byon pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537106#537106#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11424# de'i phyir de nyid las las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba myong ba la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244696#244696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3935;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3936# byas kyang kha na ma tho ba med pa la bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405056#2405057#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11157# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar mtshan ma thams  cad dang mngon bar 'du byed pa thams cad kyis de'i sems gyo bar mi nus pa'i phyir dang  sa bdun pa la mtshan ma thams cad kyis mi gyo zhing kun du mi 'byung mod kyi / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346574#2346574#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4132;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4133# mtshon gyis ni rang nyid la mi gcod do zhes brjod pa dag dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536721#536721#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11369;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11370# yid kyi khams so zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas yid kyi khams gang yin pa de ni zab po'i rnam par rig pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: 'di lta ste 'byung ba rnams gcig gi rgyu gcig yin pa  zhes bya ba smos te / / +de la sa'i khams ni chu la sogs pa gsum la ltos te 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA DE 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403966#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /

column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227749#227750#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /

column22: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387663#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column24: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu MKHYEN PA ZHES BYA BA NYID do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477550#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i YON TAN ZHES BYA BA nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390234#2390234#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9416# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med dang dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: chu la sogs pa yang sa la ltos nas 'byung ste / / +de dag gi 'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227068#227076#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1689;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1690# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /

column3: mtshan gyi gzhi ni gzugs la sogs pa'o // / +mtshan nyid rnams ni skye ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227077#227086#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1690;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1691;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1693# tshul khrims rnam  pa gsum po 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rgyu'o // /

column3: sems  kyang sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba la sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ngang tshul can de dag ni sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227084#227096#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1693;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1695# tshul khrims dang po de ni spangs pa'i yon tan no // / +tshul khrims gnyis pa ni shes rab kyi yon tan no // /

column3: lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu 'dra mod kyi 'on kyang khyad par bstan pa'i phyir phan tshun gyi stobs kyis zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227095#227111#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1696;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1697# tshul khrims gsum pa ni drin gyi yon tan no // / +mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni yon tan 'di gsum las  gud na med pa'i phyir / /

column3: gcig gi  stobs kyis gcig go // / +dper na 'gron po mang po dag gcig la gcig mi ltos par lam gyi dgon pa las 'da' bar mi nus pa de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang skad cig pa'i phyir gcig la gcig ma ltos par skye mi nus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227110#227121#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1698# chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i 'grel ba las sdom pa dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims ni go rims bzhin du dge ba byang chub dang  snying rje gsum     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227122#227134#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1698;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1700# chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i 'grel ba las sdom pa dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims ni go rims bzhin du dge ba byang chub dang  snying rje gsum     // / +gyis yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227369#227370#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1729;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1730;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1728# grang ba dang  tsha ba dang  bkres pa dang  skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi ldog pa'i phyir ro // / +chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2870179#2870180#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_302# gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang   chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa gsum las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877588#2877595#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1404;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1405;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1406# ces bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rnam pa gsum ste / / +gnod pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881434#2881438#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1903# bzod pa'i dngos po ni gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2937762#2937766#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9591;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9592;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9593# de bzhin  ma skyes bzod pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la bzod pa rnam pa gsum ste / / +sdug bsngal ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang gsum las chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i  dam pa yin no // /
column11: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#2990912#2990918#TD4053E.TXT.r_3528;TD4053E.TXT.r_3529;TD4053E.TXT.r_3530# tshul khrims rnam pa gsum ni sngom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims so // / +bzod pa rnam pa gsum ni / / +gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang   sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034675#1034681#TD4054E.TXT.r_7086;TD4054E.TXT.r_7087# sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims so // / +bzod pa  rnam pa gsum ni gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa'o // /
column13: 0.011#TD4048E.TXT.r#1693197#1693200#TD4048E.TXT.r_1323# chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column14: 0.014#TD4029E.TXT.r#2160574#2160574#TD4029E.TXT.r_5260# sdug bsngal  la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  gnod par byed pa dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa yang / /
column15: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154237#1154243#TD4047E.TXT.r_4861;TD4047E.TXT.r_4862;TD4047E.TXT.r_4863# bsam pa ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di  la shes rab thob pa dang  dad pa thob pa zhes bstan pa'o // / +yang dag par rtog pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba ni chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#300178#300178#TD4026E.TXT.r_4454# sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa yang go rims bzhin no // /
column17: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346654#1346657#TD4037E.TXT.r_4202# gzhan  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par sems pa la mos pa'i bzod pa'o // /
column18: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1125144#1125144#TD4047E.TXT.r_542;TD4047E.TXT.r_543;TD4047E.TXT.r_544# gzhan gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i  bzod pa'i dbang du byas nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtags rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'i / / +sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa yang ma yin / / +chos la nges par rtogs pa'i yang ma yin no // /
column19: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119422#3119427#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3989;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3990;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3991# tshul khrims    rnam pa gsum ni mi dge ba las ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims so // / +bzod pa rnam pa gsum ni / / +gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi  snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // /

column3: de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'o // / +'gron po mang po ni lam gyi dgon  pa las 'byung bar zhugs pa de dag nyid gcig la gcig lam brgyags kyis mthud pa'i tshul du'o zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig lam brgyags kyis mthud pa dang  gzhan dang gzhan la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227135#227146#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1700;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1701# gnod pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod PA'O ZHES BYA BAS NI GSUM pa bzod pa rnam pa  gsum bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227147#227159#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1701;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1702;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1703# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bzod pa'i le'u las bzod pa ni rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232799#232802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2397# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byed pa la 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346672#1346675#TD4037E.TXT.r_4204# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni  gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byung na 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / /
column8: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154237#1154237#TD4047E.TXT.r_4861;TD4047E.TXT.r_4862# bsam pa ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di  la shes rab thob pa dang  dad pa thob pa zhes bstan pa'o // / +yang dag par rtog pa'i bzod PA ZHES BYA BA NI CHOS LA nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de ltar gcig la gcig nye bar sgrub par byed pa lta bus 'byung ba ste / / +de ltar na de dag ni lam brgyags    kyis mthud pa'i chos dang mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227160#227172#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1703;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1704;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1705# byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa  rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du 'byung ba na 'di ltar yang dag par slob par byed de / /

column3: de ni 'di skad du sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni phan tshun nye bar gnas pa'i phyir yid gcugs pas lus gcig pa lta bur gyur pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las khong du chud do zhes ston par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227170#227190#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1703;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1704;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1705;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1706# byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa  rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du 'byung ba na 'di ltar yang dag par slob par byed de / / +'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227299#227305#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1718;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1720# yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227597#227599#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1750;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1751# dus kyi yun ches thung ba dang  sdug bsngal ches chung bas lta ci smos snyam ba de lta bu ni byang  chub sems dpa'i go cha'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346687#1346694#TD4037E.TXT.r_4205;TD4037E.TXT.r_4206# 'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / / +des na bdag rang gis byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba nyams su  myong la ; /
column8: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232814#232820#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2399# 'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / / +des na bdag rang gis  byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong la / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2332527#2332527#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2562;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2563# yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs shes pa dang  gzugs 'dus pa shes pa dang  gzugs 'gog pa'i 'gro ba shes pa dang  gzugs 'gog pa'i rnam pa shes pa dang  gzugs kyi mngon shes pa dang  gzugs kyi nyes dmigs shes pa dang  gzugs  kyi nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de bas na de dag ni mtshungs par ldan  pa'i zhes brjod kyi skye ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no // / +de dag ni mi ldan pa'i phyir yid gcugs pa ma yin pa ltar gcig la gcig nye bar sgrub cing phan 'dogs pa la mi ltos pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227191#227199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1705;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1706;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1707# des na bdag rang gis byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ngo zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PA RGYA cher  de nyid las bstan PA BZHIN NO // / +gzhan yang de nyid las de la byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347163#1347163#TD4037E.TXT.r_4286;TD4037E.TXT.r_4287# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na / / +'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / /

column3: 'dir ni lhan cig 'byung ba tsam 'ba' zhig gis rgyur khong du chud do // / +sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams  zhes smos pa de dag gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227209#227221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1708;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1709# bdag sngon 'dod pa spyod pa dag la gnas shing 'dod pa rnams yongs su tshol ba na / / +sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par tshor bzhin du 'dod pa sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can rnams kyi phyir zhing las dang  tshong dang  rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba la zhugs nas sdug bsngal mang po mi bzod pa dag nyams su blangs shing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347171#1347185#TD4037E.TXT.r_4288;TD4037E.TXT.r_4289;TD4037E.TXT.r_4290;TD4037E.TXT.r_4291# bdag sngon 'dod pa spyod pa dag la gnas shing 'dod pa rnams yongs su tshol ba na / / +sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par tshor bzhin du / /

column3: de'i phyir sems las byung ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te tshor ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227222#227229#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1709;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1710# sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par tshor bzhin du 'dod pa sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can rnams kyi phyir zhing las dang  tshong dang  rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba la zhugs nas sdug bsngal mang po mi bzod pa dag nyams su blangs shing / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227230#227239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1709;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1710;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1711# sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par tshor bzhin du 'dod pa sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can rnams kyi phyir zhing las dang  tshong dang  rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba la zhugs nas sdug bsngal mang po mi bzod pa dag nyams su blangs shing / / +dang du blangs pa la nyams su myong ba de de ltar don med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347194#1347201#TD4037E.TXT.r_4292;TD4037E.TXT.r_4293# sdug bsngal mang po drag po dag nyams su blangs shing dang du blangs la nyams su myong ba de de ltar don med de / /

column3: de'i phyir gang  dag sems de'i yin ba dag go zhes bya ba smos te / / +gong du brjod ma thag pa'i sems las byung ba rnams dang  bsam gtan dang  zag pa med pa'i sdom pa rnams dang  sems de'i skye ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227238#227247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1710;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1711;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1712# dang du blangs pa la nyams su myong ba de de ltar don med de / / +sdug bsngal kho na'i phyir tshor bzhin du mi shes pa'i nyes pas bdag gis sdug bsngal chen po nyams su blangs na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227248#227255#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1711;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1712;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1713# sdug bsngal kho na'i phyir tshor bzhin du mi shes pa'i nyes pas bdag gis sdug bsngal chen po nyams su blangs na / / +da ni bdag bde ba bsgrub pa'i dge ba la zhugs par tshor bzhin du / /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347200#1347213#TD4037E.TXT.r_4292;TD4037E.TXT.r_4293;TD4037E.TXT.r_4294# sdug bsngal mang po drag po dag nyams su blangs shing dang du blangs la nyams su myong ba de de ltar don med de / / +sdug bsngal kho na'i phyir tshor bzhin du mi  shes pa'i nyes pas bdag gis sdug bsngal chen po nyams su blangs nas / /

column3: gang gi phyir de dag sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya snyam pa la / / +de  dag gi sems dang lhan cig tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227256#227266#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1712;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1713;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1714;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1715# da ni bdag bde ba bsgrub pa'i dge ba la zhugs par tshor bzhin du / / +de las bye brag 'bum 'gyur sdug bsngal dang du blang zhing nyams su blang ba ni cha yin na / /
column5: 0.003#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347222#1347222#TD4037E.TXT.r_4294# da ni bdag bde bsgrub pa'i dge ba la zhugs par tshor bzhin du de las bye ba phrag 'bum 'gyur du sdug bsngal dang du blang zhing nyams su blangs pa ni cha yin na / /

column3: dus gcig pa dang  skye ba gcig pa dang  gnas pa gcig pa dang  'gag pa gcig pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227267#227275#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1714;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1715;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1716# de bas chung du  lta ci smos snyam ste / / +byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / /
column5: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1347240#1347241#TD4037E.TXT.r_4296;TD4037E.TXT.r_4297# byang  chub sems dpa' byang chub la zhugs pa de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed cing / / +gzhi thams cad las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang du len par byed do // /

column3: de la dus gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la / / +'das pa'i sems ni 'das pa rnams dang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227274#227291#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1715;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1716;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1717;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1718;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719# byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / / +gzhi thams cad byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang du len par byed do // /

column3: da ltar byung ba rnams  ni da ltar byung ba rnams dang ngo // / +ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma 'ongs pa rnams dang ste / / +de dag ni dus gzhan na 'jug pa ma yin no // /
dus gcig tu skye bas skye ba gcig pa dang  dus gcig tu gnas pa dang  dus gcig tu 'gag par dus dang skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gag pa gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226991#226995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.009#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490881#490882#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5501# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje  gcod pa'i 'grel pa las bshad pa'i dgongs pa dang sbyar nas / /
column6: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398085#2398085#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380103#2380103#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8272;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8273# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +do ni de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyi bstan bcos nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227597#227597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1750# dus kyi yun ches thung ba dang  sdug bsngal ches chung bas lta ci smos snyam ba de lta bu ni byang  chub sems dpa'i go cha'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de dag gang dag la yod pa de dag dus dang skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gag pa gcig pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227303#227313#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1720;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1721# yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487055#487059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4938# gsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni dri ba dris pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252314#252316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column8: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252946#252947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4854# ma mo de dag la yang ming mang du yod pas     // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /

column11: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221310#221311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_914# de la bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column12: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346439#2346442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4119# logs shig na bdag nyid du gyur pa ni med do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa mdzad pa las kyang 'di lta ste / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529705#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390234#2390234#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9416# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med dang dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column15: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540238#540238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505987#505989#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7436# 'di ltar gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa 'di'i gnyen po yang bstan bcos rnams so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las / /
column17: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380103#2380103#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8272;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8273# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +do ni de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyi bstan bcos nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347849#2347851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4246# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las // /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546764#546765#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12623# de la thun mong du bstan pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ji skad du / /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222164#222164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column21: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314616#2314616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'bras bu gcig pa rnams dang  rgyu mthun pa gcig pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa gcig pa rnams te / / +de la 'bras bu gcig pa ni sems kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227314#227328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1720;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1721;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1722;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1723;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1724# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / / +gnod pa  byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni / /

column3: de dag     // / +gi gang yin pa de nyid sems kyi'o // / +'di lta ste sems kyi 'bras bu tshor ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227326#227340#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1723;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1726# sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ba yang dag par bzod pa'o // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#507769#507770#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7644# phyi  rol gyi mtshan ma'i 'ching bas 'ching ba dang  nang gi gnas ngan len gyi 'ching bas bcings par rtogs par byed do zhes bshad de zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // /
column6: 0.018#TD4029E.TXT.r#2148200#2148200#TD4029E.TXT.r_3590# mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal BA LA SOGS PA BYIS pas kun brtags pa'i chos rnams la gang gi tshe shes pas chos ngo bo nyid med par bzod pa de ni chos  la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste / /
column7: 0.023#TD4019E.TXT.r#2500239#2500240#TD4019E.TXT.r_12253;TD4019E.TXT.r_12254;TD4019E.TXT.r_12255# gang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po stong pa nyid du rtogs pas / / +de 'dra ba'i chos zab mo la bzod pa ni / / +chos la nges par  sems pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227614#227617#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1753;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1754;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1755# byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor bar byed  cing ; / +yang dag par grub par byed pa'o zhes bshad de / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: rgyu mthun pa gcig pa gang dag yin pa de dag rgyu mthun pa gcig pa ste / / +'bras bu 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487079#487080#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4940# shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das    kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni gnas yod pa dang  tha dad pa'i tshig med par bstan pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang  bstan ba de rgya cher spel du rung ba dang  bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs  pas tshig tha dad pa med par bstan pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227341#227351#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1726;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1727# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473483#473484#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475459#475461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475713#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3386# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358147#2358150#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5514;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5515# bsgom pa rnam pa lngas logs shig tu 'bras bu'i ming rnam par gzhag pa gang YIN PA STE / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469133#469133#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2590# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang gong ma'i rnam par bshad pa gsum char dang ldan  no ;; /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397775#2397775#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10296# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni / /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397968#2397968#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10318# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222272#222272#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222722#222723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1137# de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269930#269930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7051# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477932#477932#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3632;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3633# mkhyen pa la 'dres pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan  pa rnams kyang yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las sems can rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pa la ltos nas / /
column18: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254597#1254597#TD4051E.TXT.r_3204;TD4051E.TXT.r_3205# kha na ma tho ba med pa yang dag par 'ged pa la sogs pa'o // / +de la gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba las mi ldog pa'i rgyu'o // /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451981#451981#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_236# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni mdo sde rnams kyi tshig dag gis ngo bo nyid byed do zhes zer ba 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes sun 'byin te / /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521876#521876#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9400# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni gnyis su phye nas bstan te / /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523259#523259#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9598# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las rnam pa lngar bstan pa  yin te de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las 'di lta ste / /
