column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227420#227431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738# go rims bzhin du sems can mi spong ba dang  dman pa'i sems spangs pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rab tu ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119435#3119441#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3992;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3991# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so // /

column3: de dag kyang sngar skyes pa rnams kyi ste skye ba rnams kyi 'o // / +chos 'dra ba ni dge ba yang dge ba rnams kyi yin pa la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227430#227448#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1739# go rims bzhin du sems can mi spong ba dang  dman pa'i sems spangs pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rab tu ston to // / +brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson  'grus dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.011#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925142#925142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183569#1183569#TD4047E.TXT.r_8953# mngon par mos pa dang  'dun pa sngon du 'gro ba dang  gnyen po'i phyogs dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'thob pa dang spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang  lung dang rtogs pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus  dang  bslab pa rjes su srung ba'i brtson 'grus te / /
column7: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348827#1348833#TD4037E.TXT.r_4473;TD4037E.TXT.r_4474# rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; / +lhur sbyor ba'i phyir gus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  so sor brtags shing brtags shing dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams  cad kyis mi 'khrugs shing gzhan du bsgyur du med pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  khyad par thob pa chung ngu dang  ngan don tsam gyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348903#1348906#TD4037E.TXT.r_4477# rnam pa bdun ni phyi phyir zhing bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shas cher 'dun pa dang  smon pa rjes su 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'dun pa dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos rnams la mthun zhing rnal 'byor du gnas par 'gyur la / /
column9: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183411#1183414#TD4047E.TXT.r_8939# khyad par can gyi brtson 'grus kyi  sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983167#983178#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11889;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11891;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11892# brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te / / +rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column11: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348720#1348721#TD4037E.TXT.r_4464;TD4037E.TXT.r_4465# de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dkar po'i chos sgrub par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa dang  skyes pa rnams gnas par byed pa dang  mi nyams par byed pa dang  'phel zhing rgyas  par byed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus las yongs su dag par byed pa ni las rnam pa gsum po lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  yid kyi las dge ba rnam par dag par byed pa dang  sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233924#233932#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang  de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do // /
column13: 0.015#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732196#2732203#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4558;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4559# brtson 'grus kyi dbang po la ste mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga po dag gis rnam pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus de yongs su bstan pa yin te / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum pa'i brtson 'grus dang mi 'khrul pa'i brtson 'grus dang chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column14: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836098#1836106#TD4039E.TXT.r_2613;TD4039E.TXT.r_2614# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; /
column15: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2882848#2882848#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2082# brtson 'grus 'bri dang 'phel zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa'i bye brag ston te / /
column16: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881443#2881447#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1903;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# bzod pa'i dngos po ni gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'o // /
column17: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1182471#1182472#TD4047E.TXT.r_8831# rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi rnam grangs so // /
column18: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1125253#1125253#TD4047E.TXT.r_559;TD4047E.TXT.r_560# dus kun du sbyor ba nyid ni rtag tu byed pa'i brtson 'grus te / / +des sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus la gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.019#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930898#2930899#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8733;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8734# lus dang srog la mi lta bar // / +brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang zhes bya ba la brtson 'grus  la yang nyan pa dang sems PA LA SOGS PA'I DGE ba 'ga' tsam byed pa'am dge ba cung zad tsam byed pa ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin gyi / /
column20: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349334#1349334#TD4037E.TXT.r_4524;TD4037E.TXT.r_4525# yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems  dpa'i yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus / /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983198#983198#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11894;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11895# ces bya ba la / / +de ltar rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus gnyis kyis gnyis po yongs su smin pa dang  sbyang bar bya ba la 'grub ste / /
column22: 0.021#TD4066E.TXT.r#2111898#2111898#TD4066E.TXT.r_1375;TD4066E.TXT.r_1376# ngan pa la sbyor bas ni le lo'o // / +brtson 'grus kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba la brtson 'grus ni dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba la sems mngon par spro ba'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227651#227651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1760# bstan    bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las mdo las gsungs pa'i tshig lnga po dag mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du bstan te / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do // /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233633#233633#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2514;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2515# brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus bstan te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gzhan  la phan 'dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhan dag la phyir nga rgyal skyed par lta ga la byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni dper na 'bras s'a lu'i sa  bon las s'a lu'i myu gu nyid 'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227449#227456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson  'grus dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus SO ZHES BYA BA NI BZHI pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni yi dam rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus dang  dge     // /

column3: sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul 'dis 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o // / +skal ba mnyam pa ni skal ba mtshungs pa ste 'dra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227455#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni yi dam rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus dang  dge     // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334725#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405614#2405617#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column15: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column16: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column17: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column18: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column19: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column20: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256225#256228#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271379#271379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214# sems med de sems rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column23: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270214#270214#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column24: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385683#2385683#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de ni skal ba mnyam pa yang yin la rgyu yang yin pas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'o // / +rang gi sa pa zhes bya ba la / / +sa ni dgu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227469#227487#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1742# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#964530#964533#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9583# dge ba la sems spro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi brtson 'grus so // / +le los sems  ma gyengs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi bsam gtan zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4080E.TXT.r#590#590#TD4080E.TXT.r_63# dge ba'i las rnams la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  brtsams pa mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus te / /
column7: 0.025#TD4029E.TXT.r#2122569#2122570#TD4029E.TXT.r_314# gang gi tshe go cha'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i brtson 'grus las brtsams pas mgu bar byed pa de'i tshe yon tan khyad par can mngon par shes pa dang  stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dbang phyug  rnyed par 'gyur bas dbang 'byor ba'i rgyu nyid du bstan to // /
column8: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925152#925152#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881445#2881446#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183569#1183569#TD4047E.TXT.r_8953# mngon par mos pa dang  'dun pa sngon du 'gro ba dang  gnyen po'i phyogs dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'thob pa dang spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang  lung dang rtogs pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus  dang  bslab pa rjes su srung ba'i brtson 'grus te / /
column11: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2870299#2870299#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_324# brtson 'grus kyis ni nyan pa dang sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba la mi  skyo ba ste / /

column3: 'dod pa'i khams dang  bsam gtan dang  gzugs med pa rnams so // / +kun du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro bas kun du 'gro ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227474#227479#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /

column7: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732197#2732203#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4559# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum pa'i brtson 'grus dang mi 'khrul pa'i brtson 'grus dang chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /

column9: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983171#983171#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11891# rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus so // / +de la rtag pa'i brtson 'grus ni gang dge ba rgyun du byed pa'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#642163#642163#TD4069E.TXT.r_2746# lus dub par gyur pa dang  sems dub par gyur pa na brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column11: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925152#925152#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348948#1348948#TD4037E.TXT.r_4480# sems  kun nas dkris pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de spang ba'i phyir mgo la me 'bar ba gsod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus khyad par can dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad yongs su tshol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus tshol ba dang   yongs su btsal ba'i chos de dag nyid la ji ltar mthun pa dang  ji ltar 'os par chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos nan tan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i brtson 'grus dang  byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus ni snga ma bzhin du rnam  pa bcu gcig tu blta bar bya'o // /

column3: de dag kyang sngar bshad pa yin te / / +thams cad la dmigs pa'i dngos por 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa can zhes bya ba ni    'dod chags la sogs pa rnams nyid kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227484#227498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1742;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1744# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas / /

column3: kun du 'gro ba rnams nyid rgyu yin pas kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu'o // / +skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rang gi ris pa rnams nyid kyi'o // /

column5: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348280#1348282#TD4037E.TXT.r_4419;TD4037E.TXT.r_4420# de la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'i brtson 'grus ni 'di yin te / / +'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa    la sbyor ba'i snga rol nas / /
column6: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348422#1348422#TD4037E.TXT.r_4433# de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na / /

column3: 'di ni ris tha dad pa rnams kyi yang yin te / / +'di ni de gnyis kyi bye brag go // / +mi 'dra bar smin pa ni rnam par smin pa ste mi  nyid la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227510#227519#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1746# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la  sbyor ba'i dngos po la gnas nas sems mngon par spro ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i go cha 'di ltar gyon par byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348293#1348303#TD4037E.TXT.r_4421;TD4037E.TXT.r_4422# sems kyi mngon par spro ba sngon du 'gro ba'i go cha 'di ltar gyon par byed de / /

column3: de'i rgyu ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o // / +de yang mi dge ba rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o // / +dge ba ni dad pa la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227520#227530#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1746# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la  sbyor ba'i dngos po la gnas nas sems mngon par spro ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i go cha 'di ltar gyon par byed de / / +bdag ni gal te sems can gcig sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang nyin mtshan bskal pa chen po dang mnyam pa dag gi 'gro ba gzhan du mi gnas pas sems  can dmyal ba kho nar gnas pas dus ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de nyid bye brag 'bum 'gyur gyis srid kyis / /

column3: de dag ni dge ba yang yin la zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin pas dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams te / / +'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas  par 'gyur bas zag pa dang bcas pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227529#227542#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1746# bdag ni gal te sems can gcig sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang nyin mtshan bskal pa chen po dang mnyam pa dag gi 'gro ba gzhan du mi gnas pas sems  can dmyal ba kho nar gnas pas dus ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de nyid bye brag 'bum 'gyur gyis srid kyis / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348315#1348325#TD4037E.TXT.r_4423# nyin mtshan bskal pa chen po stong dang mnyam pa dag gi 'gro ba gzhan du mi gnas par sems can dmyal ba  kho nar gnas pas dus ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de nyid bye ba phrag 'bum 'gyur srid kyis bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba  lta na yang bdag spro bar byed de / /

column3: ci'i phyir lung du mi ston pa rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ma yin zhe na / / +mthu chung ba'i phyir te sa bon rul ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4010E.TXT.r#2243105#2243105#TD4010E.TXT.r_1553# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i bzod pa dag bsgom par bya'o  zhes bya ba yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2313102#2313105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_250# ji tsam du sems yod pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas don de'i phyir ngas sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227540#227552#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1746# bdag ni gal te sems can gcig sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang nyin mtshan bskal pa chen po dang mnyam pa dag gi 'gro ba gzhan du mi gnas pas sems  can dmyal ba kho nar gnas pas dus ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de nyid bye brag 'bum 'gyur gyis srid kyis / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264168#264169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6348# yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag ni nges par lus khyad du 'phags pa la gnas pas de la ma 'ongs pa na bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis byang chub sems dpa' la khyod kyis bdag lus la gnas par 'dod na sngar khyod kyi lus yongs su dag cing khyad par du 'phags pa dang  mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#299553#299555#TD4026E.TXT.r_4339# rnam grangs des gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ji snyed pa nas shes rab kyi phung po ji snyed pa'i bar gyi  tshul khrims kyi phung po nas shes rab kyi phung po'i bar de sgom par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bsam pa nas / /
column9: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2120724#2120725#TD4029E.TXT.r_47# de ltar slob na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par  rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid ji lta bu dag CIG YIN ZHE NA / /
column10: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1331035#1331036#TD4037E.TXT.r_2090# nam byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du nams kyang bud med du mi 'gyur ba dang  bud med thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa mang ba dang  shes rab 'chal ba yin la rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa mang ba'i rgyud dang  shes rab 'chal pa'i rgyud kyis kyang bla na  med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348195#1348199#TD4037E.TXT.r_4406# bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid la sogs PA RNAM PAR DAG PA'I bzod pa la thug pa'i bzod pa rgya che zhing tshad med la byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu 'byung ba 'di dag la brten na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa  yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1362222#1362225#TD4037E.TXT.r_6219# de dag ma byas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba med par 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363200#1363201#TD4037E.TXT.r_6366# tshogs chen po ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang  ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang dag par 'grub pas bla  na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2310372#2310373#TD4049E.TXT.r_3837# gnas bcu gnyis mthong ba'i byang chub  sems dpa' dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa nan tan snying por byed pa sems can sdud pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas / /
column15: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1050823#1050824#TD4054E.TXT.r_9422# sems can yongs su sdud ba dang  myur du bla na  med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas gzhan dag dang rtsod par smra bar mi bya'o // /
column16: 0.0#TD4079E.TXT.r#757632#757634#TD4079E.TXT.r_156# zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'am / /
column17: 1.192#TD4010E.TXT.r#2254248#2254249#TD4010E.TXT.r_3017# gang gi tshe dge ba'i bshes  gnyen tshol ba dang  sri zhu bya ba dang  gyog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / /
column18: 1.192#TD4013E.TXT.r#618737#618737#TD4013E.TXT.r_1102# 'dod chen pa ma yin pa ni gang dag sems can gcig 'khor ba las ma grol gyi bar du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i / /
column19: 1.192#TD4014E.TXT.r#439124#439125#TD4014E.TXT.r_466# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba rnams dang  de  bzhin du gzhan dus mnyam pa nyid du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba rnams dang  de bzhin du gzhan mya ngan las 'das pa ston par 'gyur pa rnams so // /
column20: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#507208#507208#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7581# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar  'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gsum pa so so'i skye bo yang bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i skyon bstan pa'o // /

column22: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314091#2314091#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_370# nams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa las rigs can ma yin pa de dag ni rigs med pa'i phyir sems bskyed nas nan tan brtson 'grus  spyad kyang nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan te / /

column38: 1.192#TD4044E.TXT.r#391578#391578#TD4044E.TXT.r_1815# rang bzhin gyis nyon  mongs pa mang ba'i rgyud dang  shes rab 'chal pa'i rgyud kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus zhes bya ba ni / /
column39: 1.192#TD4047E.TXT.r#1164354#1164356#TD4047E.TXT.r_6343;TD4047E.TXT.r_6344# sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ma bslabs par rang gi don la sogs pa la bslab par mi nus pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par     // / +rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar smras pa / /
column40: 1.192#TD4047E.TXT.r#1164382#1164382#TD4047E.TXT.r_6346# sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rdzogs par ma  byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus pa ma yin no // /
column41: 1.192#TD4048E.TXT.r#1684386#1684386#TD4048E.TXT.r_64# yongs su rdzogs nas de'i 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste / /
column42: 1.192#TD4050E.TXT.r#1110248#1110248#TD4050E.TXT.r_1794# de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu zab cing rgya che ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rtogs par dka' ba thos pa na zhum par 'gyur te / /
column43: 1.192#TD4077E.TXT.r#889171#889172#TD4077E.TXT.r_41# gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya  bar 'dod pa de dag gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir / /
column44: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#687222#687222#TD4083E.TXT.r_359# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro // /
column45: 0.009#TD4087E.TXT.r#1574977#1574977#TD4087E.TXT.r_2401# brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang  tshangs par 'gyur ba dang  bdud du 'gyur ba dang  rang byang chub dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi byed ce na / /
column46: 0.011#TD4029E.TXT.r#2129198#2129198#TD4029E.TXT.r_1181# de ltar bdag dang sems can yongs su smin par byas nas tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa de de'i rjes la bde blag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas yongs su smin pa'i  'og tu byang chub kyi skabs so // /
column47: 0.011#TD4049E.TXT.r#2306739#2306739#TD4049E.TXT.r_3304# gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o // /
column48: 0.014#TD4044E.TXT.r#386085#386085#TD4044E.TXT.r_854# mkhas par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o // /
column49: 0.015#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000570#3000572#TD4053E.TXT.r_4761# yongs su mi shes pa la sogs pa la nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni mi  grol ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya pa'i bar du'o // /
column50: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1048141#1048141#TD4054E.TXT.r_9008# yongs su mi shes pa las nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni mi grol ba na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i bar du'o // /
column51: 0.015#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250705#1250705#TD4051E.TXT.r_2608# bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du bdag la nus pa med  par bsam par mi bya ba ste / /
column52: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1318009#1318009#TD4037E.TXT.r_278# kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / /
column53: 0.015#TD4053E.TXT.r#2991195#2991195#TD4053E.TXT.r_3572# de la khyad par can ma yin pa ni kye  ma'o bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig snyam pa'o // /
column54: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342997#2342997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3734# des sngar ni dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis thob pa yin la des da ltar ni lam mthong ba yin pa'i phyir yang dngos po'i mtha'i dmigs pa thob pa yin te zhes bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang   gzhan yang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i dmigs pa yang 'thob ste zhes gsungs pa yin te / /
column55: 0.015#TD4011E.TXT.r#352328#352328#TD4011E.TXT.r_430# gang yang ma byon pa'i dus phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig  rten gyi sgron ma phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa gzhan dang gzhan na bzhugs pa bgrang ba las 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur pa rnams skad cig so sor dus mtshungs pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par  rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang  de bzhin du gzhan dag dus mtshungs pa kho nar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  de bzhin du gzhan dag mya ngan 'das pa ston par 'gyur ba de dag gi drung du ste / /
column56: 0.016#TD4044E.TXT.r#381858#381858#TD4044E.TXT.r_88# rigs med na gzhan yod na yang rnam pa thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa nyid yin la / /
column57: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#2039#2039#TD4036E.TXT.r_137# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te / /
column58: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363213#1363213#TD4037E.TXT.r_6367;TD4037E.TXT.r_6368# dus chen po ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po gang yin pa'i dus des / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o // /
column59: 0.016#TD4029E.TXT.r#2120688#2120689#TD4029E.TXT.r_37# de ltar slob pa'i  byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // /
column60: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363328#1363328#TD4037E.TXT.r_6377# byang chub  sems dpa' de ltar slob pa rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // /
column61: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508709#508711#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7761;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7762# 'ching ba gnyis kyi bar du spangs pa'i phyir ro // / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni / /
column62: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391823#2391823#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9593# rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpas nang gi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la yang  dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column63: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1359312#1359312#TD4037E.TXT.r_5782;TD4037E.TXT.r_5783# yang de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams byang chub dang rnam par grol ba thun mong du 'gyur ba'i 'dod pa  bskyed pa'i phyir / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed do // /
column64: 0.016#TD4044E.TXT.r#381874#381874#TD4044E.TXT.r_89# rigs yod na ni dus gzhan na sems  bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro // /
column65: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131912#3131912#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5497# gal te dgra bcom pa byang chub tu yongs su 'grub par gyur pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na / /
column66: 0.016#TD4019E.TXT.r#2452376#2452376#TD4019E.TXT.r_5972# phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so // /
column67: 0.016#TD4053E.TXT.r#3002945#3002945#TD4053E.TXT.r_5080# de ltar bdag la phan ba dang  gzhan la phan par zhugs pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba  zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig 'di dag gi mtshams sbyar bar rig par bya'o // /
column68: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508463#508464#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7733# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bla na  med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin pas gcig pa nyid du 'dzin pa gzhig pa ste / /
column69: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363412#1363412#TD4037E.TXT.r_6390# skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni tshe phyi ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang  srid pa tha ma pa ni tshe 'di nyid la gnas bzhin du bla na  med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o // /
column70: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118730#3118730#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3900# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bla na med pa yang dag  par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci tsam du phan yon che zhing / /
column71: 0.017#TD4010E.TXT.r#2238516#2238516#TD4010E.TXT.r_969# gzhon nu de lta bas na ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med  pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na khyod kyis kyang da bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang  rim gro dang  gyog bya ba la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column72: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388425#2388426#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column73: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1362125#1362125#TD4037E.TXT.r_6203# rigs la gnas la sems ma bskyed pa dang  de bzhin du  sems bskyed pa dang  mngon sum du 'dug pa dang  lkog na 'dug pa dang  dus dpag tu rung ba la dus de srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  dus dpag tu mi rung ba la yang lung ston te / /

column77: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317397#2317397#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_768# nams kyang bla na med pa yang dag  par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes mi gsung ba'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227578#227595#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1749;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1750# brtson 'grus la zhugs pa yang dor bar mi byed na / / +dus kyi yun ches thung ba dang  sdug bsngal ches chung bas lta ci smos snyam ba de lta bu ni byang  chub sems dpa'i go cha'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column6: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227299#227299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1719# yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2332527#2332527#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2562;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2563# yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs shes pa dang  gzugs 'dus pa shes pa dang  gzugs 'gog pa'i 'gro ba shes pa dang  gzugs 'gog pa'i rnam pa shes pa dang  gzugs kyi mngon shes pa dang  gzugs kyi nyes dmigs shes pa dang  gzugs  kyi nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column5: 0.008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#507768#507770#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7644# phyi  rol gyi mtshan ma'i 'ching bas 'ching ba dang  nang gi gnas ngan len gyi 'ching bas bcings par rtogs par byed do zhes bshad de zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240110#240110#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3362# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las kun du brtags pa'i bdag tu 'dzin pa ni da ltar gyi phyi rol gyi rkyen gyi stobs kyis lus dang lhan cig ma yin pa log  pa'i bstan pa dang  log par rtog pa la ltos nas gdod 'byung ba'i phyir kun du brtags pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271712#271713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7270;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7271# rgyud kyi rab tu dbye bas ni tshad med par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4048E.TXT.r#1693205#1693210#TD4048E.TXT.r_1323# chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column6: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925143#925150#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar MI BYED PA NI NAN tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /

column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227431#227431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738# go rims bzhin du sems can mi spong ba dang  dman pa'i sems spangs pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rab tu ston to // / +brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson  'grus dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /

column32: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263325#263325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217# yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /

column35: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274196#274196#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column45: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column48: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386200#2386200#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column49: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474728#474728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column50: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477883#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji LTA BA BZHIN DU SEMS CAN dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: mi 'dra ba smin pa ni rnam par smin pa ste / / +mi 'dra ba ji lta bu zhe na / / +dge ba dang  mi dge ba'i rgyu las lung du ma bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227762#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1769# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /

column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column8: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column9: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column10: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527911#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dmar po dang  dkar po de dag dang  grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu gyur ces  bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323908#2323908#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1587# mthong ba'i chos dang  tshe rabs phyi ma la dge ba'i chos gong nas gong du 'phel ba dang  yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column12: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390582#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# der mngon sum du 'gyur zhing khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397793#2397793#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10299;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403882#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# bstan bcos theg pa chen po  bsdus pa las ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404473#2404473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11101# bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i shes pa'i gnas yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226752#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po  de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang  chos dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238145#238145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /

column28: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535457#535457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314614#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_428;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238297#238297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column33: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244505#244505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column34: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536673#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column35: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220616#220616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column36: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463359#463360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1821;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1822# chos  bsdus pa'i mdo dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las kyang phal cher shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: sems can ni mi la sogs pa ste / / +gang la sems can zhes brjod pa de sems can zhes bya'o // / +ma bsgribs la  lung du ston to zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pas ma non zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227763#227779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1769# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni go cha dang  sbyor ba dang  phan  'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du gzhan dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  sbyor ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes bshad do // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227788#227801#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1770# bsam gtan rnam pa gsum ni rnam par mi rtog cing zhi la rab tu zhi bas kha na ma tho ba med pa'i  phyir nyon mongs pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur pa bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan dang  yon tan mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan dang  sems can gyi don mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan no zhes bya ba ni snga ma bsam gtan rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /

column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349449#1349449#TD4037E.TXT.r_4543# tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i bsam gtan dang  byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam gtan no // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ste zhes bya ba smos so // / +'bral bas na bral ba ste / / +nyon mongs pa gtan du mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227819#227830#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1773# dang po las tshig bzhi yod kyang de dag gi mtshan nyid khong du chud par dka' bas de'i phyir 'dir mdo sde dang bstan bcos rnams la brten nas tshig bzhi po de dag bshad par bya'o // /

column3: bral ba'i 'bras bu    nyid bral ba'i 'bras bu'o // / +de ni thob par bya ba yin gyi zhes bya ba ni lam gyis thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227831#227839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1773# dang po las tshig bzhi yod kyang de dag gi mtshan nyid khong du chud par dka' bas de'i phyir 'dir mdo sde dang bstan bcos rnams la brten nas tshig bzhi po de dag bshad par bya'o // / +de la dang po rnam par mi rtog cing zhi LA ZHES BYA BA NI YANG dag pa ma yin  pa kun tu rtog pa dang  gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing zhi ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa ni rtag pa'i phyir ro // / +rkyen brjod par bya ste / / +de'i phyir rkyen ni bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227840#227849#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1773;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1774# de la dang po rnam par mi rtog cing zhi la zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin  pa kun tu rtog pa dang  gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing zhi ba zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247459#247461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4258;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259# gnyis pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang DAG PA MA YIN PA DANG bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: rgyu'i rkyen dang  de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang  dmigs pa'i rkyen dang  bdag  po'i rkyen to zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227850#227858#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1775# de'i phyir mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba'i zhi ba zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: rtogs par byed pas rkyen te / / +rang gi dgos pa'i skye ba gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227859#227868#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1775;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1776;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1777# de'i phyir mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba'i zhi ba zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +rnam  par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma yin te / / +ma 'ongs pa ni 'khrugs pa'i phyir snga phyi med do // / +de ma  thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227869#227877#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1776;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1777# lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa skyed par byed do zhes bstan PA YIN NO // / +gnyis pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las srid pa'i ro myong ba rnams yongs su spangs pas mtshan ma thams cad nye bar zhi ba zhes bshad  do ; / /

column3: de ni de ma thag pa yin pas de ma thag pa ste / / +de ni 'di skad du / / +sems la sogs pa'i rdzas gcig las sems la sogs pa'i rdzas gcig 'byung gi du ma ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column5: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403346#2403354#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10995;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10996# tshul khrims yongs su grub pa'i phyir dang  'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don gyis  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476333#476335#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3462;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3463# 'di ni the tshom gcod pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las yul thams cad la nges par legs par brnyes pa'i phyir dang  chos rnams la bdag nyid kyis gtan la phebs pa med pa gzhan gyi the tshom mchod     // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475605#475605#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3375# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las 'di ltar dus thams cad du shes rab yongs su sbyangs pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i  lam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i bdag nyid goms par byas pas bag chags thams cad dang gtan du bral ba'i gnas su byon pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537106#537106#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11424# de'i phyir de nyid las las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba myong ba la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527896#527896#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10228;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10229# ma'i mngal du rnam par shes pa dang  mer mer po phan tshun 'dus par gyur nas zhes bya ba yin no zhe'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367554#2367554#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6701# yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: de ma thag pa zhes bya ba ni rigs gcig pa'i rdzas kyis bar  du gcod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227895#227903#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1778;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1780# gsum pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i PHYIR ZHES BYA BA NI SLOB dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las / / +nga rgyal dang  lta ba dang  sred pa dang bral nas rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: dmigs pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba ni de dmigs par bya ba yin pas dmigs pa'o // / +dmigs pa nyid rkyen yin pas dmigs pa'i rkyen te / /

column3: de la dmigs nas sems dang sems las byung ba dag byung ba'i phyir ro / / +chos thams cad do zhes bya ba ni 'dus  byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227913#227924#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1781;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1782# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i  yul drug dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa'o zhes bshad do // / +bzhi pa nyon mongs pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur pa bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyon mongs pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur cing mngon par shes pa la dbang thob  pas / /

column3: byed pa'i rgyu rang bzhin no zhes bya ba de ni 'di skad du rgyu'i rkyen gang yin pa de nyid bdag po'i rkyen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: nam mkha' ni bsags pa'i rdzas kyi go 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +zhes bya ba la / / +bsags pa ni rdul  phra mo 'dus pa'i bdag nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227936#227946#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1784;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1785# mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas so // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni ting nge 'dzin 'dis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir / /

column6: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230410#230412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2115# le lo dang  bag med pa la sogs  pa la yon tan du lta ba gang yin pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391391#2391391#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9553# kha cig na re mdo'i tshig 'di ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang mthun par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyi gus shes pa dman pa'i khyi gu 'byin par bstan pa yin no zhe'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226838#226838#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1653;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1654# rims bzhin du lus dang  sems dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rtogs par bya'o zhes slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis lus dang  sems la sogs pa la phan 'dogs pa zhes bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2400705#2400705#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10673# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column10: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401460#2401460#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10766# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las / /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401694#2401694#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10796# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406333#2406333#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11270# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las tshig mi mthun yang don tha dad par 'gyur ba ni med do // /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229407#229407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1974# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: de ni bsags pa yang yin la rdzas kyang yin pas bsags pa'i rdzas so // / +bsags pa'i rdzas kyi go 'byed pas bsags pa'i rdzas kyi go 'byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227947#227957#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1784;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1785;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1787# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni ting nge 'dzin 'dis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir / / +tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa thob ces bshad do // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405040#2405040#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // /

column3: de nyid de'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni nam mkha' zhes bya'o // / +de'i nang na dngos po shin tu gsal bas  nam mkha'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227958#227968#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1789# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel ba las / / +'di'i dbang gis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'o zhes bshad de / /

column3: gsal ba ni sal sal po ste / / +mngon no rab tu gsal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227967#227983#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1790;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1791;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1792# gzhan rnam pa gnyis ni mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas bsam gtan gyi le'u las / /

column3: gang gi dbang gis zhes bya ba ni gang gi mthus dngos po thams cad nam mkha' la gnas pa'o // /
thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni yul gnon pas gnas so // / +thogs pa med pa     // / +rnams ni nye bar gnas pa'i dngos po'i gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227984#227993#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1791;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1792;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1794;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1795# tshe 'di LA BDE BAR GNAS PA'I bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba / /

column3: gal te nam mkha' sgrib pa'i bdag nyid du gyur na ni de la thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang thogs pa med pa rnams 'byung ba dang gnas pa med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227991#228003#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1792;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1794;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1796;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1797;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1798# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba / / +lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa bskyed pa dang mchog tu rab tu zhi ba / /
column5: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349467#1349470#TD4037E.TXT.r_4545;TD4037E.TXT.r_4546;TD4037E.TXT.r_4547;TD4037E.TXT.r_4548# lus dang sems kyis shin tu sbyangs ba skyed pa / / +mchog tu rab tu zhi ba / / +rlom sems dang bral ba / / +ro myang ba med pa dang  mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa 'di ni de dag gi tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'dir bde bar gshegs pas kyang gsungs zhes  bya ba la sogs pas ni lung las 'byung bas ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228004#228014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1797;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1799# de dag gi tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.024#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811330#1811331#TD4082E.TXT.r_543;TD4082E.TXT.r_544;TD4082E.TXT.r_545# pa dang 'gyod pa dang  the tshom yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // / +bsam gtan ro la yon tan lta / / +byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar byed cing / /

column3: bram ze rlung ni nam mkha' la brten to zhes bya bas ni nam mkha' yod par brjod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228012#228028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1799# de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par lta ga la  'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349485#1349487#TD4037E.TXT.r_4549# de la byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med pa sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms  par 'jug par lta ga la 'gyur ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis non pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon gnas shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan nyan thos dang     thun mong pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan sgrub pa'i bsam gtan yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pa'i rten du mi rung ngo // / +snang ba'i rtags kyis kyang yin te / /
column4: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349494#1349495#TD4037E.TXT.r_4549# de la byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med pa sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms  par 'jug par lta ga la 'gyur ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis non pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon gnas shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan nyan thos dang     thun mong pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan sgrub pa'i bsam gtan yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: snang ba yod pas na nam mkha' shes so  zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i don ni 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228029#228037#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1799# byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par lta ga la  'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rlung ni nam mkha' la brten par gsungs so // / +nam mkha' ni gnas med par gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228038#228045#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1800;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1801# byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par lta ga la  'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir ro // / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: de'i phyir bram ze gang rlung brten par brtags pa'i nam mkha' de yod par ci mngon snyam du 'gyur du 'ong zhes bya ba de'i phyir bcom  ldan 'das kyis snang ba yod pas na nam mkha' shes so zhes gsungs te de ni yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228046#228055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1800;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1801# sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan la brten nas sems can gyi bya ba dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang  sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug  bsngal sel ba dang  rigs pa ston pa dang  byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor te phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  'jigs pa rnams las byung ba dang  yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang  yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang  sems dang mthun  par 'jug pa dang  yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang  legs par tshar gcod pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang  'dun par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228056#228068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1801# byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan la brten nas sems can gyi bya ba dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang  sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug  bsngal sel ba dang  rigs pa ston pa dang  byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor te phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  'jigs pa rnams las byung ba dang  yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang  yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang  sems dang mthun  par 'jug pa dang  yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang  legs par tshar gcod pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang  'dun par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349555#1349556#TD4037E.TXT.r_4553;TD4037E.TXT.r_4554# byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bya ba don dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang  sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang  rigs par ston pa dang  byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba ste / / +phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang   'jigs pa rnams las srung ba dang  sdug bsngal bar gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel ba dang  yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang  yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang  sems dang mthun par 'jug pa dang  yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang  legs  par tshar gcod pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang  'dun par byed pa ste / /

column3: snang ba ni gzugs can te bstan du yod pa thogs pa dang bcas pa'o // / +gal te nam mkha' de med du zin na de go skabs 'byed pa yang med par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228069#228079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1801# byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan la brten nas sems can gyi bya ba dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang  sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug  bsngal sel ba dang  rigs pa ston pa dang  byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor te phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  'jigs pa rnams las byung ba dang  yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang  yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang  sems dang mthun  par 'jug pa dang  yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang  legs par tshar gcod pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang  'dun par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de'i phyir snang ba ni de yod pa'i rtags yin  no ; / / +so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni sdug bsngal spong ba'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin bshad pas de'i phyir so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i rim pa la bab pa las go bsnor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398083#2398084#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10338;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# rgya cher rnam  par dbye ba ni tshigs su bcad ba gsum pa dang 'grel pa nyid las bstan te / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226989#226990#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1676;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678# byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227749#227757#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
