column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228091#228103#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1802;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1804;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1805# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzod pa'i 'grel  pa las / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228205#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1815# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227065#227066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356882#2356882#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5363;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5364# slob dpon thogs med ni mdo  'di nyid la brten nas bstan bcos mdzad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391277#2391277#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9541# de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474729#474729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478552#478552#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3714# 'di ni 'khor ba'i mtha' ji tsam par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang  bde ba nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#766813#766813#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_20# de nas nyan pa po dran pa dang shes rab zhan pa rnams mi rmongs par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis sbyar ba chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa'i don rnam par dbye  bar bya'o // /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380102#2380102#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8272;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8273# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +do ni de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyi bstan bcos nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column23: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#482448#482448#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4275;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4276;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4277# de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / / +mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa  ZHES BYA BA NI / / +yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba bzhin no // /
column24: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341287#2341287#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3530;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3531# gal te sems can du 'du shes par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid  las bshad pa bzhin no // /
column25: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column26: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column27: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan ZHES BYA BA NYID DO // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column33: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column34: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column35: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column36: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2546185#2546186#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1352# rgyas par zhes bya ba la rgyas par zhes bya ba'i don ni gang dag las bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag thob la / /

column3: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes pa'i 'og tu de dgag pa  rnam par spro ba sla bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir so sor brtags pas 'gog pa sngar bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228098#228116#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1804;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1805;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1807# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzod pa'i 'grel  pa las / / +bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba 'di ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par byed do // /

column3: sdug bsngal 'dor ba ni sdug bsngal spong pa'o // / +mdor bsdu na zhes bya ba ni na ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal rnam pa mang du yod mod kyi thams cad kyang skye ba las byung ba'i phyir mdor na skye ba nyid sdug bsngal lo  zhes smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473481#473484#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228117#228125#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1808# bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI sems can la phan     // / +'dogs pa'i bya ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228126#228139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1808;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1809;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1810# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244696#244696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3935;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3936# byas kyang kha na ma tho ba med pa la bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475460#475461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad pa med pas de dag brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba NI THAMS CAD KYANG YE shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254710#1254711#TD4051E.TXT.r_3220;TD4051E.TXT.r_3221# gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni mthong ba'i chos la bde  bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir te / / +nga rgyal dang  lta ba dang sred pa la sogs pa spangs pas dag pa can yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536864#536865#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11392;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11393# bye brag 'di nyid la brten pas sngar bshad pa'i bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag gi rgyu byed do zhes bshad do / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las NI LUS LA SOGS PA rnam par rig pa la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rgyun ma chad  pas bdag dang bdag gi dang  gzhan dang gzhan gyi zhes 'dzin pa'i bye brag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405056#2405057#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11157# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar mtshan ma thams  cad dang mngon bar 'du byed pa thams cad kyis de'i sems gyo bar mi nus pa'i phyir dang  sa bdun pa la mtshan ma thams cad kyis mi gyo zhing kun du mi 'byung mod kyi / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475605#475605#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3375# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las 'di ltar dus thams cad du shes rab yongs su sbyangs pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i  lam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i bdag nyid goms par byas pas bag chags thams cad dang gtan du bral ba'i gnas su byon pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537106#537106#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11424# de'i phyir de nyid las las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba myong ba la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403347#2403348#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10995;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10996# tshul khrims yongs su grub pa'i phyir dang  'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don gyis  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244622#244622#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3926;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3927# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +ched 'ga' ni zil gyis gnon par yang mi byed de / /

column3: srid pa mngon par 'grub bo zhes bya ba dang  'jug pa zhes bya ba la / / +srid pa ni skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228140#228148#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1811# nga rgyal dang  lta ba dang  sred pa la sogs pa spangs nas rnam  par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de mngon par 'grub pa ni mngon par 'grub pa ste / / +srid pa 'byung ba'o // / +de'i 'jug pa ni 'jug pa ste yang dang yang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228146#228159#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1811;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1812# nga rgyal dang  lta ba dang  sred pa la sogs pa spangs nas rnam  par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro // / +mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni mngon par shes pa drug la sogs pa yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de'i 'jug pa med pa ni skye    ba dang bral ba'o // / +spong ba zhes bya ba ste zhes bya ba ni spong ba zhes ming du gdags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228158#228168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1813# bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs pa la  sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358528#2358529#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5560;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5561# pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan ma tshang med pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par dag pa dang cha mthun pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan ma kun du 'byung ba dang  gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su 'grub  par bya ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa yang dgongs pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir de la mdo sde khongs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'di ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang byang chub sems  dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i yon tan rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas bstan pa yin te / /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536214#536216#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11296;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11297# rkyen mi rtag pa  las de las gzhan pa skye ba'i don gyi phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339019#2339019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3274# yongs su shes par gyur pa'i phyir dang gtan du spangs  pa'i phyir lam dang thob pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la brten nas rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral na zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las kyang de skad bshad de / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228388#228388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1844# mngon par rtogs pa'i  mtha' kun rdzob rnams shes pa chos ston pa la sogs pa dngos po sna tshogs ston pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos kun las btus pa las ni kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang  sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab dag ni rim bzhin du sa la 'jug pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi  chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sgrub pa'i ston pa gsum dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252111#252111#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4744# gzhan yang de dag mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  mi slob pa'i lam la gzung pa'i  phyir go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
column10: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254734#1254734#TD4051E.TXT.r_3224# bsam gtan byas  na mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: chu 'bab pa bcad pa lta bu ni 'dra ba'o // / +rlung rgyu ba la thogs par byed pa ni rlung rgyu ba thogs par byed pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#501679#501680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6862;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6863# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las  btus pa las ni de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i don ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502352#502353#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6963# ci'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2322321#2322322#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1349# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa  las / /

column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367677#2367678#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6725;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6726# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni mdor bsdus nas ming bdun gyis bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2369460#2369460#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6962# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni / /

column11: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383370#2383370#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8652# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /

column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220743#220744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_839# mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bshad do zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes ston te / /

column21: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363747#2363747#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6195# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin  du rig par bya'o // /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364571#2364571#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column23: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224604#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /
column24: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361422#2361422#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5907# bstan bcos chos mngon ba sna tshogs kun las btus pa las yi ge'i tshogs ni 'di lta ste / /
column25: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366787#2366787#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6599# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column26: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383629#2383629#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8676;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8677# de yang rnam pa drug go zhes bstan la / / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid la rnam par gyeng ba zhes bshad pas so zhe na / /
column27: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344902#2344904#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3945# mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi po de dag kyang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column28: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230976#230976#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2173# 'di ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las de dag brda sprod pa yin no //// /
column29: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230858#230858#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2156;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2157# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni go rims nor ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las 'bras bu bdun bstan pa dang  mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni  pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag so so nas 'bras bu lnga lnga thob par ston to // /
column30: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237018#237018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2944# byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ni rtog pa'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dang  sku gnyis po dag  ni skyed pa'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dang  bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column31: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237048#237048#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2948;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2949# mthong ba'i chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column32: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392455#2392455#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9673# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob pa ni ji ltar bzhed cing 'dod pa bzhin du skad cig skad cig la ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa dag la snyoms  par 'jug pas rab tu dbye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column33: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362278#2362278#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6007;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6008# 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang  rnam pa bcu drug dang  de bzhin nyid dang  'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang  'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang  chos  thams cad bdag med pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba dang  stong pa dad smon pa med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa'i nang nas 'di nyid kyi bshad pa las ni / /
column34: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358529#2358529#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5560;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5561# pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan ma tshang med pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par dag pa dang cha mthun pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan ma kun du 'byung ba dang  gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su 'grub  par bya ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa yang dgongs pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir de la mdo sde khongs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'di ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang byang chub sems  dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i yon tan rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas bstan pa yin te / /
column35: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236564#236565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2894# zad mi shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column36: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342222#2342222#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3634# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column37: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#501858#501858#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6890# de'i bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column38: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233722#233722#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2524# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni / /
column39: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382822#2382822#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8600;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8601# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / / +rnam par gyeng ba'i chos de yang rnam pa drug yod par bstan pa yin no // /
column40: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229725#229725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2016# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang mtshan nyid lngas ston te / /
column41: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356709#2356709#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5342;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5343# mtshan ma nye bar zhi ba'i sgom pa dang mthun pa'i sgom pa dang  mtshan ma med par sgom pa dang  rtsol ba med par sgom pa dang  mtshan ma bzlog pa'i sgom pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column42: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#464743#464744#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2017;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2018# kha cig las ni rna bas thos kyis rnam par shes pas ni ma yin no zhes bshad de / / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column43: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321388#2321388#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1223;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1224# mu stegs can bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so / / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni / /
column44: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363689#2363689#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6188# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column45: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224537#224537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1386# mngon par mtho ba'i lam dang  nges par legs pa'i lam gang yin pa ste / / +chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam grangs dang po nas bstan pa dang mthun no // /

column3: 'dis thogs par byed pas thogs par byed pa'o // / +de ni rlung rgyu  ba thogs par byed pa yang yin la brag kyang yin pas rlung rgyu ba thogs par byed pa'i brag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228179#228193#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1815# mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang  mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du yongs su  'dzin pa gsum po yongs su ngal ba med pa dang  bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang  'khor 'dul ba'i las dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: dper na brag ni rlung rgyu ba thogs par byed pa'o // / +de bzhin du skye ba'i rgyud gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column6: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227385#227386#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1732;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1733# zab pa dang  rgya che ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung  ste / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column7: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244506#244506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column8: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column9: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column10: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229716#229716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column12: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397825#2397826#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10307# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226838#226838#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1653;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1654# rims bzhin du lus dang  sems dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rtogs par bya'o zhes slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis lus dang  sems la sogs pa la phan 'dogs pa zhes bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527911#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dmar po dang  dkar po de dag dang  grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu gyur ces  bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323908#2323908#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1587# mthong ba'i chos dang  tshe rabs phyi ma la dge ba'i chos gong nas gong du 'phel ba dang  yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390582#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# der mngon sum du 'gyur zhing khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397793#2397793#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10299;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403882#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# bstan bcos theg pa chen po  bsdus pa las ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404473#2404473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11101# bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i shes pa'i gnas yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226752#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po  de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang  chos dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238145#238145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529707#529707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385439#2385439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8881# so so'i skye bo  nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column26: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402255#2402255#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /
column27: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225711#225711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / /
column28: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214177#214177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_21;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_22# de ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa la gnas ngan len zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba de brtags na skyon rnam gsum yod de / /
column29: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398996#2398997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column31: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column33: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column35: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column36: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column37: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column38: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column39: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399359#2399359#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10488# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar te / /
column40: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247356#247356#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4247;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4248# 'phags pa  bla na med pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mdo las / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column41: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391026#2391027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column42: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385937#2385937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column43: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225536#225536#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column44: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405106#2405106#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11160# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column45: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column46: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs MED PA GANG YIN PA DE NI RGYU dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column47: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383886#2383886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8710# lang gi tshe bsgyur ba theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column48: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386555#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column49: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387236#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column50: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397727#2397727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column51: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222227#222227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /
column52: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230367#230367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2110# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column53: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242616#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column54: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column55: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column56: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column57: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536673#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column58: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406127#2406127#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /

column3: 'dis ni rjes su  yod pa nyid rab tu ston to // / +brtags pas 'gog pa ni shes rab ste 'dis rtogs pas brtags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228206#228216#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1818# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463359#463360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1821;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1822# chos  bsdus pa'i mdo dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las kyang phal cher shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: tha dad du yongs su bgrang pas brtags pa'o // / +dper na gcig la sogs pa'i grangs kyis dngos po yongs su gcod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes  rab 'dis kyang dngos po yongs su gcod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228217#228237#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1818;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1820# mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum du bstan to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119463#3119463#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3993;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3994# bsam gtan rnam pa gsum ni rnam par mi  rtog cing zhi la rab tu zhi bas nyon mongs pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan dang  yon tan mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  sems can gyi don mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan no // / +shes rab rnam pa gsum ni kun rdzob  kyi bden pa la dmigs pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa dang  sems can gyi don la dmigs pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar dngos po yongs su gcod ce na / / +so sor zhes bya ba'i sgrar khyab par 'dod pa'i tshig gi bden pa bzhi la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228238#228254#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1823# don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab dang  sems can gyi don la dmigs pa'i shes rab po zhes bya ba ni drug pa shes rab rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /

column3: de'i phyir so sor brtags pa'o / / +blo'i  bye brag dge ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni lam rjod par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228253#228264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1824# dang po  shes rab gsum ni shes bya la de kho na nyid du khong du chud cing rtogs par bya ba'i shes rab rig pa'i gnas lnga po rnams dang  tshogs gsum la mkhas pa'i shes rab dang  sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab po zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: lam gyis 'di 'thob bo // / +des zhes bya ba ni blos so // / +'thob pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228265#228274#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1824;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1827# dang po  shes rab gsum ni shes bya la de kho na nyid du khong du chud cing rtogs par bya ba'i shes rab rig pa'i gnas lnga po rnams dang  tshogs gsum la mkhas pa'i shes rab dang  sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab po zhes 'byung ste / / +dang po ni de kho na nyid la    dmigs pa'o // /

column3: de gang yin snyam pa la / / +'gog pa zhes bya ba smos te / / +zho'i bum pa bzhin du tshig bar  ma mi mngon par byas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228275#228297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1830# tha ma ni kun rdzob la dmigs shing gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o // / +de la rig pa'i gnas lnga ni nang gi rig pa la sogs te lnga po dag go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350162#1350168#TD4037E.TXT.r_4621;TD4037E.TXT.r_4622# stobs kyi rigs kyi le'u las 'byung ba dang 'dra bar rig  par bya'o // / +tshogs gsum ni don dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang don dang mi ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang don dang ldan pa yang ma yin don dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs te / /

column3: rtag pa'i phyir bskyed par bya ba ni ma yin no // / +spang bar bya ba mtha' yas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa spang bar bya ba dag mtha' yas pa de bzhin du spong ba'i rdzas de yang mtha' yas par blta  bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228285#228289#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1829# tshogs gsum ni don dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang  don dang mi ldan pa'i  chos rnams kyi tshogs dang  don dang ldan pa yang ma yin / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228297#228307#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1831# de la shes rab kyi phyi ma gsum ni chos bdag med pa zab mo shes pa'i shes rab po // /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350163#1350168#TD4037E.TXT.r_4622# tshogs gsum ni don dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang don dang mi ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang don dang ldan pa yang ma yin don dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs te / /

column3: gal te gcig pa zhig yin na / / +spang bar bya ba bzhin du mtha' yas par ma gyur na nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228304#228325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1831;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1832;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1833;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1835# de la shes rab kyi phyi ma gsum ni chos bdag med pa zab mo shes pa'i shes rab po // / +sems can rnams 'dul ba'i thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang  shes bya  thams cad la sgrib pa med pa shes pa'i shes rab po zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: 'phags pa'i lam gyi skad cig snga ma nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te / / +sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nyid kyis     // /
column4: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263443#263443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6236# de la bye brag yod pa de'i  gzhung gis cha bzhi'i don rnam par mi 'jog pas 'dir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214223#214223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_26;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27# gsum pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas dngos po'i 'chi 'pho ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur par ston pas so // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386613#2386613#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9002# de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du  grub pa las / /

column3: de zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'o // / +mngon sum du byas zhes bya ba ni de'i thob pa mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228326#228334#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1835# tha ma ni stong pa nyid gnyis mngon du byas pa'i shes pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni sems  can stong pa dang  chos stong pa dang  gnyi ga stong pa'i shes rab ces bshad do // /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214223#214223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_26;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27# gsum pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas dngos po'i 'chi 'pho ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur par ston pas so // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263443#263443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6236# de la bye brag yod pa de'i  gzhung gis cha bzhi'i don rnam par mi 'jog pas 'dir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386613#2386613#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9002# de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du  grub pa las / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535609#535609#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11222# gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: phyi ma zhes bya ba 'dis ni kun 'byung ba la sogs pa sdud do // / +'gog pa gcig pu zhig yod na ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228335#228344#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1835;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1836# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni sems  can stong pa dang  chos stong pa dang  gnyi ga stong pa'i shes rab ces bshad do // /

column3: snga ma nyid kyis  mngon sum du byas pas na de spang bar bya ba'i phyir lam bsgoms pa don med par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228345#228352#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1836;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1838# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba'i shes pa dang  rjes thob pa'i shes pa zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342587#2342587#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3682;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3683# gnas gyur pa dang de nyid la brten pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa  gsum bstan pa las bshad de 'byung ba rnams ni nor ba dag mang ba'i phyir 'dir ma brjod do // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545664#545664#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12492# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum ni rnam par gzhag pa ma yin pas bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin no zhe'o // /

column3: de bas na du ma nyid du grub bo // / +cung zad ces bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste / / +rdzas gcig pu kho na yin mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228353#228370#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1839;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1841# bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba'i  shes rab ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: 'on kyang 'phags pa'i lam gyi skad cig snga mas ma  lus par mngon sum du byed pa ma yin gyi lam bsgom pa phyi ma dag gis ma lus par mngon sum du byed par 'dod na de lta na ni cung zad mngon sum du byed pas mya ngan las 'das pa yan lag dang bcas par 'gyur te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228370#228384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1843# rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab ni 'di lta ste / / +de kho na nyid du bsgom pa'i shes rab po // /

column3: rtag pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa yin pas  yan lag med par 'dod do // / +'bras bu'i bye brag zhes bya ba rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i bye brag gis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228385#228397#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1844# mngon par rtogs pa'i  mtha' kun rdzob rnams shes pa chos ston pa la sogs pa dngos po sna tshogs ston pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339019#2339019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3274# yongs su shes par gyur pa'i phyir dang gtan du spangs  pa'i phyir lam dang thob pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la brten nas rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral na zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las kyang de skad bshad de / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358529#2358529#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5560;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5561# pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan ma tshang med pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par dag pa dang cha mthun pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan ma kun du 'byung ba dang  gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su 'grub  par bya ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa yang dgongs pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir de la mdo sde khongs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'di ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang byang chub sems  dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i yon tan rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas bstan pa yin te / /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228167#228167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1813# bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs pa la  sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /

column3: spong ba'i khams dang / / +'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang  'gog pa'i khams kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228398#228405#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1844# bstan bcos kun las btus pa las ni kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang  sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab dag ni rim bzhin du sa la 'jug pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi  chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sgrub pa'i ston pa gsum dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: de la 'dod chags ma gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba ni spong ba'i khams so // / +'dod chags spong ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228406#228416#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1845# bstan bcos kun las btus pa las ni kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang  sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab dag ni rim bzhin du sa la 'jug pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi  chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sgrub pa'i ston pa gsum dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: sngar bshad pa ma gtogs pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag spong ba ni 'gog pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228417#228425#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1846# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum yod pa rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnam     // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387881#2387881#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9125# 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnam par rig  pa tsam du grub pa las chos rnams la dbang ma thob pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba ni kun du rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis las gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug cing khong du chud pa la kun du rmongs pa zhes bstan pa nyid do // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358185#2358185#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5520# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382520#2382520#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385729#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8912;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# don gyi mthar gtugs te brjod na ni las rnam pa gsum dang ma rig pas  ngo bo nyid byed do // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386554#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386797#2386797#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387234#2387235#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397726#2397726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398618#2398618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10395# kha cig ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba la brten nas sa re re la yang sgrib pa gsum gsum spangs nas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thob bar 'gyur ba las brtsams nas sa bcu gcig po dag ston te / /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399358#2399358#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10488# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar te / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401891#2401891#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10818# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402254#2402254#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10871# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa dang sbyar na ma rig pa gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgrib par byed de / /
column19: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405105#2405105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11160# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column20: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222225#222226#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /
column21: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224292#224292#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column22: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224997#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu  ba'i dngos po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /
column23: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225535#225535#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column24: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241689#241689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3555# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du sa'i mdun rol dang  sa bcu po dag tu 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba la brten nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du sa re re zhing lpags shun la yod pa lta  bu la sogs pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242614#242615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column26: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269880#269881#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7043# gzhan yang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column27: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column28: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399693#2399693#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10536;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10537# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: bden  pa gnyis po spong pa'i bye brag ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba spong ba'i bye brag gis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228426#228434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1846;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1847;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1848# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum yod pa rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnam     // / +par bshad pa las 'byung ste / /

column3: phung po dang bcas pa dang phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings kyi bye brag gis yang rnam pa gnyis so zhes bya ba de la / /

column3: phung po zhes bya ba ni phung po rnams so // / +phung  po rnams dang ldan te lhag ma lus pa ni phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463389#463393#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1826# gang zag gnyis kas kyang bcol bas so so nas don re re la brten pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#485670#485674#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4740# de'i phyir skye ba gcig pa dang skye ba tha ma pa zhes mi bya ste des bstan pa rnams so so nas don re re la brten pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362479#2362483#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6033;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6034# de ltar bshad pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams bsdus pas don de las  brtsams pa'i phyir ji snyed yod pa nyid ces bstan te / / +so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221925#221937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1012;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1013# 'phags pa'i gsung rab dag ni so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228445#228455#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1850;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1851;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1852# don rnam pa gcig kho na ma yin te / / +so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248394#248394#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4374# de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni bag chags gtan du spangs pas rab tu che ba yin pas des na mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag las so so nas don re re smos pas phan tshun 'gal  ba med do zhes bshad do // /

column3: de ni 'di skad du / / +nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas phung po tsam zhig lus so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228454#228465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1851;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1852;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1854# phan tshun 'gal ba med do // / +pha rol tu phyin pa drug po  dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag mdo tsam du bstan pa yang / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385202#2385202#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8855;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8856# ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang mdo tsam du ston to // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bshad de / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373062#2373063#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7408# rnal 'byor gyi sgo de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2310761#2310761#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224465#224468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378# kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang yod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532331#532331#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10801;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10802# yang na mdo sde las dpe rnam pa gnyis gsungs pa'i dgongs pa tha dad pas dpe snga ma ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don gyi dper bstan  pa yin te / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343065#2343065#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3743# don 'di'i bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: gang dang phung po rnams bral ba de ni phung po'i lhag    ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228466#228473#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1854;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1855# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / / +pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag gi ngo bo nyid kyang / /

column3: de ni phung po med pa yang yin la lhag ma yang yin pas phung po med pa'i lhag ma ste / / +phung po dang ni bral la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228474#228490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1856;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1857# sbyin pa ni ma chags pa dang  des bskyed pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do // / +tshul khrims ni byang chub sems  dpa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do // /

column3: de tsam zhig lus so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya ba la / /
so  sor mtshams sbyor ba ni mtshams sbyor ba ste / / +skye ba yongs su 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228491#228498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1857;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1858# bzod pa ni zhe sdang med pa dang brtson 'grus dang nges pa'i shes rab dang de dag gis bskyed pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do // /

column3: 'di la ni mtshams sbyor ba med pas mtshams mi sbyor ba ste // / +mtshams mi sbyor ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa'o // /

column3: skye ba 'gag pa ni skye ba 'gog pa'o // / +de ni  mtshams sbyor ba med pa yang yin la / / +skye ba 'gog pa yang yin pas mtshams sbyor ba med pa ste skye ba 'gog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228508#228520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1859;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1862# bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid do // / +phyi ma lnga ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221705#221705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_980;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_981# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514277#514277#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8416# dngos po bcu bzhi po de dag  ni mi bden zhing phan pa med pa'i phyir klan kar mi rung ngo zhes 'byung ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de rnam par gzhag pas na gcig go zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gcig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de ni 'di skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228521#228528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1863# de'i rtsa ba dang  phyis thob pa'i yi shes so zhes 'byung ngo // / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361650#2361652#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5940;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5941# zhib tu ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516410#516410#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8657# phung po lnga'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353393#2353393#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4942# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234920#234920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2683# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni / / +mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244021#244022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3845# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin du  bshad par rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2400628#2400629#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10661;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10662;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10663# byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob par byed pa'i  gsang sngags bzhi gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de dag sems shing 'jal ba nye bar rtog ste zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217972#217973#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_492# de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la mchod pa dang  dge 'dun la mchod pa yang de dang 'dra ba ci rigs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin no // /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366199#2366199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6516;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6517# nyon mongs pa dang las kyi rgyu'i phyir skyes par gyur pa dang  skyes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: du ma yin yang spyir na mtshams  sbyor ba med pa skye ba 'gog pa yin pas gcig kho na zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397226#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221970#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
