column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236140#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236670#236673#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column10: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388443#2388444#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237159#237161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column16: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245240#245242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246078#246082#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column18: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237280#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column19: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231003#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272278#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column22: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273602#273605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column23: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column24: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229979#229979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column25: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230655#230655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2141# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column26: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238742#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / /
column27: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221161#221161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column29: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240696#240696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271454#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column31: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248433#248433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4377# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column32: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385110#2385110#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column3: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag nyi tshe rnam grangs su gtogs pa yin gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228569#228577#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1869# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / / +de ni dang po ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes zhu ba'o // /

column3: mdo  gzhan las ji snyed bstan pa'o // / +de bstan pa'i phyir // / +de skad du zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228578#228587#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870# de ni dang po ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes zhu ba'o // / +spyi dang bye brag gi ming ni gong du bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: phung po gzugs can ma yin pa bzhi po ni tshor ba la sogs pa'o // / +mig gi dbang po gzugs can ni gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222908#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223705#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226478#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye BA ZHUS PA'O // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228585#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# spyi dang bye brag gi ming ni gong du bstan pa bzhin te / / +'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu PHYIN PA ZHES BYA BA'I ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231630#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237177#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235783#235787#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2800# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245278#245282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005# de dag gi dgongs pa gang LAGS ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column14: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236517#236518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column16: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246092#246094#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4100# 'di ni dang po ji ltar gsungs pa'i don du zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column18: 0.015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121002#3121002#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4181;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4182# 'di la  gang brtson de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column19: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237242#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column21: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397568#2397570#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216181#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column24: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /
column25: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241854#241856#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3571# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column18: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261651#261651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5979# mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin  gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column20: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397672#2397672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig PAR BYA'O ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228608#228621#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1874# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin    gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te / /
column5: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355499#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched DU'O ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231025#231028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2178# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271486#271488#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column9: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /
column10: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354620#2354621#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5096# zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'dres pa'i chos la  dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column11: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388511#2388513#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed DE ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /
column12: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402965#2402966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10950;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10951# rigs kyi bu don chen po yongs su grub cing sngon ma 'dris pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob nas dga' ba chen po skye bas de'i phyir dang po ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes  bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column13: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231656#231656#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2248# rigs kyi bu nga ni nams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams gong du bstan pa bzhi mtshan nyid lnga po ma gtogs par rnam par dag pa gzhan yod par mi smra mod kyi  zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column14: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236917#236917#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2932# rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column15: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237327#237330#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2979# rigs kyi bu de ni sems can rnams kyi rang gi las kyi nyes pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column16: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239348#239349#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3257# mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pa chung ngu dang  'bring la zhugs pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column17: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239926#239926#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3329# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum yod DE ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column18: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245326#245326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4007# phung po lnga dang  nang gi skye mched drug dang  phyi rol gyi skye mched drug dang  de dag la sogs pa gang dag bstan pa ni theg pa chen por chos de dag chos kyi  dbyings gcig par mtshungs shing tshul gcig par mtshungs pa'i phyir nga ni theg pa tha dad pa nyid du mi smra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to // /
column19: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246114#246114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column20: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248765#248765#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4410# sbyin gnas chen por grags pa'i khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column21: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256163#256165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5232# rigs kyi bu rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste zhes bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column22: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264975#264977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6445# de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mthun  par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column23: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271955#271956#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7299;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7300# rigs kyi bu gsum po de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column24: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272740#272740#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7394# de las gzhan pa'i chu shel dag las ni ma yin te zhes bya  ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column25: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247759#247759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4297# rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column26: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229999#229999#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2058# rigs kyi bu dngos po de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa sa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column27: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261651#261651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5979# mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin  gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column28: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345639#2345639#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /
column29: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358841#2358841#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5593# sa gsum pa 'od byed pa las ni thob pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column30: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359246#2359246#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5640# rigs kyi bu ji ltar bzung zhing rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma dag la rags shing gsal bar myong ba dang  so sor rtog pa dang bcas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i  ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column31: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381237#2381237#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8412# 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnams la 'dod pa bzhin du ma thob pa ni lhag mthong gi gags yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column32: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371533#2371533#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7222# 'on kyang 'dir khyod la mdor bsdus te de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas  yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column33: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380427#2380427#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8311# rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dpag tu med pa ji snyed bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad  'dis bsdus pa yin par rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column34: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348629#2348630#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4333# rigs kyi bu rgyun chags su yid la byed pa gang gis sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column35: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260932#260932#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5873# rigs pa ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa rigs pa bzhi ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du  ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du phye ste bshad pa ste / /
column36: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219524#219525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_702;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_703;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_704# gnyis pa  de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par len du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +grangs lan mdor gsungs pa dang  rkyen rnam pa bzhi rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas     // / +ni bdag bsal ba ston to // / +dge slong dag chos 'di thams cad ni mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228618#228632#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1875# 'di yang rnam par dbye ste / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par dbye ste bshad pa dang  rgol ba'i rten du bzlas te bshad pa'o // /

column3: skye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +sems pas 'phangs pa ni las kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +'dus byas ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228633#228644#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877# 'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos pa ste / / +rgyu rnam  pa lnga'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: rten cing 'brel bar  'byung ba ni rgyu dang  rkyen las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228645#228654#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# rgyu rnam  pa lnga'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1905# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385684#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270215#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa LAS BYUNG BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column13: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column19: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column22: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /

column6: 0.008#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362655#2362655#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6059# 'du byed thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI  gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste BSHAD PA STON TO // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382610#2382610#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8571# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed par ltung bar gyur na de ni yid la byed pa'i rnam par gyeng ba yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston to // /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360870#2360872#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5829# ming gang zhe na zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // /

column3: de ni ma 'ongs pa mi skye ba'i chos can du nges pa rnams la 'thob bo // / +so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni dus gsum char las 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228765#228776#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1888;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1891# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i  dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston pa'o // / +'di yang rkyen rnam pa lnga bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235865#235868#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2811# 'di yang las rnam pa lnga pa bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / / +'di ni dang po chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan pa  ste ; /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263969#263969#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6318# bshad pa 'di nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / / +'di ni dang po kun du grags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222970#222970#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1175# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / /

column3: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni blo sngon du btang ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228775#228785#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1893# 'di ni dang po chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +pha rol tu     // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2878833#2878833#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1577;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1578# sprul pa'i sku 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas shes rab mi zad par rig par bya'o // / +pha rol  tu phyin pa drug la tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yon tan bstan pa'i don ni / /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935311#2935311#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9283;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9284# de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'o // / +pha rol phyin pa drug rnams la // /
column7: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2932495#2932495#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8921# de la 'jig rten gyi dge ba ni so so'i skye bo'i dus na pha rol tu  phyin pa drug spyod pa'o // /

column3: rkyen ma tshang bas zhes bya ba ni / / +de ma thag pa'i rkyen    med pa'o // / +de ni dper byas te bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228786#228794#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1894# phyin pa drug dang mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa de ni mi mthun pa'i dngos po zhes bya ste / / +mi mthun pa'i dngos po de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dper na mig dang yid kyi gzugs zhig la yengs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228795#228811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1894;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1896# mi mthun pa'i dngos po de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +sgrib ba drug rgya cher bshad ba ni 'og nas mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: mig dang yid ces bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de ma yin pa zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536175#536175#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11290;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11291# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan  bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang ci'i phyir 'di yod pa las 'di 'byung ZHES BYA ZHE NA / /

column3: gzugs de las gzhan du gyur pa ni de ma thag pa ni de ma  yin pa gzhan no // / +chos rnams zhes bya ba ni tshor ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228812#228820#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1896;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1897# bstan  bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3105091#3105093#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1904;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1905;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1906# de la sbyin pa la sogs pa rgya cher bstan pa rnams kyi mdor bsdu ba bstan par bya ste / / +de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni mdor bsdu na yon tan     // /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa de dag la dmigs pa gang yin pa de dag ni de la dmigs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228821#228828#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1898;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1899# de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni mdor bsdu na yon tan lnga dang ldan na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro ste / /

column3: dmigs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba de dag bskyed par bya ba zhes bya ba ni yul nges par gzung bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228829#228839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1898;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1899;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1900# de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni mdor bsdu na yon tan lnga dang ldan na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro ste / / +lnga gang zhe na / / +chags  pa med pa nyid dang  mi lta ba nyid dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang  yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so // /
column5: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3105109#3105118#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1909;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1910;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1911# chags pa med pa nyid dang  mi lta ba nyid dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang  yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so // /
column6: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119487#3119488#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3996;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3997# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lnga'i phyir te / / +chags  pa med pa nyid dang  mi lta ba nyid dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang  yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ro // /

column3: de dag  gis de thob na zhes bya ba ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa thob na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228838#228848#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1899;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1900;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1901# chags  pa med pa nyid dang  mi lta ba nyid dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang  yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so // / +sbyin pa la ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: mi skye ba ste des de dag 'gag par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni bgegs su gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228845#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1900;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1901;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# sbyin pa la ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la chags pa med pa nyid ni sbyin ba la sogs  pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos rnam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403467#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de'i tshor ba gnyi ga 'gag go zhes bya ba ni / / +'di la bde ba la sogs pa tshor ba gsum po de dag mi mthun  pas cig car mngon du gyur par mi 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228857#228867#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228868#228875#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1905# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334725#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column15: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column16: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column17: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column18: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256225#256228#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271379#271379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214# sems med de sems rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column21: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385683#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533914#533914#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266095#266095#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6578# dbyings dang  rang bzhin dang  las dang  chos dang  rgyu dang  'bras bur rnam par smin pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column24: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246630#246630#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4165# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa  dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas nges pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230242#230242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2096# 'dod pa la dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang  phyug ces 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column26: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de la gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba da ltar byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa thob pas tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385932#2385937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386552#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8997;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# 'phags pa sa bcu ba'i 'grel pa las ni lus yongs su gtsang ngo snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405102#2405105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11159;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11160# 'di ni sa bdun pa dang brgyad pa'i bye brag go zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228873#228887#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1905;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1907# dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358185#2358185#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5520# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382520#2382520#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8566# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rnam par gyeng ba lnga yod par bstan pa de yang skyon rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /

column13: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387235#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column15: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398618#2398618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10395# kha cig ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba la brten nas sa re re la yang sgrib pa gsum gsum spangs nas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thob bar 'gyur ba las brtsams nas sa bcu gcig po dag ston te / /
column16: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398997#2398998#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10441# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column21: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222225#222227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /
column22: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224292#224292#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1343# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo  dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column23: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224997#224998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1438# yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu  ba'i dngos po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo // /
column24: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225535#225536#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1494# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column25: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241689#241689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3555# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du sa'i mdun rol dang  sa bcu po dag tu 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba la brten nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du sa re re zhing lpags shun la yod pa lta  bu la sogs pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column26: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242615#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column27: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269881#269881#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7043# gzhan yang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column28: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214668#214668#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_79# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column29: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384421#2384422#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8768;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8769# bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ro myang ba dang  rgod pa ni nang gi gyeng ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column30: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406330#2406331#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11269;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11270# gzhan yang ji ltar sprin gyis nam mkha' la chus kun du 'gengs pa de bzhin du ye shes des kyang yon tan gyi tshogs kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes  'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las tshig mi mthun yang don tha dad par 'gyur ba ni med do // /
column31: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228753#228754#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1888# de la chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i  dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston pa'o // /
column32: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column33: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391027#2391027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column34: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column35: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229362#229363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column42: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241246#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column43: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387035#2387035#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column44: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227385#227385#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1732;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1733# zab pa dang  rgya che ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung  ste / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column45: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230321#230321#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2105# dper na lug bsad na ma tho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la sogs pa lta bu ste / / +theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column46: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385439#2385439#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8881# so so'i skye bo  nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column47: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225711#225711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1516# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: ci mngon zhe na / / +dgongs pa ni 'di yin no // / +'gog pa ni gsum ste / / +mi rtag pa  nyid kyi 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pa 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228888#228901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1908;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1909;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1910# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / / +chags pa med cing rnam par  dag ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: de la mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'gog pa ni byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ste / / +byung nas mi rtag pas rnam par 'jig gi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228900#228910#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1909;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1910# DE LA MI LTA BA NYID ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa la sems 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi lta ba  gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /

column3: ma byung ba rnams kyi ma yin no // / +so sor brtags pas  'gog pa ni dus gsum char gyi zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'gog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228911#228918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1910;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1911# pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa la sems 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi lta ba  gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /

column3: de bas na de lta bu gnyis med pa'i so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa nyid 'dir gzung bar rigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228919#228928#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1911;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1912# 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re bar sbyin pa la sogs pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni mi lta ba nyid ces bya'o // /

column3: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga nyi tshe so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228929#228937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1914# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu ni 'og nas mdo las bstan pa    bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223384#223386#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1235;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1236# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi mdo dang sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +gzhan  yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: phung  po lnga po de dag kyang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa 'thob bo // / +ji skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228938#228961#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1914;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1915;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1916;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1917;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1918# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu ni 'og nas mdo las bstan pa    bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / / +de la mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: dge slong 'di'i sems can dmyal ba rnams zad do // / +dud 'gro rnams zad do // /
yi dags rnams zad do zhes gsungs pa ste / / +bzod pa thob pas rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa'i dbang du byas te     // /
gsungs kyi / / +'dod pa la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i phyir de sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ma spangs pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228962#228969#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1917;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1918;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919# lan du  phan 'dogs pa la sems 'brel pa med pa zhes gang gsungs pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: de'i 'dod chags dang bral nas ngan song rnams spong ngo // / +de la ma skyes pa'i phyir yin gyi mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'gog pas zad pa ni ma  yin no ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228970#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1918;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334725#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405614#2405615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228688#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247470#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column12: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1798873#1798875#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_13087# sa dang po rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma shar nas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa chen po bsal nas dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye  shes kyi chos bstan pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten kun la chos 'chad pa'i sgo nas snang ba chen pos khyab par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1798903#1798904#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_13087;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_13088# sa dang po rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma shar nas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa chen po bsal nas dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye  shes kyi chos bstan pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten kun la chos 'chad pa'i sgo nas snang ba chen pos khyab par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa dang  sa dang po la gnas pa dang  sa gnyis la sogs pa bsgom pa'i sa la gnas pa'i 'bras bu'i tshigs     // /
column14: 0.014#TD4051E.TXT.r#2299988#2299990#TD4051E.TXT.r_5389;TD4051E.TXT.r_5390# sangs rgyas kyi sku rtag pa don du gnyer te / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la mi phyogs par  'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bstan na de la 'dod par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1763349#1763352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10318;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10319# de bshad pa phun sum tshogs pa tshigs  su bcad pa gnyis pa ston pa de 'chad de de'i phyir / / +sems dpa' mchog gi ston pa ni // /

column17: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1790911#1790913#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12436# 'di ltar phyi'i yul dngos por snang zhing dmigs pa 'di dag thams cad sems nyid de ltar snang par zad do zhes khong du chud nas phyi'i dngos po gang yang mi snang ba la gnas te / /
column18: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2825122#2825124#TD4087E.TXT.r_145;TD4087E.TXT.r_146# dpa' ba rtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go // / +de ni rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med  pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas so // /
column19: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2826865#2826867#TD4087E.TXT.r_329;TD4087E.TXT.r_330# rab tu byung na ni / / +'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column20: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2828359#2828361#TD4087E.TXT.r_462;TD4087E.TXT.r_463# ches gong nas gong du  khyad par shin tu 'dod pas cher gnas te / / +de las de dang  yang dag par blangs ba de lta bu dang  yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o // /
column21: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2831714#2831716#TD4087E.TXT.r_718;TD4087E.TXT.r_719# bcom ldan de yi bdun ni mtho bar gyur // / +ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang  thal  gong rgyas pa dang  dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa gsum thob ce na / /
column22: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2832018#2832021#TD4087E.TXT.r_735;TD4087E.TXT.r_736# bla mar byed ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te / / +'di ni de'i snga ltas yin no // /

column24: 0.021#TD4087E.TXT.r#2833033#2833033#TD4087E.TXT.r_823# de de nas shi 'phos nas khams 'dir mi rnams  dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te / /
column25: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#2833133#2833134#TD4087E.TXT.r_830# dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung na ni 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /

column27: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#2829650#2829650#TD4087E.TXT.r_562# ci'i phyir  byang chub sems dpas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mdoms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa thob ce na / /

column5: 1.788#TD4080E.TXT.r#508#513#TD4080E.TXT.r_28# de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bdud rtsi 'thung ba dang  'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang  sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  ji ltar nus pa bzhin du rab tu ster ba dang  sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun las ston pa gzhan  med par gus pas yang skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du song bas gus pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba la dngos po thams cad bdag nyid kyis rab tu 'jug pa dang  sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byams pa dang  'chad par 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o // /

column42: 0.018#TD4041E.TXT.r#2310370#2310370#TD4041E.TXT.r_860# the tshom med pa dang  'gyod pa chad pa dang  sred pa dang bral ba dang  'byung ba dang zhig pa la chags pa rgyas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag gis  ni lam rtogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba yongs su bstan te / /

column44: 0.018#TD4051E.TXT.r#2241937#2241937#TD4051E.TXT.r_620;TD4051E.TXT.r_621# de yongs su 'dzin par byed pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu mtshan yin  gyi ; / +phan 'dogs par byed pa ni ma yin no // /
column45: 0.018#TD4051E.TXT.r#2258178#2258178#TD4051E.TXT.r_1831;TD4051E.TXT.r_1832# gnas gyur pa'i phyir de la gnas pa'i rnam par rig pa rnams kyang 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba la sogs pas kyang gzhan du 'gyur te / /
column46: 0.018#TD4079E.TXT.r#1372861#1372861#TD4079E.TXT.r_467# chos kyi skus khyad par du gyur pas na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang  sprul pa'i skus bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pas / /

column48: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#1365558#1365558#TD4091E.TXT.r_11012# zag pa dang bcas pa zad par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'o // /

column9: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1957189#1957190#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4184;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4185# gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par // / +mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin // /
column10: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1933072#1933072#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2069# de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa  bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#1180054#1180054#TD4069E.TXT.r_4847;TD4069E.TXT.r_4848# 'dir bshad pa / / +rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i rgyu rnams te / /
column12: 0.024#TD4043E.TXT.r#657873#657875#TD4043E.TXT.r_879;TD4043E.TXT.r_880# de la phyin ci ma log pa ni yang dag par nges pa ste / / +de la log par sgrub pa ni log par  nges pa dang ma nges pa'o // /
column13: 0.024#TD4024E.TXT.r#804576#804576#TD4024E.TXT.r_124;TD4024E.TXT.r_125# don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don yin zhes bya // / +rin chen nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // /
column14: 0.024#TD4044E.TXT.r#704786#704786#TD4044E.TXT.r_1108# yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa ji snyed pa  de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la dkrol zhing bstan zin zhes bya ba ni / /
column15: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772759#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column16: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779282#2779282#TD4061E.TXT.r_2899# de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / /

column18: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1195869#1195871#TD4069E.TXT.r_6039;TD4069E.TXT.r_6040# mig ni ma skyes pa las skye zhing zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du gzugs 'das pa yod do zhes gsungs na / /

column20: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3024043#3024043#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11202# ro phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni ro zhim po bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1358877#1358877#TD4091E.TXT.r_10361# sprul pa'i sems la skyang bsam gtan dag pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / /
column22: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#14223#14223#TD4036E.TXT.r_1038# me tog gi spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis bskyod pa las phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su spos kyi ngad yid du 'ong ba dag ldang ba bzhin du / /
column23: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1522642#1522642#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11603;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11604# yi ge dag las ming dang tshig yongs su rtog pa don med do // / +bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ming gi tshogs la sogs pa  ni rdzas su yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro // /
column24: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#85471#85471#TD4036E.TXT.r_7116# mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa dang  mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings yid la byed pa ni / /
column25: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3044934#3044934#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12976# dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas  pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te / /
column26: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1446562#1446562#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5154# ljongs kyi mi'i tshig la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la ljongs kyi mi  dang ljongs kyi mi nges pa ste / /

column3: bsam gtan gnyis pa     // / +la ni rab tu dang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#2818#2837#TD4036E.TXT.r_72# 'di ltar dbus kyi mi rnams su skyes pa'i bar du rgyas par gyur kyang mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang ldan par gyur nas sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba nas 'di las srid gzhan mi shes so // /

column3: de yang dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos te / /
chos de mnyam par gzhag pa dag las kyang 'byung ba yod do zhes lhag par shas che ba'i phyir yan lag tu rnam par gzhag pa dang  dga' ba dang  bde ba dang  sems rtse gcig pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#2835#2852#TD4036E.TXT.r_72;TD4036E.TXT.r_73# 'di ltar dbus kyi mi rnams su skyes pa'i bar du rgyas par gyur kyang mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang ldan par gyur nas sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba nas 'di las srid gzhan mi shes so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#2853#2863#TD4036E.TXT.r_73;TD4036E.TXT.r_74# zhes bya ba med do zhes bya ba'i bar  du rgyas par de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba yin te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#2862#2871#TD4036E.TXT.r_74# mu stegs can gyi lta ba de yang des sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa dang  dam pa chos ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams med pa'i tshe na rnyed par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131542#3131546#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3638;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3639# lha de bzhin no zhes 'dreg     // / +mkhan gyi skyes bus rgyal po lha chen po'i mgo las skyes pa'i skra dkar gser gyi tsher zungs kyis dal bus dal bus bton te rgyal po lha chen po'i phyag tu phul lo // /
column6: 0.012#TD4099E.TXT.r#204805#204806#TD4099E.TXT.r_686;TD4099E.TXT.r_687# spos kyi rigs ni 'di dag pas // / +tshul khrims dri bsung phul du phyin // /
column7: 0.015#TD4091E.TXT.r#1351556#1351556#TD4091E.TXT.r_9714;TD4091E.TXT.r_9715# rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos  rnams ni de'i rang dang tshogs yin la / / +yul dang yul can tha dad pa dang  dmigs pa de gcig pa dang shin tu nye ba'i phyir de dag la ni mi 'dzin to // /
column8: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131251#3131254#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3620;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3621# 'di lta ste rgyal po dang yang dag par ldan pa las 'don te / / +lha chen po bcu gnyis pa'i mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du / /
column9: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3132125#3132125#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3675# chu bo can na bzhugs so  zhes aa mra skyong mas thos nas / /
column10: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1389525#1389525#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_227# gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa dag kyang shes bya thams cad la phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pa'i phyir / /
column11: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131203#3131204#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3616# rtse gcig sems med pa la de med ces mdzod kyi gnas gsum par 'chi 'pho zhing skye    ba bkag ste / /
column12: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131583#3131583#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3640# de nas rgyal po lha chen pos phyag gnyis kyis skra dkar de bsnams nas / /
column13: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#2290761#2290763#TD4051E.TXT.r_4567;TD4051E.TXT.r_4568# du gsung gi phrin las dang  thugs kyi phrin las kyang brjod par bya'o // / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa na kha cig gus par nyan cing rna ba gtod pa dang  kun shes par byed pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa dang  chos kyi rjes su  mthun pa'i chos sgrub kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur / /
column14: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#2265217#2265217#TD4051E.TXT.r_2413;TD4051E.TXT.r_2414# gnas ma yin zhing go skabs  med de / / +gang bdag log par zhugs pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column15: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1389625#1389625#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_235;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_236# de'i phyir mi shes pa bcom pa kho na'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa brjod par rigs so // / +nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhes bya ba la / /
column16: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#2125584#2125584#TD4047E.TXT.r_7268# sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na 'bras bu smin par byed pas na phan yon che ba yin no // /
column17: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1860749#1860750#TD4054E.TXT.r_5624# des rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i gnyen po byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.024#TD4041E.TXT.r#2315648#2315648#TD4041E.TXT.r_1305;TD4041E.TXT.r_1306# don gyi sgo nas yang yongs su bstan pa yin gyi / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rnam grangs ston pa ni tshad med do / /
column19: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131153#3131153#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3614# de yang ting nge 'dzin las langs te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas gtam ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la go bar byas so zhes phran tshogs kyi sgo brgyad  pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po las de ltar 'don to // /
column20: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1389340#1389340#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_213;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_214# de yang kha cig na re rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yin te / / +'di ltar rdo rje  lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba dang  thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi nus pa mnga' bar 'gyur ro zhe'o // /
column21: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#170787#170788#TD4095E.TXT.r_5606;TD4095E.TXT.r_5607# rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so // / +'tshig pa lta ba mchog 'dzin las // /

column24: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3131836#3131836#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3660# skyes bu tha chad dang  skyes bu tha mar  ma gyur cig / /
